product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Stephen
content: The most obvious thing to like about the cameras is the ease of setup. The magnetic mounting makes it easy to get the positions right and the "scan to connect" setup is quick and painless. The supplied connection cables and mounts are are of good quality and the wifi connection so far has been robust, with only one unexplained temporary dropout on one camera (located in a bit of a wifi shadow) out of four thus far. Picture quality in daylight is superb, as is the ability to set triggers for people, movement, & various sounds in different zones. The sensitivity of the microphones and camera to enable those triggers is just right, not too sensitive, not too insensitive. Dislikes - Picture quality at night is "meh", with adequate light required to enable details to be seen clearly. The included cables, whilst excellent, have a non-removable collar at the usb end, designed to connect to the supplied extension cables, but these prove to be a bit bulky when trying to connect two or more cameras to adjacent usb points. All in all an excellent product and I intend to order more, along with some internal cameras.
title: Easy to set up and good image and sound quality, solid wifi connection, but annoying usb cables

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Mermaid Melissa
content: Though there have been some technical hick ups when adding on additional cameras… The staff when I call has worked with me and because of their customer service I will keep my five star rating as the product is everything I hoped it would be.  If you have good Wi-Fi I recommend 1080 P and pointing it not just down on your  porch or driveway but actually pointed outward towards your  Street and neighbors houses .  I caught two car burglars breaking into my neighbors cars because I had the camera lower pointing not just on my porch and front yard but it witnessed them scouting then breaking into the neighbors car which was used for evidence for the police.  By keeping the camera from going into night vision I was also able to identify the criminals by the color of their clothing so if you can opt out of night vision.
title: Totally worth it

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Kari
content: I bought a bundle, one indoor and one outdoor but for some reason the only one showing up in my orders is the outdoor one. We are undecided about even installing it due to the issue we are experiencing with our indoor cam. Our indoor cam was easy to install, but does not work nearly as good as we had hoped. I am a family child care provider and I bought this cam to have in my playroom so I could monitor the older kiddos in there while working with the little's in another room. We have several issues with this cam. 1. I have an iPad mini I was hoping to use as the monitor but learned that I could not get the app because it required iOS 10 or higher. I  then learned that my iPad reached it's max updates so if I wanted iOS 10 or above I needed a new iPad. 2. When nobody is in the room it CONSTANTLY goes offline even though it is very near our router and everything else works perfectly, we pay a premium to have the highest Mbps offered through our ISP. This should not be happening. 3. The video hangs and freezes ALL the time. I will be watching and listening to the kids and then I get what I call the spinning circles of death. 4. You can talk to the kids in the room, but only after hitting the microphone button. When you are talking to them, you can't hear what they are saying until you close out your microphone, plus there is a delay. Super annoying when I want to have a 2 way conversation with them. 5. There is a delay. So the kids can run back there, do something silly and run back to the other room and see themselves. 6. The subscription service, for what I would need it for, is not worth the money.
title: Drops WiFi - Not compatible w/ipad min - Delay - Expensive Subscription

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Syracuse Dave
content: In the end if you don't have a subscription, this is not much more than a nanny cam that you can check up on your house by. It really should have 12 hours of footage, not 4 to be useful. So basically if something happened overnight, without a subscription you wouldn't be able to see it. There has to be a better product. If they changed it to 12 hours, I would consider it a 4.5. With the subscription, it is pretty good for a business, but not as a stand-alone device.
title: Not enough hours of video footage available. to be called a security camera.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Melissa B
content: My camera went offline, I called google to help me fix it remotely and you cannot. You must be near the device since it connects to your phone via bluetooth. If you plan to monitor your place remotely its not possible to trouble shoot it from afar, rendering the device useless.
title: Can't fix remotely

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Ray Gomez
content: What more does this thing want from me? Wifi extender giving out 30mb dl speed and 10 upload. Everythings setup in the settings. I receive notifications of activity about 10% of the time. and sometimes you wont even get the event recorded.
title: Don't waste your money

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Max V.
content: This is a really great camera. It took me maybe 30 minutes to install, but it was easy because I had an outdoor outlet to connect it to. I like that I don't need a DVR or any equipment inside the house besides a decent internet connection and router, which I had anyway. The video quality is awesome and so is the sound. The camera looks modern, like it belongs in 2017 instead of those old-looking bullet cameras. I also like the added security that the video is directly uploaded right away instead of being stored on-site like some other systems and the added cost of maintaining on-site storage. The only thing I don't like is how big the hole needs to be if you want to run it through a wall, but I can see why they had to do that as it makes it easier for the consumer to have a regular AC power plug on the end. Overall, Nest makes great products (I also have Nest Thermostats on our other property) and I will definitely be buying more from them in the future.
title: This is a really great camera. It took me maybe 30 minutes to ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Tom Jeffers
content: The camera is awesome.  The installation instructions are great!  But wait until you get to trying to figure out how to use what you see on your screen of your iPhone.  You are on your own.  All the pamphlet does is show you how to physically hook up the camera.  I had someone do it who was in the business of doing this.  $450 later the cameras were working fine.  It wasn't so bad because the guys spent about 4 hours hooking them up plus 2 hours travel time. Nest just can't seem to put together simple instructions on how to understand what you see on your screen of you iPhone and how to use it.  I know that they know, why won't they just tell us what all the symbols mean and how you put the camera thru its paces?  After a couple more days of farting around with it I guess I will call them to iron out the details. It is the most awesome picture and audio-in that you can imagine.
title: Why can't they show how to use your phone with it?

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Aaron Kiefer
content: Our camera stopped working after a few months. I tried everything to fix it. It powers on but turns off on its own. I tried calling customer support and it said 40 minute wait. I waited for 40 minutes and still never talked to anyone. I wish I could return it or get one that works.
title: Stopped working after a few months

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Fred Pfeifer
content: Love this product and it works like a charm. Installation was super easy. Vendor is great. I now have four Nest products in our home and have discovered that we really couldn't live without them. I love the outdoor camera. On a recent trip to Europe I was able to monitor my home from Germany, where during a severe thunderstorm I noticed leaves piling up in our driveway gutter. I called a neighbor to help clean the area and thereby possibly avoiding flooding ion our basement. This little gem has paid for itself in so many ways already that I could write pages and pages on why you should have one in your home. So much better than signing up with one of those expensive Home Security outfits. This Nest outdoor camera is easy to install, features day and night vision with audio that lets you talk to anyone that comes near where the camera is mounted. Ours is installed by the front of the front doorway allowing us to see the delivery people, mailman, and our landscaping people. Installation was super easy. Took less than 30 minutes, and I am the least bit handy! I can barely hammer a nail straght in the wall. So for me to get this camera, mounted, installed and hooked up to my wifi in less than 30 minutes was quite a miracle and acco0mplishment indeed.
title: Love this product and it works like a charm

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Richard Chae
content: I have worked with recording cameras from back in the day. It has become more simpler and user friendly since then. It was super easy to set up in the house. Also very easy to setup. I am tech savvy but it is designed for anyone to setup with your current existing wifi setup in your house. Of course you need to know the router password. Also the quality of the camera is pretty clean. When you zoom in it gets a bit grainy but a great way to see what is going on. If you position the camera correctly and effectively you can monitor and deter any potential threat also to have a piece of mind as well. We got the camera for use as a baby cam mainly because we already have the nest thermostat and that app never failed us. It was a no brainier, I wanted a system that had solid app support with great quality camera that I can just buy, setup and not have any issues with operation. I am confident with the nest app so I went with their camera system. I hope this helps.
title: It does what it is supposed to do.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: D
content: Bought my third outdoor cam to add to my Nest system. I've nothing against the cameras --- they're great. Awesome video and sound quality, very easy installation, and a good price for the annual subscription. It's the app that I have an issue with. The app controls every Nest product that you might have in your home, and is quite robust. It's got great features. When I first started using Nest system, the app was very responsive. As of 09/11/18, the app is completely wonky. Loading saved videos and feeds take forever in the app, but if you use a PC to access your Nest account, everything's smooth. The devs do update the app often, so hopefully they squash the bugs that are currently plaguing it.
title: On my third now.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Tom
content: Absolutely the COOLEST camera, very easy to set up, its pretty much plug and play.  You can zoom, it will record little clips of video and can save on computer or phone.  The night vision is very good, can see very clearly.  It will send you notifications of any movement or speaking even, it sent a notification of the neighbors talking even though the cam didn't see them.  it is a bit touchy and "delayed" trying to speak thru the camera, but you can do it and you can hear very well thru the speaker.  The cord is very long and its convenient to plug into an outlet outside.  If it gets unplugged it will send you notification.  I have this with the Nest thermostats, and the app and thermostats work great too!  Can control everything in the house thru it from miles away, can get the house nice and cool before you come home from a long weekend vacation.  I am not disappointed in any way with this product.
title: Great Cam!!  Love it!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Jessie Gill
content: These cameras look nice and are easy to set up but the system is total CRAP!! They do NOT work consistently. The camera has REPEATEDLY missed people coming and going from my property. I have 3 of these cameras and am looking to replace all three. Nest’s customer service is a joke.
title: Buy something else

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Jules
content: I set these up in my back and front yards after a person broke into my back yard and wandered around my garage before leaving...having been broken into my home before, I hated that feeling, and back then affordable cameras with notifications via smart phones didn’t exist. I LOVE the Nest brand of indoor/outdoor cameras. They are high quality, the app is easy to use and program, and I am so glad to get notifications about movement and people coming to my house within seconds of them stepping foot on my property, whether we are home or not.
title: Easy to use, high quality

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: shadowgate100
content: If you don't pay for their monthly service, all you get is motion detection, not person detection, which seems to detect the wind blowing. I get about a dozen or more email alerts a day. The camera is pointed at my front door and walkway and doesn't cover the driveway or street. Whenever it goes off, there is a picture of nothing. No animal, no person, just my front door and walkway. I'd turn off alerts but what would be the point if someone really did show up that I wanted to know about? Not worth it unless you're planning on paying the $15 a month subscription fee.
title: Alert Central

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: L. Pierce
content: We purchased this for a second home we own, located about 3 hours away on secluded property. The area is rural and internet access is limited, with sometimes poor connectivity so I was concerned how well the image would display etc. To my surprise it’s a crystal clear, high def image with great vantage point from the peak of our house. The two way audio provided better results than FaceTime, and for us the alerts are not a problem, as we need to be aware when something is detected. We purchased the annual plan for $50 to save recorded data, which I feel is well worth it to provide security to our vacant property. We intend to purchase at least one more for the back of the house now that we know how well it works. I enjoy randomly logging on just to look at the property/weather. Highly recommend!
title: Well worth the investment!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Tom Riddle
content: Took me around 2 hours to install properly, but once installed, it does it's job worry free forever. Nest does a really good job with the instructions and the materials provided are fairly good quality. The magnetic swivel is genius. Makes small adjustments to angle even after installation very easy. Love this camera overall and wish I could install more but this is already my 3rd Nest cam and the yearly subscription prices add up to $200 a year for 3 cams already. The zone feature is very nice as well. Keep it up Nest and please don't make it worse in future iterations. There is this weird trend of companies making "new" versions of products that are clearly produced with cheaper materials or some corners being cut. I wouldn't mind higher quality cameras at higher prices. It's not like you buy these cameras often anyway.
title: A perfect home security camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: A. Herman
content: Really a great camera, easy to install, looks sharp; my only complaint is that the USB plug on this that has to be fed into the house if you don't have an outdoor outlet for it is ridiculously big. They tell you to drill a 1" hole to feed the wire into the house, which is huge considering the wire fits through a 1/4" hole! I ended up cutting the wire, feeding it inside through a 1/4" hole, and then reconnecting the power to the USB plug (you only need to connect the red and black power wires, the green/grey A/V wires don't actually do anything since it's on wifi). My warranty is probably voided since I cut the cable and reattached it, but there's no way I was drilling a gaping 1" hole in the side of my house just to get a 1/4" wire inside. Considering the overall attention to design and the price of the camera, I'm not sure why they couldn't figure out a better way to route the exterior wire than to drill such a large 1" hole....
title: Great camera, but annoying installation issue if routing power from inside the house.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Gunther Sanderson
content: A year ago I tried the Nest indoor camera, and ended up returning after 30 days. The hardware was good, but the software and product were buggy and substandard. I decided to give the outdoor camera a try this year to see if it was any better. I was intrigued by the person detection AI feature, as dealing with no relevant motion alerts is the biggest drawback in the industry. I'm happy to say that Nest really nailed this product. Setup was quick, under five minutes. The person detection really delivers, so far it has been accurate 100% of the time. Solid construction. Much improved app. I would have given it five stars, but there are still a few nits. First, the non removable watermark on the image. Come on Nest, this is really obnoxious, and not something not appropriate for paying this much money. Second, the $10/month cloud storage fee for 10 days. I get it, that costs you money. How about $5/month for five days storage? That's more than most people need. The person detection is really the differentiating feature with this camera. For the price, there are other cameras with the ease of use and picture clarity, but the detection is what sets this one apart.
title: Big improvement over the indoor camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: William D. Anderson
content: We purchased the Nest Cam Outdoor because we wanted it to alert us if someone entered our yard.  We mounted the camera under the eaves in the front of our house. The camera hardware is excellent and the installation was easy due in part to the magnetic mount.  We were able to get the camera onto our Wi-Fi network and started streaming high quality video very quickly.  The Nest Cam Outdoor provides a high quality color image during the day and a very good black and white image at night. There are two modes for providing security.  The first is a motion detector and the second detects only people.  We found the motion detector to be too sensitive for use outdoors.  We got a false alert every few hours.  We were alerted every time a squirrel ran through the yard or wind blew the tree branches.  At night we were even alerted when car headlights caused moving shadows.  So next, we turned off the motion detector and used only the people detector mode.  This time we did not get any false alarms but were only alerted to people in our yard about half the time.  Several times it did not alert us when someone walked right up the driveway and up to the house. We called Nest Customer Service.  He was very nice and checked our setting to make sure that we had everything set up correctly.  He said that there was nothing that he could do to improve the performance.  He said that I should return the camera if I was not satisfied.  Of course, Amazon provided a quick refund.
title: Doesn't provide useful alerts

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Newt
content: This is my third Nest product in my home and one of the best. It's extremely simple to set up and install. Setup takes less than two minutes (existing Nest products) and imported into the Nest App. I used a power screwdriver to mount the two brackets and cable clips. I spent more time deciding where to put the camera than I did installing it. The first night, it captured a moth flying around in my backyard (zero external lightening) in complete darkness. Bad things about Nest: extremely sensitive to images. Tons of emails and text when anything moves in the backyard....umbrella, wind chimes, rabbits. Etc.  Maybe add facial recognition to software to prevent family members setting off alerts! Excellent product. I have three indoor cameras and three smoke/monoxide detectors in home also and they all work together on the Nest app. I can't wait for their next product.
title: Love Nest Products!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Farnoosh Brock
content: We LOVE our Nest Camera. It's been a few months now, and it works great. I hardly use the audio option to greet people. My #1 goal is to see what's going on in front of my house, and the online app works great. I have a bookmark on my browser, and the app on my phone and notifications set to email me. You discover things you didn't know before. I had no idea my front door is a huge CAT CROSSING!!! All day long, the 5 neighboorhood cats, all of which have owners by the way but they are outside cats, cross this way and that way. I don't mind. :) And also you know when there is a package sitting in your front door, and most of all, you know when to ignore the hell out of solicitors. Seriously, the best purchase of 2017!!! Nest cam is reliable, dependable, easy to install, and looks stylish and functions brilliantly!
title: Best and most reliable security camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Sam
content: I have two of these; one for the driveway, another for the nursery (I couldn't find a compelling reason to buy the indoor version when there doesn't seem to be a difference other than the outdoor cam is far more aesthetically pleasing). I've owned them both for several months and am ready to review – starting with the negative. CONS • A few nights ago, the cam in the nursery timed out for about 35 minutes. My wife could see that our daughter had awoken and started crying (because she was hungry) before the cam stalled, and was still crying when recording resumed. This camera has ONE JOB, and it failed at a critical moment. I have that cam set on AUTO for image quality, which is supposed to ensure continuous recording, regardless of image quality. I also have a strong WiFi connection through our house. It is absolutely unacceptable that this happened. Now, I've read enough reviews on here to know that Nest's first response is to blame the owner's WiFi signal, so I bought a WiFi extender that arrived today. We're going to give this one more try (my wife is extremely hesitant to trust this product anymore), and if it fails again, I'm tossing this thing in the garbage. • The image resolution is decent, but I guarantee it's never 1080p. I can't imagine in what unattainable circumstances you'd have to place this camera to achieve 1080p, but it's obviously one of those lab test labels that never performs in the real world. • While most people will want and need a video history, spending for Nest Aware is worthwhile if: A) You have money to blow; B) You absolutely must have a record. Nest is really out of touch with their pricing; either you have expensive hardware and cheap service, or vice versa, but not expensive cameras AND history – unless you're Nest! For basic home security in the average scenario, you're going to need at least 3 cameras. Even at the new price, you're looking at $785 for the first year alone in product and service costs, with recurring costs of $200 every year thereafter. • The app functionality seems to have changed recently. You can zoom in on an area and enhance the image, but now, if you want to change the enhanced area, you have to back out of the cam view altogether, then go back in and double-tap the area to enhance. It took a while to figure that out and was very frustrating. • The power cord situation doesn't make sense at all. It should be located in such a way as to be able to pass through a wall without being seen or accessed from the outside. PROS • I started with a CCTV system that had enough wire to wrap around the Earth twice. The DVR that came with it wouldn't work properly, and after a tremendous amount of hassle, I gave up and chose this plug-and-play option that fit with my attempt to make my home smarter. • I already owned a Nest Thermostat and one Nest Protect, and it's nice to have uniformity of brand, especially being able to access the whole system through one app. • It's more attractive than just about any other camera you're going to find, period. • The Zones function is easily the smartest and best part of this camera, especially in being able to differentiate what kind of alert you want, if any, from motion in each zone. Of course, it only comes with a (costly) Nest Aware subscription. VERDICT The most important aspect of ANY security component or system is reliability – if it doesn't work 100% of the time, then it is entirely useless. It's beyond aggravating that I could count on a $20 baby monitor more than my Nest Cam. And the $100-for-one-cam, $50-for-additional-cam video archive (which lasts only 10 days, btw) is obnoxious. Until the firmware is updated to ensure reliability (if that's possible) and they come to their senses and make Nest Aware reasonably priced, I recommend going with something else.
title: Unacceptable performance, service overpriced

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: TechConsultant
content: I’ve tested multiple branded IP cameras but haven’t seen a camera like this in the wireless category. The pros, extraordinary range considering the quality it still retains. The setup process is fairly simple and the cable is quite long enough. The magnetic mount process requires 2 screws to install the surface plate. The magnet holds the surface place and camera together. Very rigid. Viewing the cam through the mobile app and through a browser provides a friendly user experience. The Cons, a minor one in terms of installation. Be sure to measure the length of the cable before putting tight cable clips. As you pull the cable, the camera will move from the magnetic mount. For longer camera footage, a subscription is required. The default saves 3 hours. However, great camera and definitely recommend! Time to try the next one up!
title: With Nest, you can protect yours!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Paul Elliott
content: Listen up people!! Do NOT buy these Nest Cameras, they are useless without paying the subscription. Let's say you keep the camera for 5 years at the minimum $50 per year per camera that's another $250.00. If Nest care about their customers they could package the Nest Aware Software and just sell it for a one time fee like any other software, instead of having you paying for the use until the camera craps out. Nest misled customers by giving 30 days free Nest Aware, and customers don't find out that the cameras are useless without the subscription until after the 30 days , by then the 30 days return period expires. (1) The live stream video quality is greatly reduces without the subscription, worse than a crappy old VHS tape. (2) everything slows down without the subscription, live stream takes longer to load, etc. (3) No video clips without the subscription. (4) Still shots that is so blurry the cheapest Polaroid camera takes better pictures. I have the Hello Doorbell too, and that is the same without the subscription. People need to get the word out!! DO NOT BUY THESE NEST CAMERAS!!
title: Nest Cameras Are Crappy and Useless Without the Subscription

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: J Soltani
content: These are the best, easiest cameras to install you can imagine?!  If I can do it, you can do it!  The instructions and installation are easy to follow, no drilling holes through walls or anything like that.  You can customize where you want to put them around your house to meet your needs.  Plus, Nest offers two security programs (10 day & 30 day), to retain all of the camera / picture information, you can cancel at any time, it's simply a GREAT security product / package program for any homeowner.  We'll be buying two more exterior cameras to enhance our own security needs this year, they're simply a GREAT product, (to repeat myself).  Virtually instant notification via your mobile phone or computer of any activity around your home at anytime.
title: Outdoor Nest Security Cameras are GREAT!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: keno
content: Very easy to install. It took less than 30 minutes to install and setup the camera. The picture quality is excellent, both in daylight and night time. The software works good and I can see the video feed on my iPhone, iPad, and my Alexa Spot located in the kitchen.  Works so well, I decided to get a Nest Hello Doorbell also. To my surprise Amazon does not sell the Nest Hello Doorbell (the highest rated video doorbell by independent reviewers). Amazon only sells the Ring Doorbell. So I went to the Bestbuy Web Site and bought a Nest Hello Doorbell there. And, Bestbuy installed it for free!!  Yes, The Geek Squad from Bestbuy installed the Nest Doorbell for no additional cost. Thank you Amazon for making me go to Bestbuy to purchase the Next Hello Doorbell.
title: Works Great plus a Bonus

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: A. Fogey
content: I've had IP cameras for years and stayed away from subscriptions, but started using Nest to look out for my mother when she went into memory care. Nest's biggest advantage there is that it calls home and tunnels through the facility firewall/router without requiring anything of the network admin. Having a couple years favorable experience at assisted living I decide to go with a couple of these at home. I don't like the subscription fees, but decided the convenience and reliable off-site storage outweighs the cost. The camera is simple to mount and even simpler to add to my account with Nest. Every now and then it needs to be rebooted, generally after a power outage. I use z-wave power modules at home and a timer at Mom's. The timer reboots every day. It would be nice if they brought the price down a little.
title: Easy and reliable.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Rich H.
content: Camera started out great but has slowly been deteriorating.  It seems to switch between 5 GHZ and 2.4 GHZ and when it is on 5 GHZ I lose the connection because of poor signal.  Not sure how this is happening but that is what the technician with NEST stated.  I asked how I could lock in 2.4 GHZ and never got a reply.  Looked for assistance on the app and the web to no avail.  I really felt that the technician had no idea what she was doing.  This is making my decision to purchase cloud storage plan even easier.  On the positive side, the install was very easy.  Instructions clear and straight forward.  Up in running quickly.  The Android app is a little clunky.  Has a bar across the top advertising I'm on a trial cloud plan and to purchase a plan.  Very annoying as you can't get rid of it.  Can't get forward or reverse controls when in full screen.  Web page functionality is much easier.  Wish the camera wouldn't trigger motion from a sensor light coming on.
title: You need a really stong WiFi signal

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: virgo gal
content: I had the exact same experience as reviewer B. Gaston had.  During the free 30-day Nest Aware Trial period, everything was great.  No internet related issues, good alarm notifications, etc.  Once the 30-day trial period ended, I've had constant errors..."Camera offline" "Weak internet signal".... Can someone say SCAM!  This is my 2nd Nest Camera; 1st was purchased before Google bought out Nest and started scamming customers.  Hate this camera!
title: Hate Google's Nest Aware Scams!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Carol Andrews
content: Really great camera. It is so easy to use, unlike the ones I bought a while back. The motion sensor, even if you don't have the subscription for person alert, is smart. It doesn't pick up just a leaf moving like my other ones. It's worth five bucks a month plus however many others to get an alert that tells you it Is a Person. There are a lot of trees in my front yard, so the motion detection doesn't really reach to opposite end of the house but it's fine because I've ordered two more I love them so much. I've watched my dad chase his dog across the front lawn a few times. The clips are so cool and it shows you a still also with exactly what caused the motion detection before you even watch the clip.
title: Smart camera with great picture and alerts

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: D. McCarthy
content: Easy to install but make sure you set it up indoors first and then use an extension cord to temporarily mount it in your expected location to make sure it is getting good WiFi coverage there before you work on running its cable. Otherwise it works fine and the magnet mount is strong and isn't affected by wind. Very well made and possibly the best packaging I've seen in a long time for DIY.
title: Well made

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: S. Kennedy
content: Awesome product.  Easy to setup, video quality and features are second to none.  Most of the reviews where I see people have had issues are user error.  The zoning works perfectly (you have to select don't alert outside zones to not get any alerts outside them).  I do wish the IR was a bit more flooded.. though in fairness my Nest Cam is 30 feet on the ground and covers a driveway and I can see everything at night just fine.  It just isn't quite as bright as cameras I have had that have 6-8 IR emitters. My experience with Nest products, in general, is they are exceptionally well made and well thought out.  Which is saying something considering they are owned by Google, who typically has the corporate attention span of a nat and often kills things before they mature.  Nest just keeps getting better and integrating more and more with 3rd party products like Hue etc.
title: They are awesome!  Strongly recommend!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Chris C.
content: I really struggled with this right out of the box. Set up was easy, mounting with the magnets  was easy, but keeping a signal was impossible. I have a small home and we have great WiFi. Can easily get a signal out in the street and well into the backyard. Before giving up I even purchased a WiFi extender- that didn’t work either. One of the worst things is if the power goes out you have to unplug/plug back in to reset. Sure- let me get my ladder out every time the power flickers here in Florida. No way I’d trust this system to reliably protect my family and property. Maybe others have had great success with it, but not me. I tried my best- but right out of the box & even installing a WiFi extender could not keep this system running reliably. I’m going to invest in a hardwired system.
title: Can’t Depend On It

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Jerry Palmerino
content: This is absolutely the best camera I have ever purchased. There are two downsides though. The first is the optional monthly fee.  The second is the length of power cord.  While Nest does give you a lot of length, I simply did not need it all (I'm in a townhome with outdoor outlets nearby where I wanted/needed to mount my cameras).  You have to find a way to tie up the extra power cord and hide it. I used to have a Lorex system that came with a 7 inch monitor, but the video quality was never good enough.  These Nest cameras are incredible. The fact that they seamlessly integrate with the Nest app is also great.  I already had the Next Thermostat, so adding Nest cameras made a lot of sense.
title: Great Cameras

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: mark
content: First of all, I started with ARLO wireless.  Arlo was great for about 3 months, then all went down hill.  Batteries would only last 2 days, then 10 days.  Eventually I stopped using ARLO and gave them away since they were that bad. I decided to try NEST, it was easy to install and set up.  The app works great and has nice clear picture.  I definitely recommend NEST over ARLO.  The worst part about them is there is extra cord wrapped up around the camera.  It would be nice if you could drill a small hole and slide it through, but not possible due to the size of the plug.  You could cut and splice it though. I bought a RING doorbell for my mom.  That system seems to be nice as well, but at this point I think I would stick with Nest.
title: Arlo was great for about 3 months

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: A. Parsons
content: So far, this is the best security camera I have used.  It is 1080p compared to most security companies 720p cameras.  The app works well to notify when the camera spots movement.  The picture is bright and crisp in both daylight and at night.  Would recommend it to anyone considering a security system.  Easy installation.  The prices for the plans are also way more reasonable than other security companies.
title: Excellent quality, affordable peace of mind.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Douglas Lash
content: This camera has a temperature range of -4 to 104F Temperatures in my area regularly go up to 120F so I'm very concerned about this. Setup is a mess.  The iphone setup did not initially work.  It had trouble recognizing the QR code and the bluetooth device never showed up to enable pairing.  Tried the PC setup and that didn't work either, when connected to the PC over USB it did the normal windows thing asking me to set it up as a mass storage device but I was expecting it to ask for drivers or have some type of setup program included with the CAM.  Tried the installation a third time using the iphone again and selected the manual method using the 6 digit code on the back of the CAM.  After a few minutes it connected and is working now.  Video is very good. I previously had a nest thermostat and loved it (was destroyed in a house fire) but I'm not impressed with this CAM. For the money I expected a much easier setup and something much more durable (with temperature).
title: Not impressed with Temperature Range or Setup

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: TJW
content: Nest has really thought this out.  I had the camera up and running within 10 minutes of getting the package.  Mounting it permenantly outside was a piece of cake - the toughest part was getting the self-tapping screws for the metal mount to bite into our wood siding. I'm still tweaking the settings on the camera to prevent false positive notifications, but with the various zones and settings available with their premium service there are plenty of options to tweak. While I originally got this camera thinking it would be cool to check the weather at home - snow mostly, I find that by far the most value is in the alerts.  I have one zone set for the front walk, and one for the driveway.  Nest sends me an alert whenever there is activity in either zone, and it can even differentiate people from vehicles.  I don't believe this service works nearly as well without the cloud service that is an extra change, so that is something to keep in mind. Overall, this is a well thought out, simple, great performing outdoor camera!
title: A great job by Nest!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: AmazonCustomer
content: MUST READ- BAIT AND SWITCH We purchased three of these for our home and they were easy to set up. The cameras were great and images were crystal clear.. for the 30 day trial. The minute we purchased the subscriptions (for $100 for the first camera and $100 for the second two cameras) that all changed. You couldn't make out a face if it was standing 2 feet in front of the camera. Just a bunch of colored pixels. I contacted Nest multiple times and they always had an excuse and were not helpful. First it was that there must have been changes to my internet - the only change was that I purchased the pricey subscriptions. The second excuse was that my internet was too slow.  I have more than enough internet capacity and upload speed than recommended.  I even upgraded my internet, bought an access point /wifi range extender.  The third excuse was that we should've known the image quality would decrease because we were now storing to the cloud (it was stored during the 30 day trial, too).  Wish I would've know this before investing more than $1,000 in this system.
title: Bait and Switch

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: mag
content: Goes offline all the time randomly.  I have put it next to the router and closer then my nest doorbell and it’s still goes offline 2month update: exchanged for another new camera.  While new one was being shipped to me the first one power converter broke. As far as the newer one: same problem. Put it next to modem and still goes offline about ten times a day.  The nest doorbell works great.... kinda
title: Useless.  Offline problems ALL of them have this problem

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Brian Linse
content: I bought my first Drop Cam just before the change to Nest. Drop Cam app was great and I was very happy. Then my second cam was a Nest. Better camera, but I was forced to switch to the Nest App. Crap. Took them over a year, but they finally got it almost as good as the Drop App. Added a third cam. All good. Just added this outdoor cam and was well pleased until all of my notifications stopped working. Support is worthless. All they will do is tell you to uninstall and reinstall the App, which wont fix anything. Then they "escalate" you, which means you've spent an hour of your time for nothing and it will take them three DAYS to get back to you. So now I'm stuck with four cameras, 25 dollars a month for "service", and I have no security cameras - just four sexy webcams. Dont get sucked in like I did. Buy something else if you need real security.
title: Great camera, the worst app and support you can imagine.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: m swink
content: Camera quality great Application is intuitive Product support is horrible Hardware is poor, in use for 2 years and power cable literally disintegrated on outdoor camera,,,, picture attached Spent an hour trying to get someone on phone and their answer is warranty is expired This is obviously a major manufacturing defect and needs to be taken care of. IF YOU SEE THIS BUY RING,,,, BETTER PRODUCT AND SUPPORT!!!!
title: READ THIS!!!!!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Wulfgang
content: This is my fourth Nest Cam, but first outdoor model.  The installation was problematic mainly due to design problems with the supplied cables.  First off, why white?  This sucker stands out like a sore thumb on my new olive green Craftsman house in Idaho.  Admittedly I knew it was white before I purchased it.  I wasn't sure of the size. It Needs choices.  How about black.  The wiring is a whole different kettle of mess.  Fixed length cabling with a clunky connector right in the middle and a whole lot of extra wire that I had to hide in a blank unconnected outdoor outlet box.  Nest will undoubtedly fix these issues or not sell a lot of these cameras and when they do they should offer a decent trade in for these clunkers.  The quality of the picture is as usual terrific.  The ease of wifi connectivity as good as ever.  The form factor needs work.  Big time.
title: Great video, Clunky Form Factor & Cables.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: robert garson
content: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. Nest provides no customer support. I just got finished holding for over an hour. When I bought these cameras I tried to buy cloud storage, called nest aware, as I was leaving for a trip abroad. That is precisely why I bought the cameras and needed storage. I couldn't get this done online so I called and was told that there was new software that had a glitch. I was assured that if I called back in a few days they could take care it. Called two additional times during the following 10 days, held more than 30 minutes each time, and gave up. When I returned from my trip I made contact with Nest customer support. They apologized and gave me 90 days of 10 day storage in return for the trouble that I had. The only problem was they couldn't connect the front door camera to the cloud. It seems important that I know who's been at my front door. I was told that they didn't know why it wouldn't connect to the cloud but I had to be physically where the cameras were to disconnect them from the account, open a new account and reconnect them. We made an appointment to have technical support call me on the day I arrived back home. No call. I called in, held for 30 mins, gave up, called back in, held for 20 more minutes and reached a person. She said she needed to transfer me to someone else but would stay on the line and took my number in case we got disconnected. Well, we got disconnected and I never received a call back. So here I am on hold again. I reached a representative who said I needed to be transferred....I'm out the price of the cameras plus the $480 I paid to have cameras mounted and wires run. Horrible customer service and a product that is not ready for public sale.
title: Horrible customer service and a product that is not ready ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: ej
content: In general i feel very good about the set of outdoor Nestcams. Previously tried a very an expensive installed system from a local company. ‘took a huge loss to have that system removed. The cameras were equivalent to NestCam, but not nearly as compact, attractive or ease in installation & usage… The local company installers didn’t take the time, or include us in deciding the best locations for cameras… NestCams installation & ease of use, far superior. We found the most effective locations. Consequently fewer cameras are needed, and less camera footage to monitor. NestCam software is sometimes very slow in bringing up a screening from a post, but usually not too long. I worry a bit if there was an intruder if cams might be too slow. Right now, they’re a good deterrent… The persons who’d been intruding & stealing from us are now leaving us alone. One complaint: Wanted our cams installed through-the-wall near the camera, not down the wall with an exterior outlet which would make it easy to unplug or possibly remove. A smaller connector or re-connectable one would be better. Installation through-a-wall requires an unnecessarily large hole. Otherwise installation was fairly simple. Thought we would need a new outlet: hired an electrician, but didn’t need one. Software: NestCam software is absolutely superior to the outrageously expensive system I hated & had removed. It might have been appropriate for a business, with time & funds to hire someone to monitor the cumbersome software. Occasionally the NestCam system misses sending a notice when a person has been in the camera’s view. but you can go back & find that. Easy with the dots posted along the time line when there's a person or significant movement in view. There are 5 min intervals on the timeline, making it easy to check a particular time. I receive an email notice with a small pic & time for when the cam note movement. Those are valuable. Some misses, some probably not necessary, but i like having them there as they save time having to look through all the footage. You can use a smart phone or an iPad, but i use my desktop cpu. At first i received daily off-line notices. Adding a second router as a booster has corrected that. We have thicker stucco exterior walls. My old, near capacity, cpu, is most likely the reason the software is sometimes slow. It can take a very long time to see the feed i want to check. A little scary because if there’s a problem i want to see what's going on as quickly as possible. As said that's most likely because of my very old computer... Our cams see better with our porch lights on at night, which is something we have always done anyway, however lights aren't necessary. Our cams are installed higher than suggested as we have a two story house with stairs to our front door. Despite that one cam does a good job of monitoring our front entrance, stairs, driveway & cars, a substantial area. Nest support people have been very helpful & generous.  Previously I thought dealing with a specialized security business would be better. Wrong. The NestCams are much better, easier to more carefully & intelligently install; easier to monitor & deal with all around. I definitely recommend them. I feel fairly certain when i upgrade to a better cpu, the software will run faster which will make checking the feeds quicker.
title: In general i feel very good about the set of outdoor Nestcams

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Zarkoff
content: I have used a 24 Nest camera system for several years with good results until was recently encouraged to migrate to a Google account from the Nest Account.  HUGE MISTAKE!  They can not process a simple card correctly.  They charged the card in full but GOOGLE Pay still thinks there is a problem with the card (any card) so I now have 4 cameras with zero recording and the inability to add NEST Aware recording to them.  With my investment in the system I am stuck and this problem is 2 weeks running and ZERO customer service!!!!  If you already are a Nest account holder DO NOT CONVERT OVER!!!
title: AVOID ALL NEST CAMERAS UNTIL GOOGLE GETS THEIR ACT TOGETHER!!!!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Ole Wurtz
content: This is probably one of the best home security cameras available.  When it comes to ease of use and setting it up, it must be the best..  Two things I'd point out to improve on is the image resolution resolution and the fact that the WiFi module is in the camera and not in the power adapter.  More resolution would make it possible to recognize faces and license plates.  The WiFi module moved from the camera itself to the power adapter would almost always bring the WiFi module closer to the WiFi router, eliminating the need for a WiFi extender, when the camera is too far from the router or on the outside of a garage door being shielded from the WiFi signal from the router.
title: This is currently a 4.5 star product for my application.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: xander
content: as much as I was in love with the indoor nest cam, as disappointed am I in the outdoor one. I mounted it on the overhang roof on the 2nd floor since it is easier for cabling into the attick and getting a better view on what i wanted to monitor. since it is a bit higher up, you can notice it doesnt zoom too well. also it notices cars driving by on the road (nice), but it doesnt see me entering the garage which is much closer in! of course elegant design, but the vision at night is also not as good as it was with the indoor. I had really expected this guy to be the indoor with an outdoor casing, but it is not. One of the downsides of this cam is also that when it is mounted, you can change its angle, of course, but you have to do that manually. it would have been good for an outdoor cam to be remotely adjustable.
title: reasonable, but pricy cam, only for specific uses

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: H0meT3chi3
content: I've been installing and maintaining cameras since my days as a loss prevention employee for a major retail company back in the early 90s. I've seen the progression of cameras from the old black and white tube cameras,video chip, CCD, and now to IP.  I also have experience with the old time lapse VCRs, DVRs and now to cloud based storage and I must say Nest gets it right. I know the price of nest aware is a little steep for residential use but when compared to purchasing and maintaining an in house DVR it puts things a little more in perspective. I also own an original 720p dropcam as well as an indoor nest cam so I can attest to the fact that Nest is continually improving there products. I've had the dropcam for almost 3 years and it continues to function great. The nest outdoor cameras construction quality is as well as any in the industry and the video quality is second to none. I've compared my video stream to some very expensive Cisco cameras and it's equal too if not better. Way to go Nest. Thanks for a great quality product at an affordable price. I will be purchasing another in the very near future.
title: Ahead of the Pack!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Ready to travel
content: My husband ordered this for me for my birthday.  He asked our son to research cameras and he recommended this one.  I work at home in the basement and our dog barks at everything...I wanted to see if someone was at the door and who....before I made the trip upstairs...this camera is amazing. Clear picture, easy installation,  picks up motion coming into our circle...lets me know on my phone or Ipad...will tell you if it is a person...you can talk to them outside...it works at night...it does everything I hoped it would and more...one thing...I am planning to have an electrician come and run the electrical cord through the outside wall and into the house so no one can unplug it and take the camera also so the cords don't show.  We have had lots of free entertainment watching the neighbor kids come over and check it out.  Now they all want one and our neighborhood should be safer.
title: Easy to set up...clear picture

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Rogtuf
content: The picture from the cameras is superb.  The web app is reasonably good, but when you look back at old footage, it does have a habit of jumping back to live view which can be irritating.  The cost of maintaining a 30 day history is quite expensive. However, if you have the unit providing a security view of your property when you are not there and it goes "offline" it does not appear to restore itself.  Our has been offline for 10 days and it will now have to wait until we can get back to the property to turn it off and on again and see if it resets.
title: The web app is reasonably good, but when you look back at old footage

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Jennifer Guerrero
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Our set of Nest outdoor and indoor cams has performed well so far. - Installation was easy, both physically getting the cams in place and getting them linked to the network. - We have full functionality and the ability to monitor our home while away on vacation within just a few minutes - The video and audio quality are very good - The ability to link the camera to home/away conditions based on your phone's location is extremely useful - On the downside, the cameras suffer from short bouts of losing network connectivity, usually on the order of 2-5 minutes, after which they reconnect automatically. I haven't determined if this is due to a weak/intermittent wifi signal, passing interference or something else. Our Crittercam pics: 1-3) Kitties 4) Raccoon 5) Opossum 6) Road Runner Our Crittercam Video: Opossum
title: - Installation was easy, both physically getting the cams in place and ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: GGSM Mobile
content: Let me tell you that if you are not savvy with networking then this is the camera for you. I've bought around 20 security cameras and this one is the top notch. Easy setup. Very good app with no known bug so far and the quality of the camera is great. No false alarm so far. And it looks good too. Many people complain about the subscription fees but I think it is reasonable. Otherwise you would have to manage the storage yourself and that is not very convenient (i.e. constantly removing old file and making sure that the storage is not full)
title: Best security camera I've purchased.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: KB-Boise
content: Knocked off two stars because of Nest lying about the subscription cost. Their site says $100 for the first camera, $50 for each other camera. Even though it does not say it on their site, they now claim this only applies to cameras at the same address. Even after calling they refused to honor the listed price. I was going to purchase at least two more cameras. I will now be looking at other brands. The camera is very easy to install and the video quality is great. The ability to create zones and have notifications is nice as I am able to exclude traffic in the street.
title: Nice camera, deceitful subscription cost.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: M
content: Switched to this from the Ring unit (which btw was horrible). Why I chose to go for Nest over other units is for the simplicity of using it, the software, setup, and the fact that there's 2-way sound. Pros: Easy to set up - it comes with everything you need to install and mount the unit. The software is great, allowing you set up zones, alerts, and all that. The cloud service works wonderfully. Records 24/7 Reconnects on its own if disconnected and alerts you Cons: Night vision is not adequate and very difficult to see faces or anything with minimal light. Cloud service is more expensive than other services
title: So far so good

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: babyju
content: love this camera so far! it came earlier than what I expected, a good thing to start with. the installation was very easy, unpacked, installed app on my iphone, set up account, scan barcode on the camera, and connect to wifi at home. we had to drill only 2 screws to attach the magnet at the top corner of the porch, then secure (shortened) the cable along the wall, and plug into the outdoor outlet, that's it! Things are working out for me in terms of getting notifications on people and higher pitched sounds. One morning a bird flew by my porch window and pecked on the glass and I was notified, things like this I like to be aware of. One of the most important things I like about this device, is that it shows a good length of activity alerted, seconds before the subject/object appeared on camera, so I can see what/who, and seconds after its gone, no lagging on the video quality. cant ask for better than that!
title: excellent security camera with minimal hasle and good quality

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Xian
content: I already had the thermostat so I gave this a try. I really like the features this camera has within the same app.  I only had seen doorbell cams that had microphones to hear whats going on and to speak to people.  So a plus there. Although it has a magnet base to place about anywhere, I do kind of wish the usb  power was tucked in, through or around the base as it would seem more secure that way.  But they do have other outdoor cams where you can't see the cord but they are more expensive. That said it was very easy to install even to some novices to get started. I figured if you need more then a full blown monitored system would be best if that becomes the case.
title: powerful little camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Ashley Sanchez
content: I installed it over my garage door overlooking front driveway. Resolution is great and the night vision is good too. I also purchased yearly subscription that gives me access to the extra features and additional cloud storage. Does have several seconds delay between push notifications after spotting activity in the areas you designate to be alerted. I didn't want to deal with battery replacement on other 1080P cameras that are out there. Took one star off for the bulky power cord. Had to drill through my stucco exterior wall and hole size was larger than I wanted it to be due to the bulky cord. Would have been a full 5 if they made the cord's end slimmer. I also had to move my router a few feet from where it was to improve wifi connection. Low quality wifi signal causes camera to loose connection when movement is captured, so confirm wifi signal strength for area you are thinking of installing.
title: I definitely would recommend and plan on buying a second...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: C. M. Dube
content: Image quality exceeds expectations. Build quality and installation hardware (high strength corrosion resistant screws for instance) is excellent with a clever, flexible magnetic design.  The software is easy to use and intuitive and worked first time (if you're having issues, it's with your router configuration). The NestAware subscription (free for 30 days) is expensive at $100/year but has good features. I went for it but needs improvement.  For instance, the scheduling feature only provides for camera on/off times.  NEST should incorporate independent zones alerts into the software for separate notification of activity.  For instance as a business owner, I'd like zone/notification for the parking area and for a gate entrance (shown in picture)
title: Excellent image quality, design, software and installation

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Jaybird
content: If you want your motion sensor to go bye bye on day 5 then buy this hunk of crap.  If you want some non English speaking jerk to NOT help you, then buy this product.  Typical crap.  When will Americans sell and service products again?  When they do, I'll pay 100% premium. How does NEST expect product to be beneficial when it constantly goes offline.  Laptop and smartphone farther away from router and they are lightning quick.  This thing is junk.
title: Nest should call this their OFFLINE camera.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Golden Goose
content: I only had mine up for about a couple of weeks when it captured my neighbor's truck being stolen around 2 AM.  The only reason I don't rate five stars is that the grainy video of night video or when the foggy picture when there is much moisture.  Be sure to adjust alerts if you place near any plants that are highly susceptible to a lot of movement because of wind.  Otherwise your alerts will clutter your inbox.
title: Quite Usefull

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Sam Seligman
content: This is my third camera and to be honest I use because I have the nest thermostat and having everything in one app is convenient. When it works it works well. However often it misses huge significant moments. Someone at the door, package drop off. If it wasn’t for the ability to scroll through the 25 hours I wouldn’t see things. Picks and chooses when this happens
title: Misses significant moments

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: RyanC
content: This camera system was ok and had potential before Google bought Nest. Now it only works intermittently with lots of network failure time. Plus Google is pushy on requesting info and handling the camera data. Also, the cameras fail at temperature ranges over 94 degrees (actually kills the hardware!) so if you live where its hot be prepared to replace them after a few hot days.
title: Used to be better, fails in high temps

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Ankur Jaiswal
content: This is our 5th Nest Outdoor camera (we have several indoor ones as well). We use it outside and inside for remote viewing and surveillance. The quality of the video is excellent and the app/website features and predictability is outstanding. Installation is easy and setup is a breeze. The power adapter is too large and I just use standard USB out small plug points for these to replace the bulk of the extra long cable. The only problem is that the cost of cloud recording. I have a massive amount of Google drive storage, but still have to pay a lot for the cloud recording. They should just merge the two.
title: 5 and counting...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: JimC
content: Good quality picture day and night.  Motion activates with tree leaves swaying in wind, cars going by, moths at night.  No way to record locally on personal DVR.  Multiple cameras monthly subscriptions add up fast.  I will probably keep the doorbell for now but the cameras go out at the end of my year subscription.  I will not be buying more.
title: Good equipment.  Subscriptions way to pricey.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: zachus
content: I LOVE this cam!! I installed inside my house because I wanted something with this look and the flexibility of the head to move it around. It was so easy to install and it works so much better than any other camera I've had. Plus it's all tied into my Nest stuff and Wink which allows me to get to it from everywhere. I love the AppleTV app so I can just pop it up and see both camera's. I travel a lot to and it's just nice to look in and be able to go back in time. It also gives you a ton controls to so you can setup to what your needs are. So my house is very modern and the white just looks awesome. The chord is long but I just hide behind furniture. I also have the Nest Indoor Cam and I love it to, just depends on your need and room and what fits the best. I have a video on this on youtube reviewing and installing this, search Zachus to watch it.
title: AMAZING!!!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Bill Yohe
content: Cameras worked great I have 5 installed. One camera started showing a pink hue and I researched it and it was a Pixel issue. When I contacted Nest and Amazon, the warranty had expired. The other 4 are still working good.
title: Camera went bad after 2 years

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: ERINN
content: I purchased 1 indoor and 2 outdoor Nest Cams. Over all the cams are amazing and they do the job. Home SECURTY. My indoor one is used just to see my little people are getting off too school on time. To ask my dog to get off the couch. Busted.. :) and if by Any chance someone breaks in to my home. I live in a very nice area. And the only problems we get out here is people flowing the FedEx, and UPS trucks to see where things are being delivered and after the boxes are delivered, Thieves take the boxes right off your porch. So its nice to have this security cams to be able to help the delivery companies and our purchested product... So like I said the nest cams do the job. Amazing product. The price is expensive, but you get what you pay for.
title: Very Happy

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Louis
content: Okay, after my experience with a standard PTZ camera I purchased, I was expecting a few hours and a lot of struggles to get this camera online. Nope. The hardest part was scanning a QR code. Then, it was registered to my account and online. I didn't have to open any ports on my router or at my cable modem/router (from my ISP) to bridge mode or anything... I just scanned the QR code and was online and working. The Nest Aware is great at spotting only people. I have no bandwidth problems seeing my cam to 1080p only on my 30mbps cable Internet. The night vision is great. The packaging is great! It keeps things very simple to install.
title: So easy to setup and install

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: swguyUSA
content: Setup in the first place was difficult and confusing. Now trying to simply change my wifi network settings, I have to go through EVERY setup step AGAIN. Be warned that if you don't take a photo of the QR code and Serial # on your camera, you'll have to go outside, get on a ladder, take off the skin and start the setup again from scratch. The app is SLOW and can't find wifi even though you're right by the router. So, an hour later I am still trying to update my wifi network. NEST is no Apple when it comes to ease of installation or easy User Interface. They make everything way too difficult, and in the end it just DOESN'T work.
title: Way too complex to change wifi network!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Larry M Berkelhammer
content: The camera works fine for video but it is impossible to converse with anyone who comes to the door. There is almost a 10-second delay in voice communication. You press the talk button to talk and then release it to hear the response. But the person at the door doesn't hear what I said until almost 10-seconds later.  If the person at the door manages to stay around that long and responds verbally, there is another long delay before I hear their response. Therefore, the two-way talk function is totally impractical and unusable.
title: Two-way talk function useless

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: RedRebelChick
content: I replaced an older, non-HD camera system (2) above our driveway.  I only needed ONE Nest cam and the wide angle view is really nice. The picture is nice and it is nice to view for any internet connected device. I did have to install a WiFi booster in my network as getting through so many walls, the WiFi signal was crap.  Now it is full bar! Being able to set the zones and tell by the colors in the playback as to which zone was triggered by movement is NICE! Very sensitive to sound.  I had to turn the mic way down on this as it was picking up wind and airplane noise. We are very impressed with the quality and setup of the camera and software.
title: Picture quality is awesome.  Night vision is great.  Very impressed with this camera.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Philip Sheng
content: This product is a ripoff. Unless you sign up for the monthly subscription this camera is pretty much worthless. You will only get a notification if there is motion and you need to open the app to see it live. No recordings are stored only a screen shot of the past motion. This makes me not want to purchase the door cam or the thermostat by nest. NEVER ANOTHER NEST PRODUCT AGAIN. I purchased a $25 Wyze camera and it is 100 times better. I rather have 6 of those than one of this nest cam.
title: BE AWARE monthly subscription needed, rip off product. Better off with Wyze

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Apollyon
content: I really liked this while the service was free. The integration in the home app is great and the picture is also great. BUT $100 a year minimum and $50 for additional cameras on a cloud based service is not worth it. EDIT : - 2 stars after using it w/o the service for a few months it is 100% useless there is no way to record or take a picture (besides screenshots on your phone) in the app and it just randomly locks up and wont refresh. For 100-150+ a year you could get a local NAS and buy a new 4-6TB drive every year for those prices and save a lot more than 10 days worth over the years not to mention then the feed isn't owned by google.
title: Cloud service not include and excessively expensive.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Ben
content: I was looking for outdoor cameras after an attempted break-in earlier this year. We live in Minnesota, so I was worried that the temperature operating range on nearly all cameras would not be suited for a Minnesota winter. From reading and talking to neighbors, I realized that a wired camera was the way to go (over a battery powered one). I was thinking that I’d have to go with the much more expensive Nest IQ outdoor, but read somewhere that despite the regular  nest outdoor’s rating only going down to -4 F it actually worked fine in colder weather.
