I went ahead and bought several of these cameras and am happy to say that they are working just fine despite spending the last several days far below the operating limit and handled last night at -28 without any obvious problem. I’m pretty impressed and feel good about my purchase.
title: Don’t worry about the cold.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Trickle_down
content: Can't say enough about this camera and it's associated nest recording service.  We have 4 cameras, they are easy to set up and work flawlessly.  The AT&T wired internet that we have is quite slow ( 25mps down and 5mps up) but the cameras still work great. We're unable to upload at full bandwidth because of our internet but they perform extremely well at the "low" setting. We highly recommend this camera.
title: Great camera and Nest recording

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: J Hall
content: We have two Nest cams and one of them works great almost all the time.  My only real complaints with that one is it's in our front yard and every time a car passes by or headlights shine on our yard, we get alerts.  We're at the intersection of two roads, so this happens very often.  I typically ignore any alerts that happen after dark for this reason, and a lot of the alerts during the day are simply a car driving by or somebody walking on the sidewalk.  I can't seem to get the camera to angle further towards the house, or I'd just do that. Overall, it's great though, to be able to be on the road and see your own house.  It makes it very easy to check for visitors, or packages that I am expecting, etc. For Nest Aware, although I have two cameras, I only bought a subscription for the outside one.  My inside camera is pretty much for emergencies only, so I'd have plenty of time by default to get clips of any activity I'd need to save; no need for a history there.  Outside, I sprung for ten days history.  30 days seems excessive, since you always have the ability to mark and download clips from the Nest Home website.  If I don't know I need a clip for ten days, then something bad has happened anyways. I enjoy that these plug in, although I almost wish they had some kind of redundancy to accommodate power failures or internet failures.  We had an internet outage a week ago where fiber installers cut our line while installing somebody else's, and then didn't get back out to fix it for 24 hours, so we lost a day of monitoring and service.
title: ... have two Nest cams and one of them works great almost all the time

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Nezha Roide
content: I have had these cameras for almost a year and have changed routers/modems several times but they both still kick off line at least tow times a week and stop recording. For the cost they should be more reliable and sensitive to modem signals but these are not. I would NOT buy Nest again. By the way their server's go down a an regular basis too. We We were trying to adjust the thermostat last week and it was off line due to server outage in all of LA and NY when I google why. Ridiculous. There guys are making too much money to be that unreliable.
title: Not So good: Unreliable and always going off line

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: B Mac
content: We've set 2 of these up.  Tips:  Don't even try to set it up remotely, it doesn't ever work.  Just plug it into your PC and setup takes about 30 seconds.  Then take it outside and mount it on the porch or house.  It comes with a free 30 day trial to Nest to be able to watch past recordings, which we later subscribed to.  It will ping my phone whenever it senses motion, which is nice when we're not home (to see a delivery driver, for instance).  I love being able to check the house when we're away!!  Worth every penny!
title: The NEST camera is an AWESOME addition to our home

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Marmie2
content: I've had this about 6 weeks now. It works great. The Nest Aware app is flaky. MANY times people have been on my porch and the camera didn't even register it. I only know because I scroll through the video each day. Here's an important tip!!  Before you install the camera, write down the entry code on the back of the mounting plate. You need access to the QR code on the camera or mounting plate or the entry code on the mounting plate in order to update your router (I got a new router). I found this out the hard way and had to get a ladder to reach the camera for the QR code. Fortunately for me, the camera was close enough to the new router to recognize it without having to completely remove it from the soffit/attic where it was wired and take it closer to the router per the phone support person I called. BAD design.
title: It works great. The Nest Aware app is flaky

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Charles
content: The hardware is great and the installation was pretty easy. I really would like this device to work well, but the iPhone app leaves a lot to be desired. I have two zones set up, one for the yard and one for the street. The GREEN zone for the yard covers from my front door to just short of the street, and includes my driveway. The RED zone includes the street. I have notifications ON for the GREEN zone and OFF for the RED zone. This should give me notifications when someone comes into my yard, but not when a car goes down the street. (It works great this way for my RING doorbell!) Yet, the Nest app sends me notifications for the GREEN zone when a white vehicle goes down the street during the day, or a vehicle with headlight on goes down the street at night. The street is in the RED zone. I also get notifications for the GREEN zone if a passing cloud causes the front yard to suddenly get darker or brighter. I get notifications in the GREEN zone when leaves blow into the yard from palm trees across the street. In short, I get way too many spurious notifications from the app. It's like the Outdoor Cam that cried wolf.  My Ring Pro Doorbell and app have a sensitivity setting, but otherwise app setup is very similar. Either the recognition algorithm with the Ring doorbell is much better than the Nest Outdoor Cam, or the sensitivity setting makes the difference. I just hope Nest fixes the app soon, because all of the spurious notifications are nothing but a nuisance at this point.
title: Great Hardware, inadequately implemented software in iPhone app. Can't wait for the app to improve!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Ozzy
content: Quality of the video is very poor. It was disappointing. Even in bright light you can see a lot of pixelation and in case you are wondering my internet connection is very fast. It also adds audio issues (very annoying) when playing back on ALL IOS devices. No fix as of yet.
title: Disappointed

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Occam
content: Packaging was put together extremely well.  Everything was easily accessible and understandable.  The installation instructions were clear and well written, and the actual installation process was very easy.  Nest Aware, their online recording / smart alert system, is super simple to use and configure.  It is $5.00/m for the first camera and $3.00/m for the other one - and it keeps 24/h recordings for 5-days straight.  The notifications are very cool - it will differentiate between dogs barking, people talking, and will understand if a person is in view or just an animal. The one thing I didn't like is that the two-way talk/listen functionality is only one way at a time.  So, if I want to say something to someone over the camera, I can't hear anything they are saying while I'm talking. It also doesn't record any audio while you're talking through the camera.  Considering how advanced audio/video technology is today, this is kind of a ridiculous issue to have on an otherwise awesome product.  Still think it deserves 5 stars though.
title: Great Product.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: J. Schaub
content: Summary: The video quality has been excellent, and the phone app is outstanding.  I like it so much I'm planning on purchasing two more. Features: I love that it has a microphone and speaker, but probably not as much as my kids do.  They love yelling at each other at the front door now..  The video quality is excellent, and I like that it has "AUTO" for quality so I don't have to manually try to adjust video quality to match my internet connection.  The zones work great for limiting alerts, and I like that I can ignore any alert that doesn't say "Your camera thinks it spotted a person".  I don't really care about anything but people showing up in my alerts. User Interface: The website interface and the iPhone app have been excellent.  I really like the timeline view on the phone and the ability to easily watch the events that triggered the alerts.  It's easy and intuitive to scroll through the timeline to find events.  Like: are the kids home from school? did the UPS guy really just throw my package like that?  The web interface for downloading clips worked great, and made it easy if you ever want to keep that cute moment or need video evidence to publicly shame those neighborhood punk kids who smashed your halloween pumpkin. Installation: I decided to place it above the front door, and spent a bunch of time researching the best way to plug it in without breaking fire code, and make it look nice.  It looks like running low voltage through the exterior wall of the home is OK, so I drilled a 7/8" hole in the stucco above my door and fished the USB cable through the wall.  I then ran the cable around the door trim down to floor level where I mounted the DC converter to the wall.  I also cut the A/C power cord and put a new plug on it to avoid having a big mess of extra cable wound up next to my front door.  I'm fairly happy with the install, and with a little patch work and paint, it isn't hardly noticeable. Misc: I've talked with some of my friends who have more traditional video security systems.  They rave about local storage, battery backups, etc.  I really am happy with this level of security and find the cost and the convenience of setup and installation (which were my barriers to getting a traditional security camera system) were exactly what I needed to jump in. Complaints: * Wish the website "home.nest.com" didn't use flash for the video playback. * I occasionally get inconsistent alerts on my iPhone.  Wife's phone will beep, but mine is silent * Temperature rating up to 104 F.  I live in Arizona where 104 F happens at 9 am in the summer time.  I'm not sure if I should chance getting another camera until I have a chance to see how this one behaves in the summer.  I'm betting that it just won't do 1080p in the heat.  My camera stays at 720p in AUTO anyway (I assume because of WiFi signal), and I'm happy with the picture quality there.  I would be very disappointed if it dropped to the lower 360p in the heat.
title: Front Door Camera: security and ability to see when kids come and go

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Ray
content: This Google outdoor camera has great picture quality. The motion detection feature works well, it does take some adjusting so that it's not picking up close flying insects. The night vision works pretty well. Where I have it mounted in a corner, the night vision sensor does focus a little too much light on the wall. A more open mounting location would help it work better. There is an known issue with speaking through the camera that is related to my Samsung Galaxy phone. The audio is barely audible, so if this is an important feature to you and you have a Samsung Galaxy phone you may want to see if the issue has been resolved before purchase. Overall it works great and setup instructions are easy to follow.
title: Great picture quality

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Jose Figueroa
content: I got these as my first ever home cameras minus the nest hello. After installation these things are pretty great. I haven't had any issues to date so far. You do have to pay monthly/annually for the cloud storage called Nest Aware, I was aware of this before purchase so no surprise. They come with everything you need to install them minus if you are installing them too far from an electrical outlet. I had to add one in my attic for one of the cameras. Nightvision and day quality are pretty great also.
title: Wonderful Cameras

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Mikey
content: Generally, I’m happy with the cameras. Installation was pretty easy. However, I’m struggling to get the motion detection zones set. It is still picking up motion  way outside the zones. I’m getting too many video clips and notifications from false  detection such as cars passing, bushes moving in the breeze, and my flag moving in the breeze. I just figured out that you have to turn on the space is feature to see all your cameras at once. Love this feature now.
title: Great cameras. Disappointed with zone feature.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Brent Farris
content: My brother has been raving about his nest cameras for about a year now and after a few break-ins around the neighborhood and a couple of vehicle break-ins of our own I decided to invest in one of the cameras. It is been literally the best investment I've made in years! It makes me feel good to know that I have eyes on my home and my property while I'm asleep, working,  or gone on the weekends. My favorite feature is being able to save clips that I find valuable or completely funny. I also like having the ability to talk through the camera and that it connects to my Wi-Fi and plugs into the wall so I never have to worry about replacing the batteries or having them die when I'm gone. And at $10 a month, it's completely affordable to keep that peace of mind which honestly is priceless
title: Best Investment in Peace of Mind

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: SimonA
content: This is how things ought to work! The camera is of excellent quality.  The packaging includes everything you would need, including the best set of screws I have ever seen in a kit like this!  They appear to be stainless steel!!!  And they include the wire clamps as well :) Yes, I know you have to purchase the online service to be really useful, but given how well the apps work, I feel it is worth the price.  I am disappointed that a second unit requires a second subscription (albeit at half price). Video performance is good.  It doesn't look like 1080p at times, but I realize they are trying to compress the upload like crazy, a fact I appreciate given limited upload bandwidth speeds current ISP's give you.
title: Like it a lot.  Love the app even more!!!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: C. Brendel
content: I have three indoor Nest Cams, Nest thermostat, and two Nest Protects. Adding these two outdoor Nest Cams was as simple as expected. The cabling and housing are high quality and the picture comes through nice and crisp. One thing I wish Nest would do is either lowest the cost of the cameras in general or lower the cost for the est Aware subscription. Obviously this isn't a major barrier for me, but I could see others hesitate. All-in-all, I like the cameras which certainly beat having an expensive monthly security system. The biggest downside to using this as your primary security system is internet connectivity. Thankfully, my ISP provider is pretty reliable and we have nosey neighbors.
title: Good Cameras, little over-priced.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: JRG
content: The camera was great until about 6 months ago.  After Nest was bought by Google, things have been the worst!  I have motion zones defined, but it won't detect a person or car walking through the zones.  Nest support has been terrible and hasn't been able to figure out why.  Nest community bulletin boards are filled with examples of many others having the same problems!  At this point I would not recommend and I am seriously considering getting a different camera
title: Great at first - now won't detect motion

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Bob K
content: We've had our Nest camera for about 6 months and mostly love it.  One big issue is camera would go off-line several times, every single day.  Very annoying.  We were using a rented Xfinity/Comcast router that was literally 20 ft away from the camera so I thought it had to be some kind of problem with the camera.  Then, for other reasons, I replaced the Xfinity rented router with a Motorola MG7700 I purchased on Amazon.  3 weeks since I replaced the Xfinity router and the camera has not gone off-line once.  Problem solved.
title: Camera going off-line?  Problem solved.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Brian B.
content: The cameras look and work well. The image quality is good (1080P with no digital zoom has its limits). Installation was as easy as possible and everything was up an running in less than an hour. The software is truly excellent. NestAware notifies you when it sees movement or recognizes people and allows you to set zones in its view for it to care about so it won't notify you every time the neighbors pull in. It shows a timeline with activity highlighted so you can quickly and easily look back and find the interesting bits without wasting your time scanning through unnecessary video. Google went above and beyond to make sure that the kit was complete, clean, and thoroughly labeled. If it seems packaging is a silly thing to rave about, wait until you see it. Each component was individually boxed and labeled with simple instructions and graphics.
title: Good product, great software and packaging. Five Stars. No Question.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Code Monkey
content: Love these cameras.  Was aware of the subscription model for longer recording before I bought - but trying to record on your own is a PIA and it will cost you time and money too. So the fact that they offer the service in my opinion is great.  The viewing and history tool works well and will show you snapshots at key activity in the timeline.  Sometimes I get frustrated with the UI a bit (I wish there was a BACK button like a browser) but nothing that’s a huge downer. We have WiFi over LTE at our property and the network is on a subnet - so to setup our own cameras would have required paying for a dedicated IP address.  Nest cameras don’t have that limitation so that was a key selling point for me.
title: Nice integration - great features

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Douglas P.
content: Easy to install/setup and for the price, I like it the best out of the several different brands I tested.  You could spend more for better quality video but it works well for what I need/want.  Again, it's at a price point that makes it worth while for the DIY'ers out there.  I have added more Nest (thermostat is awesome) products to go with the 3 cameras and have been very happy.  Monthly fee isn't bad for 7 day coverage.
title: Great DIY surveillance camera.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Desert Tom
content: I bought one indoor and one outdoor camera.  I didn't want to plug this into an outdoor outlet because it could be easily stolen.  I plugged it into an outlet in my attic by my HVAC unit and ran the cord to the ceiling in my entryway outside.  This gives me a view of people at my front door and of the street immediately in front of my house.  Since it is a small entryway, the 130 degree camera is much smaller angle.  I drilled a hole in the ceiling large enough for the USB attachment which is much bigger hole need for just the wire.  I mounted it about 7ft above the ground.  So far, the quality is good, but somebody standing at the front door seems a bit far away.  I am pretty happy with the camera and the software, but not too thrilled about  paying the monthly fee for the subscription.  I did find a 3rd party app called Blue Iris that looks promising if you want to store data locally without a subscription.  It does not run on a Mac, so it isn't going to work for me (search youtube on how to set it up with Nest.)  There is a one time fee for the Blue Iris software and a trial version to make sure you like it.  For the Nest software, the timeline is a great feature to find motion on the video.  It would be 5 stars if I could record locally...or use my storage in the cloud with iCloud or OneDrive
title: I like it, but not thrilled about the subscription.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Monse
content: The most beautiful camera I ever buy. Day or Night kick ass but you can save video clip up to 1hr up 7 clip after 30 days you can't not return, but why returned for it the most wonderful camera 🚨 alert after 30 days the camera record for 3hrs only you cannot save video or any clip after 30 days you cannot I repite you cannot do anything in computer in your iPad in your phone is nothing to touch YOU JUST SEE WHAT THE CAMERA SEE. unless you pay $300.00 dollars a year and then if you pay the $300.00 a year or $30 a month you can control you camera 🚨 alert but only the last 3hrs that the camera record that it..... I HAVE ALL THE TB STORAGE THAT I NEED AND I CAN BUY MORE WHY PAY FOR STORAGE..... SORRY NO TANKS
title: BEST CAMERA DON'T BUY IT IF YOU DON'T WANT TO PAY $300.00 DOLLARS FOR ONE YRS TO RECORD NOTING YOU JUST WANT A CAMERA

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: jim andreae
content: This is my fourth camera for the house and we love them!  Super Easy to install and great quality. Bought my first nest camera over 3 years ago (different model) and it’s been running 24/7 ever since. Have had this one outside for a little over 4 months and the picture is great. The only thing that worries me is that it is a magnetic mount and I was a little worried someone might just walk off with it so I mounted it just a little higher than the avg person could reach. Also bought a couple for work. Love that is also has sound and you can speak thru it
title: Great video and easy to install

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: ShadyCrewin
content: Only reason that I am giving this 4 starts instead of 5 is the price of the cloud service. After spending so much on cameras I hate having to spend 10 (or in my case 20 for 3 cameras) a month for storage for 10 days. I wish either there was a smaller package, or there wasn't an additional fee for each additional camera. You save money paying yearly instead of monthly, but I can just Willy Nilly hand over hundreds of dollars for recording, I already spent savings money on the cameras just to monitor my home. Either way, the camera is good. I need to flush out wifi issues in my house, but that is not a defect of the camera. The notifications to my phone are great, and the live streaming is nice at times. I have the Nest thermostat, and love it, so it's no surprise that I love the Nest cam outdoor unit.
title: Quality Nest Product.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: King Solomon
content: It is very hard to see anything, faces and objects are blurred at a distance of 5 feet during the day. Trying to zoom in makes it even worse. I cannot imagine how horrible the vision will be outdoors at 10 feet distance to see anyone walk by. I'm returning the product.
title: faces and objects are blurred

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Ashley
content: Camera is reliable and high quality.  My only complaint would be that a subscription is required for some functionality and that you must log on from a computer to do a few things (save video clips,  set activity zones,  etc.) I like that it can customize my notifications even based on if I am away or home,  but wish I could set to only notify me when a person is spotted instead of just motion (the notifications do specify which though.) Otherwise I've been pleased with this purchase.  I feel more secure with the ability to see my property in real time from anywhere while away.  The video quality is decent no matter what the conditions,  but I can't speak for the audio quality since I have the sound off  (some states have specific laws regarding audio recording so I play it safe.)
title: Worth spending a little extra

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Matthew Hill
content: Setup is easy. Video quality is great. The sound seems fine but I honestly didn't know it had the capability so its nice enough. My Wi-Fi struggles with the stucco walls of our house so occasionally I lose connection. I like the zones you can set up but it occasionally doesn't alert me about people in the zone. Overall I am satisfied. Next time I have some extra cash I want to add a second outdoor camera for more visibility.
title: Easy setup, great video quality.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Brian Leverone
content: Love the product, quality is great, but Google had changed their privacy settings to let all the would-be Intruders know when you are watching them! Why would they change their software to let others know when you, the property owner, is watching his or her own preprty? Who knows, bit it sucks.  They changed the game and didn't tell their customers.  I want my money back!
title: Google is taking over the world, and now your property!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Brie
content: I purchased the Nest outdoor camera back in the summer. I had another brand for 2 years and had nothing but problems with it going off line and losing connection. After researching and reading reviews of the Nest Outdoor camera I purchased one. I love this camera, the quality is excellent. The features are far beyond what I had expected. I highly recommend it and will be purchasing more in the future.
title: Love This Camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Melissa
content: The only main gripe I have, is that you will need a subscription in order to fully utilize the features that this outdoor security camera is capable of. I loved the Nest Aware features, but wish that I researched other cameras first. Subscription is just too pricey. I just bought the lesser one offered ($50.00 a year). So far, so good. Found out that other similar cameras (like Ring) have subscriptions for less. But other than that, love the camera. ***It (camera) does disconnect once in a while. It says Wifi connection is weak, but far from the case. I check often and our wifi is always full bars. I even bought a wifi extender and keep the camera on its own band, and other devices on 5GHz. But it still goes off and notification states either weak signal, power outage, or someone unplugged it 🤷‍♀️
title: Subscription required for full features

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Sean
content: Expensive, but very high quality and easy to use. You are not really buying the camera as much as you are buying into the Nest ecosystem.  I would not recommend this to anyone not considering the cloud service too. The Nest Aware service is the big value added of this product.  The recording is sold, payback is easy and timelines very easy to find events that were recorded.  You can draw zones and set alerts customized for each zone on each camera. The installation hardware is where you can find cut corners for most consumer products, but not here. Well thought out, and the product and packaging reflect that. Love the people detection feature, where you can set alerts for when humans enter the picture, but I wish you could set it only for people detected in one zone as opposed to any seen on camera. I expect that, and other cool features to be added to the"aware" cloud recording service in time. New stuff has been added in the year I have owned Nest cameras.
title: Pricy quality

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Travis
content: As others have stated this camera worked great during the 30-day trial period. Now that I have subscribed my cameras go black at random times, scrolling through clips is constantly met with a busy wheel, and finding clips is almost impossible at times. Customer service is the worst!!! Plan on chatting for 2hrs before they tell you they can't help.
title: Worthless over time. Nest Aware is a joke.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Braveheart
content: Great picture daytime and night. I do have two 100 watt fluorescent fixtures mounted on either side of the garage door and the camera in the middle. I am about 45 feet away from the wifi router 2.4ghz thru one inside wall plus the garage door. The signal has 3 bars sometimes two. There are days when the camera losses the signal many times, at a span of about 1-2 minutes. It seems to happen more at night. There are other days or nights when it may lose signal only a few times. Maybe I need to put a booster signal in the garage. I have yet to look further into this. But will update if i find a solution that works.
title: Great picture daytime and night

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: primarycolor
content: I purchased 3 in total and installed them about 8 to 9 months ago, in November and December 2017. They are off life too often. There was a power outage here in Los Angeles last night. 2 of 3 cameras are still off life after more than 14 hours. And, I called NEST support 30 mins ago and still I am waiting on the line. This product is pretty pricy. Outdoor cameras are usually installed high near roof. It is much problem when NEST customer support website's only advise is  "connect your camera to your computer." This product has a serious wifi connection problem. After using this camera over 9 months, I do not recommend this to no one.
title: This product is pretty pricy. Outdoor cameras are usually installed high near ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: J White
content: Awesome. I'm going to buy another.
title: So awesome.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: High Caliber Glass
content: This is my second Nest cam, the first being the indoor version. I absolutely LOVE my Nest cams. For my specific needs, they're perfect. I've posted a couple different clips from both cameras on public bulletin boards, and I've seen a handful of replies that remark on how clear the picture is and the width of coverage I get from the 130 degree lens. One person said she has an Arlo system, and  is going to make the switch to Nest. Also, everyone- including myself- is very surprised at the sensitivity and clarity of the built in microphone. I can hear (and understand!) a conversation between people 1/2 a block away! I think these cameras are the bomb, put simply. There is a fee of $5 (and up)/month PER CAMERA to be able to go back 10 days o (Up to 30 days) and review/create clips. Let that be understood now, so you're not surprised by it. There are no extra hidden fees, or BS like that. They cut it straight. Customer service is stellar, too.
title: One of the best cameras on the market. Period.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Michael
content: Overall quality is good, and easy to install as long as there is an outlet close to where you’re putting it. As far as picture quality with zoom I would expect to get better than a 3 megapixel camera with the cost of this. The motion detection is so so, but if you pay for the nest aware it does work better. But having to pay more each month just to use it is also a downside. I’d definitely shop around before buying this camera
title: Quality product with more bad than good

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: J Mason
content: I was frustrated with this purchase and this company because I feel I paid top dollar for the equivalent of a few basic wifi cameras that then required me to pay an annual annuity of $100 for camera 1 and $50 each for Cameras 2 and 3 to get video history.  So to get 10 days of video history to review I need to fork over $200 a year for the next 10 years of use?  So I get the double whammy of 1) spending a lot of money to buy wifi cameras, and then 2) spending $2,000 over 10 years to get any real benefit from the cameras. Buy an alternative solution that is complete out of the box in terms of providing video history without the requirement that you fund Next's profits for the years to come. If you don't have a problem paying Next an annuity through their Next Aware subscription to unlock features that should be included with the product out of the box, these cameras are for you.
title: Expensive Nest Aware Subscription Required to Get Full Benefit out of these Security Cameras

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Stephen Geiger
content: These units are great when they work they have horrendous connective abilities, if the power goes out, you usually have to delete the camera reinstall it. They’ve gotta come up with  better connectivity If you have poor Wi-Fi signals outside of your home don’t even bother.  I added Wi-Fi boosters and enhancers and it worked great for months until the power went out and I had to reset them all again and every time the power goes out I have to reset them all again.  I can run my Roku way easier outside the house in the garage with less to no issues easier then these cameras  Good luck
title: Poor Connectivity

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: TexARC, aka A.Ron Carmichael
content: I own 5 of these and Nest just arbitrarily changed the feature regarding a light on the camera. Used to be able to turn it off so that would-be burglars could not see the camera in the dark. Nest (owned by Google apparently) decided to do away with this so that the camera now has a telltale light on all the time, day and night, so a trespasser can see the camera and avoid it, thus making the cameras much less useful.  I WILL NOT buy another one, and will likely replace all of the ones I have (and eliminate the monthly fees!), although I suppose some black fingernail polish deftly applied over the light might work.  STUPID move by Nest.
title: Downgrade in review due to STUPID Nest policy change.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: linkstorinks
content: Hasn't lived up to the expectations yet and continues to disconnect from the wi-fi constantly to the tune of 30+ times a month. loading is near impossible to go back and review video. When it is connected it works well though. There might be better options now without a monthly subscription as well. This camera is nearly worthless without the subscription as it has basically no ability to go back and is strictly a live feed if not in a paid subscription.
title: There might be better options now without a monthly subscription as well

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Bee
content: Does everything I was hoping for! My only gripe (aside from having to pay extra for their monthly service) is that I can't talk through the app and listen through it at the same time. It won't continue recording audio...  it only shows video. If I need to shout at an intruder, I want the audio recording to continue! Also, the speaker on the camera is REALLY quiet. You basically have to shout into the app to get it to play on the camera at a reasonable volume. If you plan to mount your camera near something loud, forget about that feature altogether.
title: Does everything I was hoping for! My only gripe ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Kurt P.
content: The nest outdoor cam is worth the cost and also worth the newly reduced priced subscriptions for Nest aware. I had a ring doorbell and will be replacing it with the nest hello once it comes out, the advantage of having continuous recording with Nest is head and shoulders above what my experience was with a 30 second clip from Ring. Although some what challenging to figure out where to plug them in since they must be hardwired, it’s nice not have having to worry about charging batteries  like I have to with my ring doorbell. I’m fully on board with the nest ecosystem I now have two outdoor cameras, the thermostat E,  and have pre-ordered the nest hello. Highly recommended!
title: Happy with Nest

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Alan A. Cluff
content: Recent software update disabled status light control.  Picture is now terrible as it reflects off of window which camera is behind.  Criminals can also now see where my camera is.  Terrible decision Google!
title: Don’t buy! Google has too much control over config.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: daniel
content: Bought two of these little units to replace some cheaper cameras I had.  Love the 5 day recording however, I installed both units on the corner of our building next to a power box and found that all the extra cabling was a big downside to this unit. I had over 20' that I had to secure from dangling and honestly looking very unattractive.  I did look for a shorter cord, but the unique cabling didn't allow any alternatives and Nest doesn't provide any options. Both units are about 12 inches apart on separate surfaces. We are notified of lost camera signal an average of 3 times per day, never at the same time. We had Comcast install a signal strengthener even though the units are only about 15 ft away, it made no difference. We have checked the signal and it is 5 bars everywhere around the units. The units feel very durable and the quality of video when it is working is great, but the issues we had on the installation and the signal loss only give this 2 stars
title: Dropped signal and recording multiple times daily.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: J. Stoltz
content: I replaced 2 older DropCams with this 2-pack of outdoor Nest Cams. One of the DropCams was in an weather-proof enclosure that produced some glare with the infrared at night. The other DropCam sat outside "naked" for over a year through rain and snow without any issues other than some clouding of the lens when it got really wet. These made-for-outdoor Nest Cams are very well executed from the packaging to the installation. I put up both in about 5 minutes each. The magnetic mounts make for nearly infinite adjustability and very easy installation. The 130-degree view is great and the picture quality is what I expected from a 1080p camera. Night visibility is awesome. If you're not familiar with Nest Cams, the app is great and intuitive. I subscribed to the 10-day monitoring. You can make and share clips using their app.
title: Finally an Outdoor Nest Cam - and it doesn't disappoint!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Jessica
content: This is by far the best thing we have ever bought for our home, besides the dyson vacuum haha. This camera has a wide wide picture so we only needed one to cover the whole front of our home. We will probably sign up the the coverage every month because you can go back and look at what happened 5 days ago(but you get a free month trial of that). The camera only records when it sees motion, sound, dog barking, or person. It picks up every little thing and can distinguish between a person or a cat. I give this 5 stars. Picture quality is perfect night and day!!!
title: Perfect investment

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Gary
content: Extremely pleased.  However, I'm not at all surprised.  I had, in fact, purchased another brand of camera that I had to return because it was faulty.  It would not keep a connection to my router more than 30 seconds.  As I had a Nest Smoke Detector at another home, I decided to purchase the Nest Cam Outdoor camera.  I'm very glad I did. Now, I don't DO heights, therefore, I hired the ladder work done by a contractor who is handling some other household repairs for me.  The entire installation was done in less than thirty minutes including drilling, climbing into the attic and running the wiring. I STRONGLY recommend this camera.  I've been around the block many, many times and have determined that you get what you pay for!
title: Outstanding product.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Puxatawney Phil
content: So far it seems ok.  I had to troubleshoot some network issues, but after that it wasn't hard to install. There are some things with the software I'm not so excited about.  I want to be able to save videos to my computer, or delete junk videos from the cloud,  and that's not an option. The description made it sound like it saves continuous data.  You can view live stream video, but it only saves motion triggered events.
title: Terrible wifi range

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: A.T.
content: This Nest security cam set is phenomenal and we truly do not know what we did before having security cameras at our house! The video and the sound quality is superb, and we've had an easy time using the app to make "clips" of certain footage when necessary. It's important to note that you'll have to buy a subscription with each camera in order to have the footage record, but they now offer a cheaper $50/year option which we chose. Highly recommend!
title: and we've had an easy time using the app to make "clips" of certain ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Brendan W.
content: The decision to remove control over status lights on these is terrible.  They should spend time fixing the web browser version of the video feed and less focus on hobbling their own user experience.  We own half a dozen of these and now there’s a light on in our baby’s room and thieves know whether they’re being recorded or not.  This is the result you get when marketing and PR make product design decisions.
title: Recent update removes status light control no longer recommend

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Lola
content: I'm stuck between a rock and a hard place.  I'm not happy with this camera.  While the audio and video are great, utilizing Nest Aware's service is a huge waste of time and money.  If you cannot sit and review footage minute by minute, you may miss hugely important things.  For example, I have had both people and animals walking into defined zones on my property, yet the camera does not register them at all.  Now if you want it to detect every car that drives by, or hawk screeching (yes, it notes those sounds, but apparently not much else). After having me clear cache/cookies and reset zones, and it not fixing the problem, they claim these are glitches and to mount/unmount cameras.  The problem with this is that unless you've had the time to review and download every second of footage before doing so, you lose it.  When you've got weeks of footage you've yet to go through, and you cannot even "potentially" fix the problem by rebooting the system, this is a huge inconvenience and completely unacceptable. We used this camera to keep an eye on our property while out of town - it was upon returning that we discovered it wasn't flagging such obvious motion.  It was only when I spotted someone on my property through a window, and then checked the Nest Cam to note that Nest Aware didn't even register the person as being there, that we discovered this HUGE problem.  We now wondering what else we missed while we were away. Oh - and without the Nest Aware service, this camera is even more useless as a security system.  You only get three hours of footage, and got luck staying on top of that if you have a normal life and cannot drop everything to review your footage constantly.
title: I'm not happy with this camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: David M. Heinzman Jr.
content: I got this camera (by request) for Christmas in 2016.  Nest Aware (subscription) is an absolute MUST in my opinion with this awesome camera (NOTE*  It will cost you $100 or $300 per year, extra).  But this monitoring and alerting along with the time lapse features are OUTSTANDING.  It gives me great piece of mind knowing I can go back and view things later IF I don't catch them as it nearly immediately notifies when it sees something ... even sound.  This camera has a VERY sensitive mic on it, I can't believe what all it picks up.  Their Nest Aware app is VERY user friendly and I have enjoyed just seeing all the normal day to day activity going on just in front of my house.  It even recognizes (and very accurately) when it detects a PERSON! I love that the app on my phone notifies me and I also have it set up to send me an email (for later research if need be).  I WILL be adding more of these cameras when I can.
title: Nest Aware (subscription) is an absolute MUST in my opinion with this awesome camera (NOTE* It will cost you $100 or $300 ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: TMac
content: I love this outdoor cam. I really do. Video is clear and crisp and you can hear what's going on outside quite well. Nighttime video is especially impressive. So why 4 stars and not 5? Audio. When trying to talk to someone who is outside through the camera, the audio is extremely low. The person can barely hear you and you can barely hear the person talking to you back. Big problem since there's no way to adjust the volume. That is huge because one of the primary functions of this security system is to be able to talk to someone within view of your camera, even when you're not at home. That part of the camera needs immediate improvement.
title: I love this outdoor cam

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Joey
content: The Nest Cam performs well in different weather conditions. When wifi/internet speeds are optimal, the picture is crisp and smooth. Nest's night vision feature works well, even when stretching the distance you're attempting to capture, exceeds expectations. The addition of a well placed IR LED extends that functionality with ease. The interface with Nest App and webpage are functional, though lack a simple 2x/3x/4x high speed review for daily footage. The Time lapse option is welcome and useful, but too cumbersome as a daily review tool. The cameras are fairly easy to setup, although there were two occasions where I had to restart the process. I think that the product and its purchasers would benefit from some sort of a wifi signal strength monitor showing the camera's connection to help adjust for maximum connectivity. Aside from those two UI areas that left me wanting (and can be solved with software updates) it's a good product and absolutely captures the essence of what you'd want in a camera system. This product easily competes with systems that cost many times more; the other system's additional options and features hardy justufy the drastically higher price.
title: More than just a fun gadget

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Don K
content: I've used Dropcam for about 6 years. I purchased this new Nest outdoor cam to add to my account. I am very impressed by the quality of the new product. It's very well made including the power supply, cable and housing. The angle of view is wide. The original dropcam was around 107 degree view, this new one is 130 degree and our makes a big difference. The new camera is also a much higher quality of video as well as the night vision seems to be a better quality. The other VERY important thing is their customer service. It's absolutely top quality. You call, get right through and actually get to talk to someone that actually knows the product. I'm a very satisfied customer.
title: Long time customer (dropcam)

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Gregory F
content: As with the Nest Thermostat, this is a great product -- as long as it's connected to your wifi.  Styling, ease of installation, and performance is excellent - Nest does an outstanding job, very reminiscent of Apple products as far a well thought through instructions, design and packaging.  Two caveats -- wifi connection reliability could be an issue.  The camera is outside, likely up high, maybe even not on your primary building.  Wifi router is normally inside the house.  We have experienced stable periods of being online for days, then constants dropping offline the past week.  It may be affected by other devices being on the wifi - particularly streaming videos, games, etc. Seems to work better when no one is in the house. The other issue to consider is power - you need an outlet close to the installation location, or will be running an extension cord to it. So - common location, up high on the exterior -- will likely require installing additional outdoor outlets. Nest Aware / Streaming / App are excellent, particularly for when you are away and want to check on the house.  Ours is at a vacation home.
title: Great DIY Security Product - If You Can Arrange Reliable Wifi and Power

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Daniel P Paquette
content: Worked great fpr a couple of months until it started getting cold out. Now, I live in North Carolina, so we don't get that cold, maybe down to 30 overnight or on the rare occasion the 20's. When it started getting colder the camera started to go offline - Usually during the nights, but sometimes during the day. There were also days were the weather was warmer and it was offline a lot. So here it is... Pros: Great picture and the camera works pretty good when it works. Like the alerts, etc. Easy to mount. Cons: Seems to hate when it is cooler out and/or the NEST service that hosts the alerts and your video feed has a massive amount of outages the last six weeks. I think it is a little bit of both.
title: Service and Camera not reliable

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: centurion
content: Had issues with camera repeatedly locking up even though the Wi-Fi signal was strong at camera location. Motion and sound detection seemed to work fairly well. Daytime video was fair, nighttime was not to good at all. Was not to happy with product and returned. Looking at wired option and camera with better optics.
title: Very Average!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Bill F.
content: Outstanding exterior camera.  The Nest Cam was easy to setup by just scanning the barcode located on the camera body and following the simple easy to read setup prompts.  Connect to your WIFI, locate the camera at your designated area to insure WIFI strength is OK and your all set for a secure watchdog to keep an eye on your valuable property.  This camera works fabulously with the Nest App.  To enjoy the versatility this camera has to offer, it is highly recommended you subscribe to Nest Aware.  I subscribed to the $50/annually feature which gives me 5-day video history.  This will apply for each camera if you have more than one.
title: Outstanding Outside Camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: JCD
content: I use 2 of these. The distance they "see" in the daytime is ok...but the night quality & distance is not good.  Also, I wish it could learn areas and motions NOT to send alerts. A moth at night or bees during the day get me about 200 alerts daily. Car headlights also get me about 50 alerts every night. Unless the newer models are MUCH MUCH better, I'd pass on these.
title: Had for 3 years...very so-so camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Modernist9252
content: Overall we love our cameras. Sometimes the wifi is problematic and we loose coverage on our nest cameras- which is annoying but happens with some regularity, even though the wifi seems to work fine during this same time period for our tv and other devices. The other issue is that when we installed the outdoor nest camera we were a bit shocked at home big the hole needed to be to pull the wire through it. Its designed in such a way that the whole needs to be about the size of a penny- not the diameter of the wire. Seems like that could have been designed a bit better, but overall we like the camera and would buy it again.
title: Good security camera for the house

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Scott Pilgrim
content: These cameras have poor visibility at night.  Can't read a license plate, or recognize a face.  Additionally, Nest has been purchased by Google, and they're migrating accounts to google.  Erroneously I clicked a button and renewed my subscription for another year, although my subscription was still active...which is all good, however the price went up to $87...before it was $80.  Tricky google got me, so I called customer service and after 1.5 hours on the phone, no one could refund my renewal fee - so I gave up and decided to write this.  I know...$7 is petty, but its the principal of the whole thing.  Get a Ring camera...can't wait to get rid of these.
title: Poor quality, especially in low light.  Google migration has been a nightmare

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: sean_3656
content: Very easy to install and setup through app is a breeze. Video quality is great even at night. My hone internet is slow but I can still get a good live feed. I liked the Nest Aware trial but wish they had a 24 hour package for a minimal charge. Shortest is 10 days for $10/mo (+$5 per additional camera) which is too much. Since this is for security mostly, I would know if there was any illegal activity within hours and would only need access to the last 24 hours. There are other ways to capture the feed but Nest Aware is superior and I think they would get more subscribers if they offered additional packages.
title: Great quality, easy to install

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: WSW
content: Hasn’t been in use but a couple of days. Still learning how to get the best from the camera and understand functionality.  Great picture quality in the daytime.  Night vision best within 15ft or so. Ran all wiring through framework into garage. That took a little work and patching but looks good.
title: Good field of vision and nice resolution

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: JJ
content: I've had a DropCam for about 4 yrs now and it is still hooked up and running.  Finally filled the need to my driveway and it is just a great!!  I had to switch to the Nest app from my Dropcam app (FYI Dropcam app is much smoother and less buggy).  I do like the 'mini-clips' of motion that are sent to me with the Nest app.  I also LOVE the fact that I can allow the owner of the house next to me 'view' my driveway....which also see's his driveway.  He resides out of state but can now check in on his rental property here next to me... at least see the activity in his driveway.  I'll enjoy my free 10 day trial of monitoring then add this camera to my Nest subscription I have already for my dropcam.  LOVE IT!!
title: Great.... just as I expected it to be!!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: James
content: I figured out why there were so many false alerts! UNCHECK "MOTION" Check "People"
title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: M C
content: I bought 2 Nest Outdoor Cameras to track activity outside of my front door and side garage area.  I set up both cameras, which includes mounted and securing the wires, in about 2 hours.  The video quality is great and the alerts are very useful.  I can see that my teens have gotten home safely and when someone rings my front door, I know who is there before going to the door.  My only grip is that my wifi needs to be stronger to reach the outside of the house.  I get notifications from the Nest app that my signal is weak.  Getting a strong signal outside of a brick house is somewhat of a challenge but I am getting a newer router and wifi extenders which I expect will help.  No fault of the Nest cam.  I am happier than expected with the purchase and installation of the Cameras.
title: Surprisingly good quality and super easy to set up!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Joe Sos
content: I have a set of nest cameras and they are great.  I need a spear. So I ordered it.  Nothing on the sale prescription or presentation said that it was incomplete. Not right! False advertising! Now I would have to go through the trouble of returning! All that inconvenience for me Amazon and the company inquestion! Sad JS
title: Incomplete order!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Cindy Cowles
content: I really like the Nest outdoor cam. The picture and sound quality is great. It picks up people all the way across the street. It hears me talking inside the house. If the price wasn’t so expensive it would be absolutely perfect. Easy to setup and program and use. I researched a lot of cameras before splurging on this one and I’m glad I was able to get it. As you can see in the picture, the quality is great. Update...For the amount these things cost, you'd think they'd be better made. It's still practically new, and the damn thing is off-line as much as it's online.
title: What happened to quality? Dang.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: montymom
content: Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn't.  Our power went out for 10 hours and everything else reconnected (including my two Canary cameras) but not Nest.  It wanted to me to reconnect to the internet which requires me getting onto a ladder and scanning the back of the camera!  Terrible.
title: This camera pretty much sucks

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: James21ap
content: I have many Nest cameras and biggest issue I have is not being able to speak on a Samaung phone and have sound come out of camera.  Using web version or iPhone is fine.  Google has known this issue for years and still has not fixed it.  Would not expect such bad customer service on such an expensive camera.
title: Fix audio issue on Samsung phones

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Barry A Baker
content: I placed my camera outside, and near an AC outlet. The distance from my router and modem is 25'. There is a drywall construction exterior wall between the camera and router. I run a lot of "tech" with my 100mb/s. Speed test shows 105mb/s. Drops signal all the time. Specifically a dozen times an hour. I have alerts, notifications, and any other options turned off. I had hoped that there would be improvement. There was no change. I have identified that it drops signal when a car drives by the house. Tried to set up an ignore zone. Did not help. This unit is inferior, and unreliable. I specifically selected this Nest Cam for it's AppleTV compatability. Useless for my installation. Picture quality is great. Night vision is good.
title: No way!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Max
content: Here's the thing, nest aware is a must for this camera to be useful at all. Snapshots aren't going to help you determine what happened. But they say "Cloud storage. Nest Cam safely and securely stores your video history in the cloud, so you can access it anytime." With no indication of needing nest aware. But you do. I'm really disappointed because there's no second option to have the video sent somewhere else. It's either get nest aware or don't get any video play back. Not to mention nests motion detection doesn't work half the time. I watched it as cars, people, and myself walk by the camera and it didn't alert me. But with nest aware it alerts me every time. The quality is great! The installation was simple! But it's all useless if you can't use the camera simply because they want you to pay monthly!
title: Nest aware monthly payment sucks. Camera half works without it

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: pinwheelsunshine
content: Edit: 02/14/2016. The problems below still persist after the recent iOS Nest app update. It has been months since I bought them in November 2016 and they still have not resolved this basic issue. I very much regret buying four of these expensive cameras. Edit: 04/02/2017. Chatted with Nest support about my snapshot history for the last three hours being totally blank (I don’t have a NestAware subscription and am limited to these snapshots). This has happened quite often since getting these cameras. I know there should be activity there. They tried some things like remotely resetting my camera which didn’t make much difference. During the chat with them, my history will suddenly be viewable on the iPhone. Then a few minutes later, it will be totally blank. This is true for multiple cameras. This gives me zero confidence that I’ll be able to view my history in a timely fashion in the event of an emergency. Also doesn't encourage me to give them any money for NestAware when I'm so often disappointed with how things work as it is. Edit: 04/14/2017. Tried getting notifications working again as I periodically do since my original bad support experience in late 2016. The menus have changed slightly in the iPhone app and on the website which makes me think they attempted to improve notifications. Long story short...they still don't work. After walking around in front of the camera on and off for a half hour (alerts set to "only when away" and I currently have it set to Away), I finally got one single email to come in SEVEN MINUTES AFTER THE MOTION ACTIVITY EVENT. This is with me on wifi and monitoring my (push) email, so the problem definitely is with Nest and not my email. Ugh. Sigh sigh sigh. Please see my original review below for even more reasons not to invest in Nest. Will attempt to get notifications working again in a couple months. Not at all reliable now. Original Review: 2+ weeks of dealing with Nest senior level support has left me beyond frustrated. I'm getting notifications for activity when I'm home despite "only when no one's home" being enabled in settings. After jumping through a ton of troubleshooting hoops and ultimately creating an entire new Nest account, the problem persists. Got a final phone call today after the "engineers reviewed my case" and senior support passed along the word from up top that the engineers say I need to have location services on for my issue to be resolved (which does not have anything to do with my problem as I've described it countless times). After explaining (for the 10th time) that I have the problem with location services both on and off, he proceeded to tell me that "it's a known issue and they're working on it." I bought FOUR of these expensive cameras for several reason but notification support was a huge one, and now I've been asked to "keep an eye on updates" for an indeterminate time to see if it is fixed. (Also found out after buying them that notifications only show up ONCE every 30-minute interval for each camera, which is totally unacceptable.) Except for this frustrating experience, the iOS and web apps are pretty good. But that does not ameliorate all of the other issues here and I refuse to rate the app more than one star until this is fixed. Will update this review if something changes. PS: What you're viewing "live" on your cameras is sometimes 5-10 seconds delayed. I have fast internet with excellent wifi. This is ridiculous. Does not make me want to pay the monthly subscription for Nest Aware when they can't even get free functionality performing well. PPS: My cameras go "offline" sporadically quite often. There's nothing else I can do to optimize their location or wifi settings. All cameras are within 10-15 feet of an 802.11ac wifi router. The one that goes offline most is actually about 5 feet from the router. I wish I had the option to plug in a cat6 ethernet cable, but it's wifi only. I'm at a loss with this product.
title: "That's a known problem" (Notifications broken)

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Bruhle
content: This camera is completely useless unless you're willing to stare at a live stream all day or pay more and more and more money in order to actually review the footage. Of course they won't let you save it to your own NAS or SD card. Google wants you want to keep paying them for as long as you own the camera. The Wyze cameras are far and away a better alternative.
title: Useless unless you pay additional monthly fees.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: MP
content: Great camera and easy to install, but don't be fooled by the ability to talk to someone when you get a notification on your phone ( I have the iPhone 6). Notifications are delayed and could be as much as 30 minutes according to support. They say it is the networks fault! I can understand a very, very slight delay, but mine could be as much as 2 minutes.  Nest needs to update its server's. I could buy something with my Amex card or Visa and as the clerk is running my card, I get a notification on my phone instantly. I was going to install several cameras but am glad I bought just one to see how it worked. Until they address the server issue I'll wait or look into a different camera system.
title: Great camera and easy to install poor alert response time

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Bryan R. Walker
content: While a good concept, the camera falls very short of expectations. After installation, the cameras worked fine, that was back in August when I bought 2 of them and it was warm outside. Now, it is December and the temperature has dropped down below 40 degrees F on several occasions. Now, when it gets cold at night, the cameras go off line and I have to power cycle the cameras to get them to come back on. I might have thought this was a single defective camera but both cameras do that. For a camera rated as an indoor / outdoor camera, this flaw makes these cameras unacceptable over priced junk. Installation and set up is fairly simple, BUT you have to drill a HUGE 7/8" hole to bring the 1/4 inch wire into the house because the connector, which is molded and cannot be removed, is a 6/8 inch plastic cylinder molded around a USB plug, just bad mechanical and electrical engineering, all around. For the price, I expect it to work even if it is cold outside without me having to constantly fiddle with it.
title: Doesn't like cold weather

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: The AmazonBuyerGuy
content: Very very nice design, functioning and well made material.  I appreciated the well thought out design (that are the reason i purchased 4 of this new cam).  Great resolutions. I recommended to plan out well where to placement then make connection to your wifi from your nest app.  Therefore you can have a better signal strength.  Once the cam installed you can play around with the setting in app for your personal preference.  I love the alert msg thru app pop-up.  we feel safe when away from home. For some reasons, i dont like the monthly payment for the recording.  I think we had 14 days to try out once the camera install.
title: Very very nice design, function and well made material.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: G. Geisler
content: I have owned several outdoor security cameras and all of them pale in comparison to this Nest cam. It was pricier than other cameras I have purchased but it is well worth the money. Install was easy and the performance of the camera exceeds my expectations. The Nest Aware service is worth the $50 a year. Being able to set a zone for motion detection is essential. I used to get dozens of motion activated alerts with my previous cameras. I have nothing negative to say about this camera.
title: Best outdoor cam and service.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: D. Peterson
content: Good looking. Easy to set up.  When using outdoor outlet concealing the cord (if you care about uch things) can be an issue.  I used an outdoor outlet and purchased tamper proof screws (#6 1 inch) instead of the provided screws, because I felt it added to the security of the camera.  I was reluctant to screw into my vinyl siding.  The real time image is sometimes delayed by seconds which is not optimal when I want to preview who is at the door before I answer.  Image looks good.  Have not signed up for the subscription service so I cannot set areas in the image to be limited when monitoring for movement. As a result, I get an email everytime a car goes down the street or someone walks by the house.
title: Nice camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Tom Geiger
content: This thing is difficult to install,. I have 2 thermostats and a smoke/carbon and all 3 were a breeze.  This camera has been in place for a year but not set up.  You reach a point where it asks for the last 4 digits of the serial number but does not give you a link to enter it.  Good news is....Nest has a help line that is great.  We used a laptop to set it up and Voila!!
title: might need help from Nest

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: daddydot.mpeg
content: I have both Nest and Amcrest cameras.  I use Nest at home and Amcrest at a cabin.  Both work well but this one definately has a better picture and is easier to hook up.  Not that the amcrest was overly difficult but this was easier.  The phone app works well and I like the timeline scroll feature. It's also very easy to share a video.  I will say one feature I do like better on the Amcrest is the Pan Tilt  Zoom feature (on the indoor cameras) and I would be lying if I did not also mention the 100 dollar difference in price.  I guess it depends on your application but again the picture is definately better on the Nest.
title: Nest has a slight edge over the Amcrest

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: D. Simpsonite
content: Camera has been outstanding for almost two years. For whatever reason, the inside lens dislocated from its sealed mounting inside and would only point at ground so useless for security in our driveway. I contacted NEST via my account and as still under two year warranty, they are express mailing on out to me with return shipping for the defective one so they can determine any product flaws. Nice to know this company stands by their warranty. We have two other NEST indoor cameras and they are outstanding quality and function.
title: NEST is worth the $$

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Rayzer
content: I was curious as to if the outdoor cameras would hold up to a Montana winter. They out performed my expectations. It was -30° below for a few days and they kept working like always.
title: Great cameras

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Jon B.
content: This is a great outdoor camera.  Does what it's supposed to do and as advertised.  Very easy setup.  I've bought a number of cameras in the past, but found them to be difficult to connect to my wifi and installation was problematic.  However, I found no difficulty with the wifi connection or the installation with this camera.
