I highly recommend this camera to friends and neighbors, and especially to novices and low tech persons like myself.  By the way, I recently ordered a second Nest outdoor cam and it arrived today.  Can't wait to install it.
title: The Best Outdoor Cam Out There

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Peter Marosi
content: I installed it a few days ago and paid the $100 for the annual subscription. It works very, very well. All events can be viewed on the phone, but to make video clips you have to use a laptop - not that big a problem. The camera is a bit pricey 'though, but installation was a easy. I recommend planning the cable routing in advance and make sure that there is a power source at the end of the camera / adapter cord.
title: Great product

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: scott  phillips
content: Camera has great potential for security monitoring, but it needs to have better facial imaging and better zone configuring.  Picture of surroundings is great but a persons face is grainy and not as clear as the surrounding bags. (?) The zones alert when someone or thing are outside the zone parameters, as well as when movement is detected within zone parameters. Basically making a zone is unnecessary since you’ll be alerted to any disturbance outside the depicted zones. Lastly, the power wire is exposed, making the Nest outdoor camera susceptible to being easily “cut from power”. Powering these cameras must have been an afterthought...
title: Not quite a 5 star item.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Mario A.
content: The resolution's not high enough to be an effective outdoor camera. Additionally, while still in the warranty period the infrared lights burned out so the camera has no nightvision. I've contacted support but still haven't gotten a response. What's the point of a warranty when you can't even get someone to talk to you?
title: Unreliable, bad support.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: WCRServices
content: As an original Dropcam owner, I waited patiently for the day Nest would announce a waterproof option. I joined the waiting list in July and received the camera in September 2016. Initially I installed the camera in our backyard a captured more night creatures than I knew existed. Eventually though, I had a real security concern of watching our front yard for package deliveries and if my garage door was open or closed. Fortunately we have a tall large tree in our front yard that yields the best place to install the camera to overlook our home. Together with my son, we trenched the yard to bury an in-ground electrical cable from our house to the tree. Then selected a nice flat spot on the tree where a previous limb was cut off. The white camera in a brown tree was like a sore thumb with a large band aid, therefore I purchased a silicone glove to help camouflage the camera. It looks great now. Unlike others, I'd rather not advertise the location of the camera but rather use it to capture those who are dishonest in their ways. The camera is fabulous with its waterproof design. So far I have not cleansed the lens from rain or debris as it doesn't appear to trap water, water spots, etc. The camera has withstood high winds and powerful rain storms already. I was concerned with it's magnetic base if a squirrel or bird could knock it off its mount, fortunately that has not happened. Since the camera is mounted in a tree, I did protect the 5 volt cable with a Gardner Bender Flex Tubing purchased from my local hardware store and secured the tubing to the tree using Everbilt Hose Repair Clamps and EMT Hole Straps for a nice clean finish. With the Stunning Video—130° field of view it captures the entire front of my house to include the garage door, front door, front windows, side gate, and portion of my backyard. We have installed the Nest app on our cellular phones and any movement in the camera's field of view instantly notifies us when movement occurs. It notifies when the garage door opens/closes, when packages are delivered, and when friends arrive. I am truly appreciative with this camera, the simple design, and the quality of video produced.
title: This camera was well worth the wait

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Harry B Franklin III
content: I was extremely disappointed with the Arlo Pro that I previously used.  It always seemed to miss events, and not having the few seconds leading up to the motion event was a disappointment in certain situations.  The obvious disadvantage to the Nest cameras is the fact that you have to run a wire, but it is absolutely worth it for the non-stop recording and no longer having to take the camera down and charge batteries every other month.  Setup and install went smooth without any issues.
title: I was extremely disappointed with the Arlo Pro that I previously used

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: K. G.
content: Ug! I recently migrated my Nest account to Google as they suggested and now I cannot access any of my nest products on the Google home app! I could before, and now I cannot!! Meanwhile the $25 competitor did link, and shows up in the Google home app properly. Not worth the price, the subscription, or the hassels! I've wasted so much money on Nest products.
title: Warning: Account Migration Leads to Problems!!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: IO
content: Very easy to connect to your home network with the Nest app on phone or tablet. Good alerts if it sees movement. Camera was easy to install if your handy with drill, screwdriver and a ladder. I drilled hole in soffit and ran power cable into attic and down into the garage to plug it in to an indoor outlet; That way no one can unplug your camera, and you don’t have ugly cables running down the outside of your house. Camera working great so far! Nice wide angle view of my porch area. Good night vision also. Time will tell how long it lasts, and if it can handle very cold temps in Minnesota? So far 100% satisfied with the Nest outdoor camera.
title: First outdoor camera.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: JV84
content: - but $10 a month to save recorded video to the Cloud (for just ten days) - plus five dollars more for each additional camera - is a massive rip-off.  Arlo gives you seven days of recording for free on up to five cameras. Fortunately, I only bought one Nest Cam so I can eat the $170 and make the switch to a full Arlo system which should pay for itself much sooner than later - and Arlo is also cordless. Thanks, Nest.
title: The camera works well enough -

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Nando
content: Very clean and seamless interface coupled with good hardware development has led to this being a great product for the purpose defined. I have had it installed for nearly two weeks so perhaps an update will come after a few months. One thing I like is the ability to define the area in which you can monitor. Only downside is that you must pay for the upgraded experience which is expensive for what it is. 150 dollars for two outdoor cams comes with the ability to review 10 days of history. Out of the box with no cost is 3 hours and no defining the area. I think Google/Nest need to drop this price - especially since storage in the cloud is so inexpensive. Nevertheless - for peace of mind and for safety. I really think this is a good buy.
title: Solid product

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Tyler
content: I did quite a bit of research on cameras for my home and decided on this Nest Outdoor Cam. It has all the features I need, I just have one single camera covering the main driveway/porch area. The camera I have is mounted high up off the ground so there is no way anyone could rip it off. I really like the feature of having Nest turn off the camera when my phone gets inside the geofence I made around my house so it doesn't record me walking around. I have no need to record while I am home so this is a smart feature. I subscribe to Nest Aware and have used it several times to check on things that happened days in the past. Set-up was super easy, I am busy and not the handiest so this was a big concern for me but it took me about 45 min and it is very clean and out of the way.
title: Best system for me

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Travis (Amazon customer since 2006)
content: I picked up two of these before Christmas during a special. These are easier to install than the indoor ones and look alot cooler. I have no doubt that these will hold up in the weather, I've had two of the indoor cams for about two years and one of them was actually mounted outdoors for almost the entire time. It held up we'll, but I knew I was pushing my luck. With four cams now they do tend to go offline due to the internet speed a little too frequently, but usually not for very long so I haven't missed much. Nest has done very well making these cams super easy to setup. They are really plug and play
title: Definition of plug and play. Super easy to setup

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Kay Bea
content: Disappointed in the camera. While a nice looking camera that blends well with house it would not alert us when someone came to the door. We had the free trial and it would alert us if we walked outside or were in the yard but 3 times when I knew someone had come to deliver a package it would not alert us so we decided against continuing on with a pay service. It also would alert us if our neighbor pulled in to their driveway next door which is right next to ours but never alert us to someone pulling  in our own driveway. Strange and very troubling
title: Nest security camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: nbiron
content: Overall first thoughts, its ok.... I had another camera in its spot but the Nest is struggling with wifi coverage and video quality. Im buying a new wireless router ans hopefully that will help. Im also not a fan of the magnetic mount, camera doesn't stay where i want it too. Update: New router fixed the connectivity issue. I had the standard router that comes with my cable service and it obviously was not that great. However, my camera has developed a bit of a fish eye halo effect at night. I'm replacing it, to see if that solves the issue.
title: Overall first thoughts, its ok.... ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: james
content: I bought 2 cameras, they worked perfectly, was informed on my phone when it saw movement, but system was not started by myself, so was on as a guest, then system just knocked me off one day and did not exist anymore, took days to finally get me back onto system, then found out they changed the format on cam..  So cams went from being good and easy to use to not being able to use them at all, could not zoom in or out or move pic around and everything started going to my E-mail, so had several dozen e-mails a day on movement witch got old fast. cams are now off and going to buy more form somebody else...
title: So cams went from being good and easy to use to not being able to ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: DW
content: II don't regret buying the camera.  It is attractive, has sharp images, and it's helpful in monitoring who's at my front door.  However, neither the sound or motion options have worked.  The camera is so sensitive it sends messages to my phone if someone is simply walking by my house.  There is also a delay even though the modem is only 10-15 feet from the front entrance where the camera is located.  But perhaps the most unwelcome surprise was that after the free Nest Aware subscription expired, I get this annoying advertisement along the bottom of my computer.
title: I get this annoying advertisement along the bottom of my computer

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Jana K. Andringa
content: The Nest Cam came with comprehensive instructions and it was easy to install.  I'm addicted to checking it. I've had my unit since May 2017 and I love that  I can see when my pet sitter comes over to feed my cat, when packages get delivered and when my daughter gets home from school.  Thankfully nothing shady has been captured but I know it will capture anything that takes place.  The speaker was a nice feature on this device that I thought worked really well.  I'd like to get it for other parts of my home.The picture quality is great with the night feature as well.  I do recommend buying the annual membership at $100.
title: Eye Spy...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Greener-pastures
content: Awesome cameras. I’ve been using nest for many years now. Simple to setup and install. My only complaint is how poor the night vision is. Basically it’s good for showing about 10-20 feet in front of the camera—and that’s likely a stretch.
title: Excellent cameras for surveillance of your property.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: S. Mullick
content: Love love this outdoor camera on our driveway. We also have the monthly subscription and can see if there is snow/ice/storm damage, who is stopping by driveway etc. We were looking for a cost effective alternative to traditional security system and also easy installation, so we chose Nest outdoor cam. If you want to install it in a secondary building on your property like a shed, work shop or barn, remember that you need strong wi-fi signal near the building. We had to hire electrician to get an extra outlet to connect to the camera, because we didn't have one closer to where we wanted the camera to be installed. There are many cool features, we probably haven't used them all.
title: Love love this outdoor camera on our driveway

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Aspiring Author
content: These are really great security cameras and the installation instructions were good. My only issue was finding that one of the cameras had a slightly reduced field of view. I did not realize this until it was fully installed so I did not give the company the opportunity to provide me with a replacement (too much work to swap it out). The concern I had for these outdoor cameras, which I realized when I bought them, was that they are very easy to steal due to the magnetic holder!  I solved this problem by building metal cages around them. They can still be taken but the thief must work much harder.
title: Good Security Cameras

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: TechChick
content: I am a long time DropCam subscriber.  A few months ago I added the Nest outdoor cameras to my subscription.  I absolutely LOVE my DropCam/Nest cameras!  I also have a competitor home automation outdoor camera that integrates with my security system.  I greatly prefer the Nest constant stream and ability to save 7 days or a month of video vs. the little clips saved by my other home automation cameras.  I like being able to access both from my PC and from my iPhone and iPad.  When traveling I have a great view into what is going on at home.  I now know if my dog is misbehaving, or if anyone comes onto our property.  The outdoor camera's magnetic mount was also super handy for mounting the camera on my steel eaves.
title: Great Camera With Good Video Quality, Ease of Installation, and User Friendly Apps/Web Interface

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Inquiry
content: These camera are awesome.  Very clear video, sends notifications whenever someone walks or drives in the yard, and it is easy to view and save videos.
title: Great cameras that are easy to use

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Anu
content: I needed a camera outside my front door in the porch. I bought the nest outdoor camera first since it was weather proof. I didn't want to pay a monthly subscription. I was okay knowing my nest camera will give me only a 3 hour window of recordings. This is what was advertised. After I purchased and installed it, I cancelled the free 1 month trial of Nest Aware through their website (cannot do it from the app). At this point I realized I cannot record clips, least download them. It only gives you snapshots, which are just images. And you cannot even download them. What's the point of a security camera that you can't download the footage? So I returned it and bought the Arlo Q Plus. If Nest had the same features of Nest Aware but for 3 hours window with the free plan, I'd have kept it. The 30 day trial of Nest Aware coincides with their 30 day return policy. If I had not looked into what's available in the free plan, I'd be stuck with it. A little sneaky of the company IMO. That said, if you are okay paying $10 per month for Nest Aware, this is a great product. If you are not going to subscribe, look elsewhere.
title: Great product, bad subscription model.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Allan Nicholson
content: Video quality is excellent but frame rate is low(15) which makes fast moving details blurry if playing an activity back. Notifications and device support is pretty good for capturing events. Should also mention that the audio is pretty good and you can hear peoples conversations 10ft away when outside. I am not convinced they don't have some wireless connectivity issues as I have 4 cameras and periodically each one will randomly drop off the network. Nest support is pretty unhelpful and wont supply the logs for the devices and say there is low wifi (which I don't believe at all as a network engineer.) I am happy with them and would only wish they could support local storage as a backup.
title: Mixed feelings

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: xenoc
content: Solid and well made, good video quality, excellent installation and wifi connection instructions, easy to install, reasonable value for the quality and works well with the rest of my Nest network on an Apple wifi network.  Two negatives: a)  the power cords are too long for my set up and there is no good way to either buy shorter cords or wind the cords up other than just wrapping them together and tying with velcro, not aesthetically pleasing or professional looking, b) the wifi connection drops too frequently, presumably because the camera is outside and the wifi is partially blocked by the exterior wall (which shouldn't be a surprise for an exterior camera).  A better wifi receiver would improve performance.
title: good video quality

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: thomas j laliberte
content: I replaced xfinity cameras and alarm with 4 of these cams. The field of view and motion detection work really well. I like the instant notifications and the ability to quickly review what caused the trigger. I'd rather stop people before they get in my house. The install was easy. Note that because of the larger locking connection, the hole you need to drill is about7/8" in diameter. It's easily partially covered up with the mounting plate. They look good, are easily adjusted and are a marked improvement over the xfinity cams. Very pleased so far.
title: Easy install. love them so far.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Tim D
content: This has been a great camera and has proven to be very useful and provide some peace of mind. The app can sometimes be buggy and I need to completely shut down the app and re-open it. The website page seems to be better, however less convenient at times. Make sure you have a strong internet connect with a good upload speed. We had AT&T with about 2-3 Mbps Upload and the camera was frequently going offline, we have since switched to Charter Spectrum with 5-6 Mbps Upload and the camera has only gone offline once since the switch. The night vision does struggle a little bit, I live on a VERY dark street and my camera has a corner of my house in it's very near view which I think somewhat negatively impacts the night vision as my house shows up VERY bright and everything else is very dark. Installation was pretty easy, I have this mounted on the underside of my soffit on my garage, which is unfinished above the garage so I was able to easily go up in that attic space and run a regular extension cord through the attic and plug it right into the outlet that my garage door opener is plugged into on the ceiling.
title: Great camera if you don't want to fuss with batteries.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: David R. Garrett
content: My orginal opinion of these security camers was really good:  easy installation, clear pictures, worked really good detecting people/movement, and the voice feature actually came in handy twice, although I thought it could have been a little louder.  However, that was during the “free trial” period.  Now, I realize that it has the potential to be worthless in actually catchng/stopping a thief.  Without the subscription, I have lost the video capability.  Instead, the “video” is a series of still pictures, taken every 5-6 seconds, which I am assuming is the way it was created to be and not something wrong with either of my cameras.  Turns out a lot can happen in 6 seconds.  Our truck can make it all the way out of the driveway in that amount of time (so I never actually see the vehicle), the postman can make it into the view, leave the package and be walkingout out of the view with the camera only picking up his legs/feet.  Again, this is a good camera, but just know that it might not be much use if you don’t plan on spending the money for the monthly (or annual) subscription, which is now a cost that I must now try to budget for.
title: Needs subscription to be dependable

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Kimberly H.
content: The picture quality is not as clear as my indoor nest camera when I put that one outside. Please advise as to way? I have adjusted the camera for sunlight  but it seems to not get a clear view within a close distance. I am considering returning this item unless notified with a quick fix.
title: Outdoor view is not clear from close distance

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Robert Triplett
content: Great Camera, but tricky installation.  I'll let you read the other reviews regarding it's operation.  I have 2 other indoor cams and love them.  The magnetic mounts on this thing are genius and work beautifully. They make the camera infinitely adjustable.  I mounted mine in the soffit (the underside of an overhanging eave) near my front porch and garage.  I ran the cord through the soffit and into the attic above the garage.  I used an existing light socket to install a "Outlet With Pull Chain Socket Adapter" to plug it in.(https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0015SHT3W/ref=oh_aui_search_detailpage?ie=UTF8&psc=1).  The main problem was mounting this thing and not having to drill a massive (7/8") hole in my soffit to fit the power adapter through... for only a 1/4" wire (really bad design Nest and you can do better than this!  It appears they fixed this issue with the Outdoor Nest IQ camera... but that's another $100).  I searched on here and found out you can cut and then splice the two power wires back together (the ones in the center I just taped off because the camera doesn't use them).  Since the splice is inside, weather isn't an issue and it would be just fine.  I used car speaker wire splicers to re-connect the wires, taped it all with black electrical tape and it worked perfectly.  Keep in mind this method will void the warranty though. I just had to drill a 3/8" hole in an inconspicuous spot to run the wire through.  I also didn't want to drill holes in my soffit for the mount.  My soffit is thin (1/8") plastic and the Nest mount is magnetic.... so I grabbed a couple quarter size rare earth magnets.  I put them on the attic-side of the soffit and then "snap!" attached the mount on the underside of the soffit.  No screws required!  It worked perfectly!
title: Great camera, but tricky installation.  Here are some good installation ideas...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Armando
content: Installation of these cameras was a breeze. My network and internet connection is plenty fast enough to handle the cameras. If the support was any good for Nest Aware this could be a 4-5 star product. The main problem that I've had is that the Nest Aware trial was stuck on my account for one camera and would not expire. So I got stuck with one working camera and one that would only live stream. Just so happens that the second camera was the one that watches over my business products. Don't bother trying to call their support, after being placed on hold for over an hour several times before giving up, I went through the email support. Email support takes up to over a day for a response. You could tell by the grammar and syntax that English is not the support staff's first language. Which after being told that there was a problem with my account being stuck in trial mode, I wasn't offered a fix for the issue. After sending them another email they basically told me to unplug the cameras and put them back on. As the issue was obviously on their side with the account being stuck in trial mode I figured it's time to cut my losses. Well done Nest you got me for $290 dollars, now I'll be going to a camera system that works. Don't waste your money on this product. It could be excellent but it's pretty obvious that it's a cash grab with no intent on retaining customers.
title: Good cameras with terrible support.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Picky1
content: This reminds of an apple product.  It is designed really well.  It is easy to set up and everything is really well thought out.  I really don't have the patience or technical expertise to mess around with tech products.  I just want it to work. This does.  Like an apple product, its not cheap but I think the quality and ease of us is worth the up front cost.  The on line plan to store 10 days of video is way too expensive.  That sours the overall experience.  It's not the like it is cheap up front and they get you on the storage annuity.  Its expensive up front and an expensive annuity.
title: It is easy to set up and everything is really well thought ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: W. Knight
content: Easy and convenient... I like the magnetic mount - but it has its limitations, like the angles and the cord handing down is kinda annoying... but the Nest subscription cost is absurdly high compared to similar cameras and services.  Will keep playing with this new 'toy' for a few weeks longer... we haven't quite decided if it's worth keeping or not.  The picture quality is modest (with the HQ video setting enabled)... but this is my first security cam, so I don't have anything to directly compare it to yet... but I'd say you'd be lucky to get a clear image of a person's face past 20ft...
title: Easy and convenient

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: PhantomTiger
content: It’s a very nice camera with great features but…….. 1. A two-day subscription service would be enough for me. Or even a five-day would be good at a reasonable fee. If so Nest would be my go-to company. That is if #2 were possible. 2. I got the Nest Outdoor so that family and friends could checkout the wild life activities in my back yard. But without auto focus this isn’t happening. I won’t be using Nest Aware because I’ll replace the camera as soon as I can find my ideal cam.
title: Two Big Negatives

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Carfo
content: The quality is great, it also picks up sound. Very easy to install, just be sure you have a WiFi signal. FYI 2.4Ghz band goes farther than 5Ghz so when you sync the camera to the Wifi, if you have dual band, choose your 2.4Ghz signal for the cameras. Nest aware is required otherwise you just get live feed which is almost worthless with what security cameras should do. Thankfully, the 5day package is $5/month and $3 for additional cameras. A good deal honestly.
title: Great cameras, Nest aware basically required though

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: D. N. Knisely
content: 5 Stars for the hardware, including installation and included wiring.  1 Star for the NEST app and web interface.  Google:  What were you thinking?  Requires Flash???  App on iOS hangs up constantly and becomes non-responsive, and gets worse with each release.  Functionality is poor (to put it nicely).  Cloud video storage and event detection is great, but when it is so painful to access, what's the point?  Google/NEST - you can do much better.
title: Hardware is terrific, but software is unworthy of Google

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: PhillyCamper
content: I purchased this for our nursery. It's a great cam. Only downside to using as a nursery cam is that there is a green light that shines. Our little guy looks right at the light. The picture quality is nice. I like seeing it from my phone. Nice especially while I'm at work and can check in on my little guy. No issues with the service. There's an option is sign up for the recordings, but still works well if you don't. It also has a nice alert feature for your phone or ipad which alerts you of movement. We liked it so much we got our FIL one for outdoors.
title: Nest is the Best

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Zhiliang Jin
content: Solid product with relatively easy installation and setup process. The biggest complaint that I have is that there's little value without the paid subscription plan. Other than live monitoring, there's no recorded clips for motion-triggered activities.
title: Without the paid subscription, it's useless!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: David M.
content: Absolutely horrible waste of money. $100 a year for one camera to be recorded to the cloud. Without that, you only have three hours of data saved, and you can't set up zones, so cars passing in the street, etc. will trigger alerts. Not nearly competitive with alternative camera systems with smartphone apps, infrared heat sensing, etc. for far less money.
title: Absolutely horrible waste of money

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: LJ
content: Cant expect nothing short of a quality product from Nest. Easy setup and install. Have been using this product for 2 years and no issues. The only complaint is that the power chord had a thick plastic  housing that's difficult to pass through a hole in the wall. The hole has to be extra large to fit the  housing even though the chord diameter is much smaller.
title: Good camera. Need subscription for it to be worthwhile

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Bonnie L. Mangold
content: We use this camera to look at the view at our 2nd home - we did cover it in a black silicone sleeve so it doesn't stand out on our dark trim so having this available in both black and white would be ideal.  The nestcam support personnel were very helpful when I inquired if the camera would enable me to see my view - ie was it wide enough for my application.  So we're loving in for this application as well as to help with security.  I also like creating timelines of particularly good sunsets or sunrises - that I might've missed otherwise.
title: Great for looking at the view remotely

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Nann
content: Physical setup of the camera is easy, meaning the camera and it’s pieces. What Nest doesn’t advertise is the time it might take to find a strong enough WiFi signal outside your home to reliably stream video. It took us a solid two hours from opening the box, to finding an appropriate mounting area for what we wanted to monitor, to actually relocating the routers inside our home to improve the signal strength to the camera, to be done. Once everything was up and running we were very pleased with the performance.
title: Lengthy setup process but great product

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Anne Lauchner
content: They were difficult to set up. As soon as I got them working, nest added my account to a gmail account and can’t tell me what it is . The account can’t be deleted to start over because the cams are linked to a account that can’t revealed to me which makes them useless. I have a foal waiting to be born at any time and needed these in the worst way. The customer service is absolutely HORRIBLE! Don’t spend the money!!!
title: Nest customer service is horrible

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: tbr
content: I have installed and used other outdoor security cameras. These NEST cameras are ridiculously simple to install and use. More importantly they work great and have a lot of very useful features which are easy to set up, especially compared to other types of outdoor security cameras. The quality is very good too. (I have had other security cameras fail after a few months usage). I have 2 of them running now and ordered a third. I also like the NEST cloud storage service. I could use a NAS but the cloud service is really easy to use so I don't have to be an IT manager to use it.
title: Great outdoor security camera - It just works

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Ryan C.
content: These are expensive cameras, true. However, I bought this one, hooked it up and immediately went to a brick and mortar to buy 2 more. Very simple to install. If you are installing on concrete, get a hammer drill and a good bit. Takes very little time to get them up and running. The picture is great, the notifications are great (alerts if it detects people, motion and/or sound). Family sharing so multiple people can see the feeds. The Nest Aware isn't super cheap, but it does give you continuous video recording for 10 or 30 days. Pricing for the 10 day history is 100/yr for the first camera and 50 for each one after that.
title: Great Camera. Easy Install.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Lance L
content: We bought 1 of these and because of being short on time, I did not read the reviews or research it fully. MY BAD. I will normally always read the reviews and do research before buying anything! I will say this - the camera is good quality and was easy to setup. Picture looks good and night vision is good also. After I physically installed it and got it working I figured that I was all done, then I got to reading the email from signing up for the Nest account. You get given a 10 day TRIAL for your camera. If you want this camera to be of ANY use for security after that YOU HAVE TO PAY!! NOWHERE do they mention this in the camera description or listing that I saw!? Without paying the extortion money that Nest wants from you, this camera is virtually useless in a security application. Without the Nest subscription you get about 3 hours of footage for review, and that is it. So for example, you go to bed and someone breaks into your house, car etc. You wake up in the morning to find the damage/loss and want to go back to get the footage of the person who did this. Well, if it was more than 3 hours prior to you looking at the camera, guess what, you are out of luck! There is also the the "zone" feature. If you don't pay for the subscription you are also unable to designate a zone for movement recording. This useless also because if you have it looking at your driveway like we did, then every time a car drives by in the top of the picture, it registers an alert. I had heard of Nest prior to buying this camera, however I had not heard of having to pay for something you already paid for!! I use a different brand of camera for our indoor security that has on-board SD card storage that is accessible for months, AT NO EXTRA COST!! Long story short... Unless you want a continual expense to use this as a security camera, do not buy it! Nice camera - Rip off company! I promptly took this down and sent it back for a refund. I will never buy anything Nest again.
title: WARNING!! You are NOT finished paying after you buy this camera!!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Michael R
content: Install is a breeze and the box includes everything you need to mount cords and secure the unit. The magnetic base plate mount makes adjusting the angle of the camera fee very easy to capture exactly what you want. The build quality seems very durable and on par with the other Nest products - polished, durable, and in this case, weather resistant. The only thing missing that keeps this from being a 5* product is the lack of hard wired Ethernet option. You have to have a wireless router with a strong signal in the area of installation otherwise the fee won't upload to the Nest servers and you then wouldn't be able to access it. I knew it was wifi only and it works fine in our area but I would love to have more cameras in different areas and it would be a much more reliable stream quality if I could use Ethernet.
title: Easy install, reliable/tough build quality

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Aaron Smith
content: The camera itself is very good, but the navigation to periods of motion in the app and website needs some work. -I would recommend they change the website interface so they save a clip of when there was motion. -I would also prefer a system that is possible to stream directly to a google drive folder and store the videos in there (for free preferably). The monthly charge for cloud storage adds up. They could just save the clips with motion to cut down on space requirements. -I like the motion zones.
title: Nice camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Debra Lambrecht
content: The video quality of the camera is excellent. The only problem is that in the past three weeks the camera is constantly going off line. The Internet service and the power supply have not changed but my camera shut off several times a day every day of the past three weeks or so. I’m very disappointed in the functioning aspects of the camera for the price.
title: Camera functionality

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Lyndsee Burtle
content: We love our nest cameras! The picture is perfect and you can adjust what motion types you would like Nest to notify you of (example: only notify you when it sees a person, notify you when it sees any movement, etc).
title: Perfect security camera!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Lee
content: Fantastic product! The iPhone app works incredibly well. I had never had surveillance on my property prior to purchasing this camera. It is mildly addicting to be able to see what's going on in front of my house from wherever I have cell service. I've had zero issues with weather (Oregon rain and ice) and connectivity has been great. The camera does require a power location. For my house that means that the camera is plugged in down low where someone could technically tamper with it. The camera informs you via phone notification if it is offline for more than 10 minutes. Of course, that could also be because my wireless router is having issues. Nice to know either way.
title: Fantastic product! The iPhone app works incredibly well

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: HistProf
content: be prepared to pay an expensive monthly monitoring fee to get get full use this product.  if you decide you are willing to pay for that, it is a great product.  easy installation and great video connection.  I like being able to set up different zones for alters and to get alerts for either movement or people or noise.  or all three.  reduced one star for price of monitoring packages
title: good.  but expensive monitoring fee

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Julie Fortner
content: I did a lot of research and realized the Nest Cam was the best bang for the buck and also the best quality and better featured item.  I love that I can view my home from anywhere using my iPhone or computer.  I also love that I can install other products that work with my Alexa!  I'm very impressed with the quality of picture, the detailed sound and being able to talk back and forth.  Only thing is the camera is a little delayed by a few seconds, but it isn't a break it for me.  Great product!!! I will be purchasing more!
title: Great Product, Great Quality, Good price!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Dianne
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. The best features of this camera are that is small, unobtrusive and I can see what's going on at home from my cell phone. This camera has a great field of view and you can set it up to email you alerts when the camera spots activity. You can also limit alerts to a specified field of view.  The infra red feature is great, I was able to observe two bears that came to my front door in the middle of the night. I would highly recommend this camera. In fact, I was so impressed with the first one that I bought two more. They are very easy to set up.
title: Great for spotting wildlife as well as human visitors.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Pete Giron
content: This thing blows away the competition in quality. I have tried several of the newer security cameras from Logitech, Arlo, and Bink. I was happiest with Nest's quality over the rest. The software is not only intuitive but they have a Android TV app so I can pull it up on my TV at any given time. The ability to enhance the picture to any area while still recording is also a great feature. Zone detection and 2 way audio is also a plus. As long as you dont mind wires, this is your best bet.
title: The only security camera to consider.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: KD Murray, M.D.
content: A quality security camera. Very easy and intuitive setup. Picture quality is very good. I tried placement on the inside of a window but the reflection of the IR lights prevented adequate night vision. A little pricey but given the quality of construction; reliability; and overall performance I feel that it’s money well spent.
title: Quality Security Camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: GULDENSCHUH
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. It was great the first two years we had it and then the picture fogged up at night we tried cleansing  it  But it’s within the camera. It was great for two years we intend on buying more cameras but it will be wireless. I tried posting a picture of night vision and Day vision but only one downloads
title: Outdoor security cameras

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Danielle
content: I set up and stalled both cameras easily. It was simple to get it up and running and then to put it up around the house was incredibly easy. However, after 2 weeks of having these camera's one of them lost signal and went offline. I have been struggling to get it up and back running since. The camera turns on however when connected to the computer, it does not come up for me to reinstall it to get the connection back. Also I have tried plugging it in and reinstalling it using the phone app and still nothing. I have completely taken it down and have been trying to get it back online from inside my office where my router is located and there is just nothing for a connection. I don't know what else to do, I have fiberoptic internet so the internet is strong, plus the other camera is still running strong. I think you have a 50/50 shot with these cameras from what i researched, such a bummer because of the hefty price tag to only get half the quality :( So disappointed!
title: I bought the Nest Outdoor Wireless Camera 2 pack and only one works :(

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Michael A. Meystel
content: Easy to install, easy to use, well designed. Setup was a breeze, usability is outstanding, image quality is nice but not awesome (it would be awesome if it were more clear when zoomed). Concerned about the magnet holding up in strong winds, and don't like the fact that an Internet connection is required, but the latter wasn't a deal-breaker or I wouldn't have bought the camera in the first place. One star knocked away for not having anything besides a magnet to secure the camera...and for demanding a king's ransom for the cloud DVR feature after the trial period ends.
title: Very Nice Camera great for non-techies

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: ProfessorRad
content: There is a massive delay that keeps getting worse. First started about two minutes from detection that I would get an alert and now its 9 minutes. My daughter walked out the front door and almost 10 minutes later if sends me an alert. Our month of free recording is almost up and I'm not sure if I'll subscribe or look elsewhere. Images aren't all that clear either.
title: Delays too long.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Kepela
content: Easy connect to my current account. I can see all three camera, 2 indoor and this outdoor, on my phone and tablet. Wide angle gets coverage everywhere and image is excellent. Night vision is excellent, notifications are great. I set up three areas, street, front yard snd front porch, I get notified what is spotted in what area. Installation was a snap, and I'm no youngster. I have FIVE different brands of security cameras in ,y home. If I'd discovered this brand sooner I'd have only two, this and a wireless version that uses a SD card for coverage when power goes out.
title: Great camera, worth every penny

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Anderson
content: The last time i had IP Cameras was about 5 years ago and they were a total nightmare to program and get to function online. These are shockingly easy to get up and running. It takes about 5 minutes to open the box, scan the barcode on the camera and view it online. Instal is also super easy it seems they really thought of everything.
title: Very impressed

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: sungjun maing
content: It has been almost 2 months with 2 Nest outdoor cams for my living house. Using Iphone7s to control. The product is very good. Almost same as their promotion video. Easy to use and install. And the built quality is very good. And I believe most of people buy this because it detects movement and let notify you through your phone and other family member. Here is my experience with "App Notification". App is great. Easy to use. Not complicate. But, when the cam see some movement, like people or car approaching, this app sends a notification. But there is almost 1 minute delay to get the notification through my phone. When you watch their promotion video, delivery guy is approaching to front door, and nest cam send notification to user, and user uses the app and talk to the delivery guy using Nest cam speaker and microphone. Which is not happening in real world. when you received the notification, they are long gone. And this notification is so sensitive, it acts by sun shade moving, falling leaves, even mosquito flying. I hope they can update software to make this key feature works as same like their video. There is a delay to get notification from your cam. And Nest didn't tell you that. It didn't work like promotion video.
title: There is a delay to get notification from your cam.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Isabelle B
content: The reason for the rating is the non-existent support. I have 10 Nest cams, 7 in, 3 out. 8 work just fine but 2 just don't have working night vision. I logged cases, received automated email saying the cases were opened, and then nothing. I followed up 3 times and still absolute silence. Each cam is almost $200, so with a 20% failure rate and no after sale service, you should think carefully if these are odds you want to risk
title: 8 work just fine but 2 just don't have working night vision

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Rocketroe
content: Chews up internet upload capacity with constant alerts when shadows move across anywhere in the image.  Factory support could not offer any settings to fix this, or even reduce the alerts.  ALERT - a shadow is crossing your lawn, is nuts, how about 40 times a day?  Not only is the outdoor camera doing this, also the inside camera as clouds cause shadows to move across the family room windows.
title: Sends out alerts every time a tree or cloud shadow passes nearby

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: T-bone Daddy
content: I have a lot of these cams and they are great quality and integrate with Apple TV (and others) for live streaming to a display. Super easy to setup. Only complaint is that the cable is fixed, there is no replacing it. This has created 2 issues. If the cable is damaged, there goes your camera. If you end up with slack then you are stuck coiling it and hanging over the camera mount which doesn't look aesthetically pleasing.
title: Very Good outdoor CAM

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Asenap
content: These new nest google cameras are so much better the older model.  I acquired my first cameras about 5 years ago. Just installed two new ones in different areas outside my house.  Comparison between the old and new proves that these cameras have improved for the better.
title: Google Nest Camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Daniel M. Ribar
content: This is another great camera from Nest / Dropcam.  The only problem I have is the length of the power cable.  I understand in some circumstances you may need it,  but we installed plugs up high to make things easy.  Ultimately we had to figure out a way to hide all that cable.  They also made all of the connections permanent (security reasons?) so no adjustments were possible. Birdhouse was the best we could do. Camera is flawless.
title: Way too much cable but a flawless camera.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: P. Soch
content: The first time that I needed to contact nest. I waited 15 minutes on hold. I got "a front desk" person who told me that she couldn't help me. This is very disappointing because I've been a customer for more than a year with multiple camera and have been self sufficient. I'm having an issue and can't contact anyone. I wish I'd chosen another vendor who cares about customers. As a side note, when I complained that I waited for 15 minutes to talk to someone who couldn't help me, she hung up on me.
title: The first time that I needed to contact nest. ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: narain
content: 25 Feb 2018 Day 1: Easily installed since my front yard support beams are made of metal. This camera can either be really good or bad because it depends on the quality and strength of your WiFi. I the best service ATT offers so it works pretty well for me with maybe a 3 to 4-second delay. I love that it sends alerts to your phone when it detects motion which reaches out quite a distance for a camera of its size. Also comes with free 30 days of the service NEST offers to save recorded footage. Will update to see if this stands the test of time.
title: Depends on the strength of your WiFi

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: antonio feliberti
content: HAVE THIS FOR AWHILE. WORKS REAL GOOD IF YOU ARE CLOSE TO THE ROUTER. I PUT IT OUTSIDE MAYBE 45 FT AWAY FROM THE ROUTER. BANG GOES OFFLINE. WAS THE SENSE OF HAVING AN OUTDOOR CAMERA WHEN YOU CAN NOT USE IT OUTSIDE.
title: WORKS IF YOU ARE RIGHT NEXT TO THE ROUTER

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Andrew
content: I currently have three standard Nest cams, I really like them. I would say the only thing I don't like, is the cost associated with storing footage. So keep in mind, one or multiple, you'll have a fee every month. Pricing it out, you may want to look into a system with a DVR. As for this specific camera, it has a much different power cable. It does have extra leanth to run where necessary. Only problem I have with it, is it's replacing one I have outside in a 3rd party enclosure, and this power cable has a large connection in the middle that will not fit through my current conduit. So I need to make some changes.
title: Good cameras. Extra cost for storing history.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Christina
content: Love these outdoor nest cameras, however I was a little disappointed, that out of the box, once you connect them, they start a free 30-day trial automatically that gives you all the bells and whistles.  You get alerts on your phone when it spots a person, hears a sound or notices any motion activity.  It also takes snap shots of the activity that you can quickly pull up and watch.  Once the 30-day trial ends, you lose the person alert and snap shots.  We liked those two functions so much that we ended up buying the subscription service for $10 a month.  We love the cameras so much that we even bought a second one.  Great camera just disappointed that I am now paying a monthly fee for its full capabilities.  I should add that the 2-way audio function is great as well.
title: Love them!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Chris Ettling
content: Good clear video images. The one complaint I have is that the notifications are slow to come to my phone, anywhere from 20 - 40 seconds after the motion has occurred. One of the cameras was mounted too far from my router, so I bought a mesh extender to extend the signal. It worked fine, but kept losing the camera after a few hours.  I ended up giving the extender a static IP address, and increasing the cameras' DHCP lease time to 4 hours.  Now the cameras and router seem to be happy with each other.
title: Clear surveillance images

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Felipe Aleman
content: I researched cameras for quite sometime for my home and Nest was the best I could find. The integration with the app, the look, and the ease of use makes this camera amazing. I would recommend it to anybody. The only negative, if you can call it that, is that there seems to be a 10 sec delay between movement and a notification on my phone. I wish it was less, but I haven't missed anything yet. I've seen packages delivered, workers arrive at my house, neighbors walk by, family arrive, and plenty more at amazing quality. Great product!
title: If you're on the fence, buy it!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Bruce S.
content: Not real happy. Set up as security camera on vacation property 200miles away. Set up was easy and it worked great for a week. HD pic and night vision were perfect. After a week it stopped working. Made a special trip up to find power supply was dead. Purchased a heavy duty supply to get it back up and running. 14 days later dead again. I am hospitalized so this repair will need to wait. Second amcrest camera on same property and network continues to run great.Will replace the nest with another amcrest ant return this useless unit.
title: Don't buy!!!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Mr. Mike
content: I gotta be honest, I dont really like this thing too much. I will keep it because I already set it up, but a couple of issues: 1. Keeps losing wifi connection 2. When a person is in sight it sometimes doesnt register anything, yet when the wind blows, it notices activity. 3. For some reason it keeps tripping my GFCI outlet On the plus side, came in great packaging, and was pretty easy to setup. Maybe I have a defective one, but I dont nkow
title: Its okay, needs work

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Kimberly B.
content: Super easy to set up and install, fantastic picture quality and love the 24/7 video.  You get what you pay for, and I don't mind paying the subscription, I don't know why people expect things for free.  I will certainly buy another for the backyard.  I did have to buy a flexible camera holder to attach the camera to my house, I didn't want to drill.
title: Super easy to set up and install

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: J. Morgan
content: The camera works well.  Motion sensing is slow to react and gives a LOT of false positives when outdoor lighting changes.  Any shadow changes will set it off.  Mine is on my front porch so it goes off every morning and evening as the sun moves. The service is very expensive. I'm installing a PoE camera system with a local controller.  It does motion sensing locally, not over the internet.  Much better response time.
title: Expensive Service, false positives on motion

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Westbrook Library
content: Comes with about 20 feet of cable so you don't need extra.  If you are going connector it to power inside the house it requires a 7/8 hole for the power connector (bad design).  You can cut a plug from plastic with a hole in the middle to fill the 7/8 inch hole.  It also recommends it be in the shade, I made a small aluminum awning to put on top of it so that it wouldn't be in the direct sun. Camera quality is excellent, assume product will handle the weather (only had it a week so don't know at this point). Notifications work well, and response time to movement is good.
title: Camera quality is excellent, assume product will handle the weather (only had ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: pugfan
content: I set up my camera today, though I have not yet mounted it.  The biggest issue I've noticed thus far is the approximately 4 second delay between actual motion and when the motion is seen on my iPhone or computer.  And after motion there is a 15-20 second period of camera unresponsiveness as the arrow goes round and round.  I guess it is buffering or something?  My download speed is about 105Mbps and my upload is about 4-6Mbps.  Would my camera performance improve with an increase in my upload speeds?
title: High latency in video is a real disappointment

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: curtkin
content: I own my own business and work from home. I bought this to keep a eye on my vehicles and shop. It's great! surprisingly the wide angle lense covers the back yard, drive way, and shop. The quality of the video is excellent.  The quality of zoom and clarity, wow I'm impressed! Just need to make sure you have a fast Internet and modem! Being away off and on gives me a way to keep a eye on everything. I have the 10 day record feature,  witch does have a monthly fee, affordable and we'll worth it. Yes you do have to pay for video recording history, but we'll worth it!
title: Happy with this cam!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Hansen Bay
content: My third Nest outdoor camera.  All are working as expected. Quality good. Hoping for 5 year minimum, 10 year life span better.  Harsh tropical environment destroyed foscam / amcrest cameras in less than 5 years. Nest is also much easier to set up and install. The mounting, configuration etc.  Only wifi is a little weak
title: Product As specified

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: travis
content: might as well stick potatoes to the outside of my home. Since Google took over nest, the app has been absolutely horrible. Removed functions, disabled settings, and generally an awful product now. 2 way voice is no longer an option. Look elsewhere and avoid these products
title: Welcome to "potato vision"

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Sky
content: Free tier only stores several hours data. Free tier is often not able to access the service (spinning forever time to time with the nest app). Not sure it is only for the free tier. Not recommending for the people who don’t want pay for the service.
title: Useless if you don’t pay monthly service

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: John Schwartz
content: Net Outdoor Camera is ok.  I have two of them.  They have a good picture and do work well with the subscription service, but I have yet to buy the service, still using the free 30 day trial.  One thing that I don't like is the cameras keep "dropping off" the WIFI connection at random. Unless your WiFi is within 50 feet of the camera, or dependent on the signal strength, that is the main negative I have with these cameras.  I had to install a WiFi extender to make one of my cameras stay connected.  The "drop off" or what the message says is "Your camera is off-line or turned off", which it is not true, is frustrating.  I had a power outage at my house for about an hour, and when the power went back on, the cameras never did turn themselves back on even though they are plugged in, couldn't figure that out.  I had to physically turn off by unplugging them and re-plug to turn them back on.  One more thing, if you use your own USB converter, you will need a 1500 (1.5 amph) milli-amp USB output connection to keep camera on, otherwise it will turn on with a 750 (.75maph) mAH, but once camera start to "work" it shuts itself off.  Decent camera, but not looking forward to paying for saved recording service if the cameras keep dropping the WiFi signal.
title: Ok camera, but not strong enough WiFi receiver on camera to match the other good features.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: SSC
content: The camera worked flawlessly for about three weeks. Now, every day or two it disconnects for no apparent reason and will not reconnect unless the router is restarted. The camera is located on a barn that has its own WIFI. I have three other manufacturer's wireless cameras nearby, some farther away from the router, that are unaffected. The WIFI signal is strong. The camera is less than 20 feet from the router. I wouldn't mind so much if it would reconnect on its own, but it absolutely will not reconnect unless I restart the router. This is a remote location, so there are no neighbors' WIFI signals, but I do use two Uniquiti nanostations to beam the WIFI signal from my house to the router in the barn, which is an apple AIRPORT, and the NEST cam is connected to the Airport. None of the other devices connected to the airport are affected. Very frustrating, because it had worked flawlessly for several weeks. Then I had a power failure for about 10 minutes, and since then it has gone down about every two days.
title: Great when it works. Frequently disconnects for no apparent reason. Frustrating.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: CFS
content: The camera is as simple to hook up as advertised. The issue many of us will run into is getting power to the outdoor unit.  I didn't want long lengths of cable running around the house, or unsightly locked outdoor covers for the wall outlet.  This solution does depend on proximity to your outdoor light fixtures, but every entrance, including the garage, will have one. I already have a Wink hub, so I added another wireless LED bulb, and a Lamp Champ USB light socket charger. Requirements: Wink hub, or other automation system that can control lighting LED wirelessly controlled bulb Lamp Champ USB light socket. Optional for electrically experienced, a shunt bypassing the switch, leaving power to the fixture on permanently. Link and program bulb with Wink system. Remove old bulb, and install Lamp Champ Install Nest Cam Plug into Lamp Champ. Perfect!  I have yet to wind the cord up, and paint the exposed portion near the lamp, but things are functioning perfectly. The Wink controls the outdoor light.  Yes, the bulb and Lamp Champ add to the overall cost, but I was not a fan of drilling through stone walls, long outdoor cable runs, etc..  And it is far cheaper than hiring a contractor to install. Plus, when we move, unscrew the fixture, remove a couple of cable clips and camera, and remove the shunt.  I did label the outside of the switch and the shunt itself.  I'll never remember in a few years...  ;-) LampChamp (2-PACK) - USB Light Socket Charger & Lamp Adapter for Cell Phones / Tablets / eReaders / Security Cameras / Anything USB GE Link Smart LED Light Bulb, A19 Soft White (2700K), 60-Watt Equivalent, 1-Pack, Zigbee, Works with Amazon Alexa
title: Easy workaround for Outdoor Nest Cam power

Will be installing 2nd camera tomorrow. At this point I am very pleased with the camera and Nest Aware and would recommend to others.
title: Very surprised at the quality of camera and video and easy installation.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Christopher McGee
content: I bought this product with the hope that it would be a simple install and good quality cameras. It's a good quality, but you're limited by your bandwidth from your internet provider. If you're in one of the many areas the Comcast has a 1 TB limitation on, you're easily reaching that point when using Nest Aware and a few cameras on High Quality. With three cameras, you would be at 900 GB a month of data usage, out of the 1024 that you get from the ISP. Another problem I had is my router's ability to connect these cameras. The cameras WILL work on either 2.4 GHz or 5 GHz, but they won't work on a router that automatically chooses which band it'll use. I have a Nest Thermostat that has no issues with my TriBand router allocating bands, but these things just would not work. I ended up having to turn the SmartConnect feature off on my router and have to connect my devices to the three different bands accordingly. This is especially frustrating as this is a feature that I actually liked having on my router, which is one of the reasons that I bought it.
title: ... hope that it would be a simple install and good quality cameras

author: D. Nguyen
content: The cameras themselves are nice, with easy installation, aesthetically pleasing design, clear image, and wide angle view. But the cloud service that you need to subscribe to in order to get a useful amount of history and access to basic features is amazingly bad. I'm inundated with alerts from changing light (like the sun coming out as clouds clear) and motion outside of my set activity zones. You're almost guaranteed to wait around for buffering at some point when reviewing recorded footage. Creating clips in the iOS app fails half the time without explanation. I'm in the Nest family already with the thermostat and many of the Protect smoke detectors, so I'm reluctant to switch cameras. I haven't tried the cloud services from Logitech or Netgear so I can't say if they're poor. I just know Nest's definitely is.
