product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Dan Ramunda
content: Really disappointed in this product.  Sure, it's sturdy and seems well made, and the video capture is good.  But it is a completely closed product, meaning you must use the Nest app, or Nest website to view the video.  You also have to use the Nest service to store your video.  This also means that all your video has to stream up to the Nest servers, and then back down to your house before you ever see it.  A double performance hit, and using up lots of bandwidth.  My other cameras all stream directly on my local network, not using the internet at all.  Much faster and more secure locally. I thought maybe there might be a way to capture video using my Sighthound application (which is fantastic), but Nest has a completely proprietary product.  I will be returning these cameras and continuing my hunt for a good outdoor security camera.
title: Good camera, terrible access to video

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: B. McAdam
content: These cameras work great.  They have good picture and the sounds is great.  However, the service is a bit slow and sometimes does not pull up previous images and videos.  Really only useful if you purchase the subscription that stores videos.  For the free service you don't get recording, so if you don't like staring at your screen all day waiting to see something it will cost you a bit more, but not a bad price to pay to not have to hard-wire and maintain hardware at your house.
title: These cameras work great. They have good picture and the sounds is ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: jp
content: So I needed some cameras... shopped a bit, then got a recommendation from a friend. Bought two 2-packs on Amazon and then I was amazed at the design (love the magnet which allows for super-easy adjustment/alignment) and the extra-easy installation and setup. Everything is included (even the clips, screws and wall-anchors) - installation and setup was a breeze! The video / audio quality is superb!
title: Super simple install, great quality video/audio - Excellent buy!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Reviewer
content: Cameras are nearly useless without additional subscription. Without the subscription the cameras will send you 150 notifications a day about movement that you’re not able to do anything about. Which forces you to disable notifications which kills about 75% of the functionality in my opinion. I would return them if I could. Now that they’re owned by google it makes them even worse - since they’re now just eyes for google. Smile!
title: Cameras are nearly useless without the additional subscription

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Pouch
content: One of my family members is concerned about privacy. Nowhere in the boxing did Nest never mentioned anything about having the capability to have an open mic to send our data to Google. “After revelations that Google failed to let consumers know of a microphone in its Nest security devices, a longtime privacy advocacy group is calling on the Federal Trade Commission (FTC) to take action. On Wednesday, the Electronic Privacy Information Center (EPIC) sent a letter to the FTC, alerting the commission of the potential consumer risk and requesting it take swift action against Google.”
title: No privacy. Don’t purchase.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: J. Robison
content: I have an older NestCam indoor model in an outdoor enclosure, so when the NestCam outdoor became available, it made a lot more sense to upgrade. The software is identical, and the outdoor hardware is done very well. STRONG magnetic connector holds the camera in place and lets you pick just about any angle. Lots of installation hardware included, good instructions, and videos on the web also help you plan things out. Camera is rock solid and works as expected. Always-on recording is key for me - not everyone offers it. If you like the indoor model, you'll love the outdoor one!
title: Just as great as the indoor one!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Ronald Kruis
content: This is my second Nest outdoor camera.  They both work perfectly, and are an excellent way to keep an eye on both our places, in Michigan and in Florida, from anywhere.  Very good picture, except when you zoom in.  Image gets blurry quite quickly.  However, I can unequivocally recommend this camera.
title: This camera serves its purpose very well.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: AV95SHOPPER
content: Love the Nest outdoor cameras best quality. Easy to install the cord is nice and long that made it easy fish threw the closes outlet. The only dislike would be the subscription $5 a month or $50 yearly. If you don’t subscribe then you only get the basic use of the cameras that’s not that grate.
title: Best Picture Quality

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Five-O
content: This camera is great, easy to install, and the features are awesome!  The two-way audio makes it even safer to be able to communicate with someone at the front door of my home without having to open the door.  The low profile look and ease of installation make this camera a win for someone that wants to protect their home with a DIY installation.  The app is easy to navigate, and the cameras reconnect after a storm with no issues!  You can't go wrong with these cameras, great product Nest!!!
title: The "outdoor" version was worth the wait!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Diani
content: Excellent.  The only glitch is on the notification. The camera didn't catch a second incident  almost at the same time as the first..  I just have one example, so when I left the house it caught that and notified me but one minute later I had a delivery come thru which didn't notify me.  I only knew this because when I came home there was a package and I looked at the time it was delivered and it was about the same time I left. The other thingy is I did not install it outside and just thru a window.  It works great during the day with light but at night it will have a circular view because I don't have a porch light that's on all the time.  It reflects off the window and you can still view footage but there is the round circle around the view.
title: Excellent. The only glitch is on the notification

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: BeerAbs
content: Tried Arlo and sent all the crap back. Had Nest cams and Arlo systems side by side. Google Nest is far superior in setup, operation, camera video quality, day and night, and the new plan gives me 5 cameras for $120.00 per year.
title: Best Security Cams out there, especially with the new Subscription plan.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Gary Z.
content: Great camera great software.  REQUIRES SERVICE which is over priced to make these cameras worth using. Does NOT record video unless you have a service plan which is overpriced!
title: Requires overpriced service to be if any value

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Kokomuffin
content: Works well until there’s a power outage and then the camera loses power and will not turn back on. After researching, seems to be a very common issue. Nest is sending a replacement but that’s not helping now, nor will it help when another storm rolls through. Do not recommend.
title: Would not buy

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Kevin Donovan
content: I gave it 4 stars only because it's a great design and works as advertised....mostly. The camera "seems" to miss things but I don't think the camera is actually at fault. I believe the problem les in the software. Quite often the camera doesn't generate a message or even post that something happened in the video history. But if you manually scan through the history you see things that should have prompted a message but didn’t. I had much better performance before Nest bought out Dropcam.
title: Good product but needs better software.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Tracey
content: I bought this because I was tired of replacing my arlo batteries, although the camera is good quality and a better sharper picture than the arlo,it won't work in my backyard in the same spot as I had arlo mounted,the wifi signal is too weak it says,so for now I just have it mounted to the house and I'm pleased with it,I'm going to try installing a wifi extender and see if that helps,so although I'm disappointed in the range it reaches it is a very nice product
title: Nice camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: kevin y.
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. 1. Picture quality is fine when normal but if you zoom in on faces or license plate it's a blury image so it defeats the whole purpose of it. 2. Always offline! they say its the WiFi connection, I'm in the same room with my phone having full WiFi connections. 3. Night vision mode very poor. 4.night time can sometimes flicker in and out of colour mode and night vision mode.
title: Needs WiFi extension near by to work!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: daiverson
content: Pros: I've used quite a few ip cameras over the years this is the best outdoor system by far.  It does everything well.  Quick and simple setup, installation, and usage.  Excellent features and quality. Cons: Nest Aware is a cloud based system to capture video and is the only way to do so.  It would be better to offer it as an option and still allow for local capture if preferred.
title: Excellent!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: raskolnikov
content: Outstanding industrial design. Installation was as easy as falling down the stairs, although I felt more accomplished after installing the Nest Cam Outdoor. Inexplicably I find myself opening up the nest app on my tablet and watching absolutely nothing happen on my front porch and feeling pretty good about how I didn't spend that time scrolling mindlessly through an Instagram feed. But really, the features are great. I love the alerts and being able to spy on my family as they come and go from the house. I like how aware people are of the camera and how they subconsciously behave better while surreptitiously glancing at that loving multi color led, behind which is loads of AI that one day will gain sentience and instead of dominating the world will just upload cat videos until the entire internet is full.
title: Outstanding industrial design. Criminally easy installation.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: My name's Timmy.
content: I love them. The only thing I wish was different? If I could mount them upside down and have the picture self adjust. I have the cords running down from the sealing and if would look a lot cleaner if I could mount them upside down.
title: They're awesome.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: OnlineShoppingAddict
content: I have other Nest products but was skeptical about these cams. Maybe it was because I've tried so many other DIY WIFI cams and they've all been terrible, but I have to say these impressed me. They're super easy to setup, keep their signal most of the time and far more than anything else I've tried, and the indoor night vision is surprisingly impressive. The only negatives I can find so far are the outdoor night vision, and the monthly monitoring fee is very high.
title: Better than I expected

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: John the Retired Man
content: After much research and testing of various video cams I ended up taking a chance on this product.  Probably because of how impressed I was with their thermostat.  I was disappointed.  This product does a remarkable job and notifies us of any activity around the entrance to our second home.  The quality of the picture both in the daylight and at night is excellent and the microphone picks up the sounds from a good 30 feet away.
title: Another Nest Technology Hit!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Jodi King
content: We bought the two-pack to keep an eye on the rear of our suburban property.  The set-up was very annoying, using an outdoor outlet while having to deal with the two fixed-length cables.  Any solution that looked good left too much excess cable to deal with or included the charger hanging out in plain sight.  I finally had to remove two deck boards and hid the excess underneath.  The size of the charger and the plug make it impossible to run the cable through small gaps; you should be able to disconnect the charger from both cables.  I installed a lockable outlet cover to protect against an intruder simply unplugging the system, but the charger cannot be more than 10 feet from the camera, so it is still vulnerable and there's no way to secure the USB plug.  The video quality is great but I'm seeing some lag between motion and alert that I have to monitor; it may have been unique to the set-up process, so some real testing is in order.
title: Very Good But Not Great

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: J. Martin
content: I want to like this outdoor cam, but I just can’t. Most annoying is lack of consistent notifications. They're either very late or not all all. If someone walks up my driveway and is at my front door I want to know immediately not 15/20 seconds later. I paid for the Nest Aware function and it does record everything.. its when I playback or just monitoring the camera that it buffers a lot. There customer service tried to resolve problems but no help. I guess I’ll keep it and work around the problems.
title: Slow Notifications/Constant buffering!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: PS03
content: I love this product. I installed a Ring video doorbell to the front of my house and a Nest Outdoor Cam behind my house and the Nest is WAY better. Set-up was a breeze, the cam hasn't been glitchy, and the app is SO easy to use. The only thing I don't like is the 25 ft power cord. I wish there was a second shorter option available. This is the only advantage the Ring has over the Nest. I've found the Ring Pro to be glitchy on occasion (it's not my wifi or set-up) and the app just isn't as quick or user friendly.
title: Love it. Beats the Ring Pro.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Angie F
content: I love this camera(s) ! So much so, that we bought another for our vacation cabin ! It's as easy as 1 screw to hold the camera and plug it into plug in ! It has easy to follow directions... It finds your wifi, you put in the password (all thru the site... I did it from my phone)... and just like that, it sees you ! The first one took maybe 10 minutes... the next one, less than 5 minutes... I get alerts when someone pulls in my drive, then if they walk up to my door... It's lots of security and lots of fun !!
title: I love this camera(s)

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: George Yefchak
content: I'm very happy with this so far. I've been running it for nearly a month now, and its working very well. Soon I'll probably turn off email notifications since I don't need to be informed each time a cat walks across our front porch, etc. The web site and iOS app work quite well. I'm confused as to why saved video clips (e.g. To post to Facebook or save for delivery to the police) don't include sound when the online footage does, but that hasn't been a serious problem yet. Curiously for a Google-owned product, the Android app sometimes fails to show live video (On a rather new Galaxy tablet) while the iOS one works flawlessly.
title: Works great. Very happy.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Victor
content: Excellent quality outdoor camera. Most people complain about too many motion notifications and Membership costs. Learn how to set your zones so notifications don’t flood your phone. Also, don’t worry about the extra membership fee. If you want the right amount coverage or memory without paying too much, go with a 5 day video memory. It’s only $5 per month. If you pay annually, it’s only $50 per year. Not exactly breaking the bank for a quality product.
title: Pull the Trigger and BUY IT

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: AshleyA
content: Have really enjoyed this so far. My husband mounted it in perfect view of the front door and it's been realiabe, offers a really clear video, and gives me piece of mind when I'm home alone with our son. I love the front door alerts we get on our phone when activity is noticed or a person. You can even create "zones" so that it only alerts you if someone actually comes onto your property, not just passing by on the street.
title: Have really enjoyed this so far

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Aak-rk
content: Don’t go with cheaper alternatives This is the best camera for the job 2 years zero problems with multiple nest cams Easy install Super recording
title: Excellent product

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Eric E
content: I can't believe that I wasted my time with the Arlo Pro camera when this is out there for $4 less (at the time of this review). Nest is better in every way. It really doesn't matter if you have any of their other products (but they work together seamlessly). As a standalone security camera, this is the best out there - both in terms of hardware quality and software design. Even the recordings are easy to access and scan for issues. A godsend when every third package gets stolen, and cars are broken into weekly.
title: A+ Product & Software Design

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Raul
content: The Nest Cam Outdoor is relatively easy to install as long as you have an outdoor power outlet nearby. Otherwise, you'll have to run an extension cord to an outlet or have an electrician install a GFCI (ground-fault circuit interrupter) outlet, preferably close to where you want to install the camera. You also have to download the Nest app and create an account but is pretty easy. The quality of the camera is pretty awesome. the only issue is paying 10dls per month to be able to see the historical information I wish It can be for free.
title: The Nest Cam Outdoor is relatively easy to install as long as you have an outdoor ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: KKams
content: Pros: The picture is so much more clear than the Arlo, Ring, and Samsung outdoor security cameras we have tried. It is recording 24/7, so even if it doesn't catch the motion you can still go back and look. The app let's you scan through the day with ease in a few seconds, flagging where it catches motion. This makes it so easy to figure out what's been happening without spending a ton of time watching through recorded footage. No battery to charge or replace, which is a problem with the Arlo and Ring cameras. It looks beautiful on the white fascia! Cons: You do have to figure out how to plug it in. We had to drill holes to get the wire into our attic, and install an outlet up there. It's not hard, but it is an extra expense. There is a charge for the cloud recording service. $100 per year for the first camera, and $50 a year for any additional cameras, for 10 days storage time. This compared with the free service of Arlo, or $30 annual fee for 30 days of cloud storage for the Ring, makes it a bit more expensive. But in the end it's not a huge cost compared with ADT or another security monitoring service. Overall, great little camera!
title: Nice Camera!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Loane Sharp
content: UPDATED: After a good and happy stint with 1 Nest Cam Outdoor camera, I bought another 5. Now my data usage is nearly 1 TERABYTE (6 * 150GB) a month. My ISP has throttled me and that's the end of that. So the cameras are almost always off. There is no setting to switch the cameras on only when they detect motion or sound. This product is badly thought through.
title: The cameras are now mostly switched off due to high data usage

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Michael M
content: the camera works fairly well, but after a few months of usage Nest reduced the free web storage to just a few hours. Now when you wake up you can't even review the entire night (8-9 hours).  I give them low scores for not providing minimum services.
title: Mainly want to sell the subscription

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Me
content: Works well. See how it hold up to summer heat. The indoor ones in a case got to hot and burned up. Nice build and quality. Did no want to run cables on outside of house so ran the USB cable through wall and connected inside. Be sure not to run the power cable through wall as that would be a code violation...
title: Why has this review not been posted?

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: CORattler
content: The good: Nice packaging. I was able to connect the camera to my wireless router. The bad: Terrible consistent 30 second lag time between movement in front of the camera and video image on my Windows PC and Samsung S5 Android phone. Made the camera absolutely useless for monitoring activity or security. My wireless signal was 7.5 up and 115 down as tested with Ookla speed test. All my other wireless devices functioned normally. I tried connecting on both 2.4 Ghz and 5 Ghz networks. Same result. I tested the camera indoors at a distance of 3 feet from router with zero obstructions. Same 30 second lag time. I returned the camera to Amazon. That process was smooth with no problems. Thanks Amazon!
title: The good: Nice packaging

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: L. Carter
content: This is a great HD camera. 1080P picture is clear and the night vision is excellent. Streaming video is great and the ability to communicate via the built in microphone and speaker is super handy. The Nest Aware paid option is well worth the $10 per month. My one request would be to make the Push Notification sound customizable on Android devices.  The way it is now, a Nest alert sounds just like a text message.
title: This camera is awesome!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Darell D.
content: Outstanding product. I started with DropCam, then NestCam. And now I purchased two of these outdoor units. They are the best yet. The magnetic mounting is fabulous, and the whole thing looks elegantly high tech. Which is great... because they both are prominently mounted at the front of my house. Front door and front of my driveway. I can't think of a thing that I'd change about the hardware (well, maybe an option to have the converter somewhere else than in the middle of the power cord).
title: Outstanding hardware and cloud support

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Berns
content: Easy to install as the other nest cameras.  The picture quality is excellent.  As they know people are going to use this outside they should have done one of two things (made the WIFI antenna better or provided a hardware Ethernet connection.  I have many of the indoor cameras but an dissaapoinyed by the external camera because of it terrible WIFI range.  Yes I know about outside walls but they could have enhanced the antenna! Took a star away for the Bad WIFI attenuation!
title: Outdoor Nest Camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: David
content: My wife was originally a little freaked out by this purchase.  Although she is all on board after we have caught people on tape stealing packages from our door and door bell ditching.  The couple instances we have recorded / reported seems to have drastically reduced / eliminated (to date) any additional instances.  Super easy to use.  Not a fan of the service feel but I used other cameras before and they were a pain in the butt.  This system just works.
title: Super easy to use

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: David P
content: I’ve been a Nest Cam user since the Dropcam days, and was excited when outdoor cameras were added to the portfolio. I can take or leave the indoor cameras, but this is the king of outdoor cameras. Easy to setup and install, and a breeze to see on the Fire TV (“Alexa, show the front door”). I’m up to three of these and even though the cloud storage is expensive, these babies give us peace of mind 24x7.
title: Super robust and reliable - no outdoor cameras come close

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Dennis Kunstman
content: Pretty good camera but is plagued with bugs.  The camera constantly flags false alerts for shadows, clouds going overhead, bugs flying through the field of view, spiders building webs, and even triggers alerts for lightning flashes.  I've pretty much given up on most of the alerts generated by this device for now until these issues are fixed.  The web version of the application to view recorded videos will often hang when trying to jump to a particular alert point but will work fine if you manually position the time marker before or after the alert event.  The product has its quirks but overall a fairly solid product.
title: Good product but has its quirks

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Thomas ABQ
content: These cameras provide excellent video day or night, and the software to monitor them is very easy to install and use.  The camera installation was also easy, except for one small flaw:  I had to bore a slightly larger hole than seemed necessary to accommodate the power plug-in from the camera to the power cord. However, the length of each part of the power cord is a good length, allowing for a good long run to a power source.  I would highly recommend these cameras.
title: Great cameras

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Ryan S.
content: Use it for front driveway and backyard. Pros: - Typical Nest/Google super simple setup - Great picture quality - nice to be able to see “Person” vs motion vs Dog vs sound, etc. - pretty good night vision - All together with the rest of my Google IoT stuff Cons: - on the expensive side - they’ve cut way back on video history unless you pay $$ - Overly sensitive to light variance
title: Great camera, good service - a bit expensive

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Martin
content: This is an awesome piece of hardware. We've had it installed only 5 days, and already it helped locate a neighbors missing cat, through its activity alerts. It was easy to send a clip of the cat walking on our patio with a few taps in the iPhone app. Image quality is incredible with a super-wide lens and 1080p quality (good wi-fi required, I upgraded to netgear orbi routers). Installation was easy as I could tuck the cord in our vinyl molding around the door. No, it's not super secure, someone could clip the cord, but by that time they're already on video. You can put a locking cover over an outdoor outlet at least. If you want a nice-looking, simple, unobtrusive security camera, and you have good internet & wi-fi, go for it.
title: After 5 days, It already found a neighbors cat!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: DD
content: Haven't had to reboot, or fix anything. Set it up once a long time ago. Set it and forget it. Very reliable and stable. Unlike Arlo which I tried and needed to reboot the camera 5 days into my trip, which kind of defeats the purpose of unattended surveillance.
title: Haven't had to reboot, or fix anything. Set ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Maz
content: Pros: - Great hardware, easy to install, great quality video, notifications, etc. Cons: - Everyone in a family gets access to all cameras. No user level permissions. If you want to give someone access to a video camera stream, you have to share it. - Shared video streams require *FLASH* plugin which means you cannot access them on a mobile OS. In summary: I am disappointed with the Nest camera because I cannot share a video feed to a mobile device. As such, my babysitter/nanny cannot view the nursery camera on an iPad which my old camera system (Amcrest) did support.
title: - Great hardware, easy to install

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Memphis GG
content: I love the camera, its clarity, ease of installation, the infrared night capability, and its dependability. However, it is triggered by shadows too easily, which is why I gave a four star. Also, the fact that I have to pay $15/month for reviewing an alert and setting zones is irritating, particularly in light of the premium price for the cameras. We also have an indoor one, which works just as well. To me, it's not worth much without purchasing Nest Aware for us.
title: Great camera, expensive, especially when you figure the Nest Aware into it.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Five 28
content: I decided to buy a security camera and initially purchased a cheaper camera on Amazon. Once I got it my adult son started telling me about the Chinese made no-name camera and how they have numerous security concerns. Apparently your live feed is streamed and anyone can view it if they know how to access the servers. I was also uncomfortable installing their software on my PC and phones. I decided to return it for a Nest Camera, which apparently is much more secure. The installation only took a couple hours, which included having to drill a 1" hole in my soffit and then climb into the attic to pull the power cord in and secure it to the rafters with the included clips. I have a light switch in the attic but it didn't have an outlet, so I went to the hardware store and bought a 2 outlet light socket adapter for a few bucks, removed the bulb, screwed in the adapter, replaced the bulb and now I had two sockets available. Once I secured the power adapter for the Nest to the rafters I plugged it in and it worked as expected. When I ordered the camera I also decided to purchase the Wasserstein "skin" product in brown to better match my house. I'm glad I did because the white camera would have stood out like a sore thumb. Now, the brown color blends in and the camera is barely noticeable. One thing that I don't care for is the magnetic mounting system. Sure, the magnet is really strong and I don't think the camera will ever fall off, but from a security standpoint I'd much rather have the option of securing the camera in place with screws so that it can't simply be pulled off the magnet. Securing the power cord is supposed to prevent the camera from being stolen but it wouldn't be that hard to design a simple mounting system that doesn't rely on magnets. As far as image quality goes, it's pretty good but doesn't seem to be 1080 quality when set at 1080. I have it now set to "auto" to conserve some bandwidth. I've noticed there is about a 3 second delay in the camera feed when viewed from a phone or PC. The digital zoom feature is also pretty worthless, as the more you zoom in the more distorted the picture becomes. I've had my iPhone sitting on my desk with the Nest app on watching the live camera feed, and the iPhone gets pretty warm and the battery runs down pretty quickly, and after around 4 hours from a full charge I start getting "low battery" warnings. Nest advertises that they have "person alerts" which reduces the number of false motion alerts that you'll get. While it does alert when people are in the camera view, in my case I've noticed that birds landing on an outdoor light fixture would set off an alert. I also agree with others about the Nest subscription options. I don't need 30 days or even 10 days. If something happens I will know about it the next day, so anything beyond 1 or 2 days is not really needed unless you go on vacation or are away from home for extended times on a regular basis. Nest should offer a 24 hour subscription option for $20 a year or a couple bucks a month, with the ability to add extra days storage on demand for a few more dollars to cover vacations, etc. I think lot's of people hesitate purchasing a Nest camera due to the necessity to pay a monthly fee. Reducing this fee as much as possible would more than likely increase sales.
title: A good camera with a few issues

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Jim F.
content: Wish Google would redesign a better cord management system (more like the regular indoor  Nest Cams) but they don’t seem interested. Dangitall. Oh well. Better then the No Names. (We have many many in use).
title: Pretty Good for its Intended Purpose.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Private Sector
content: Nest outdoor Camera and service is a joke and I have excellent up to date internet connection speed. The camera went offline every 30 minutes or so. Every time I tried to see a few days I was being asked to upgrade.
title: I'm Very Disappointed !!!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Paul S Boyer
content: Setup was simple, and the results very good.  The first day I was able to review activities which I would have entirely missed otherwise.  In this instance, I saw on the record for the day three bobcats walking through my yard.  I knew that they were around, but not that they had walked around in broad daylight.  Very exciting. So far the unit is standing up well in sub-freezing weather.
title: and the results very good. The first day I was able to review ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: iLuvAmazon
content: I got this to place on my front door to see who was knocking or ringing my doorbell. Whenever I was playing an online game (which you can't just pause) somebody would come to my door. With this, I can have either a phone, tablet or laptop near me and just glance at the camera stream to see who is there. This adds a big convenience of not having to stop what I'm doing and walk all the way to the door just to find a solicitor.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: frank buckman
content: Works well, perhaps too well.  Lightning bugs triggering sensors in middle of the night. Funny but also a little annoying.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Nex Eldessil

The free monitoring only notifies from loud noises, but doesn't let you review any past video that I can find, just pictures from when it heard something. There are WAY cheaper cameras that do more with no monthly fees. The trial period of the paid service was nice to see what it is capable of. The person detection worked well, but ultimately doesn't seem worth the fees, or the price tag.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Tamara G.
content: As someone who has tried both D-Link and Amcrest cameras in the past, I would say that these blow them away. The set up is EXTREMELY easy, I set up both cameras within a matter of minutes. Although they are pricey and the subscriptions are more expensive than Amcrest. The application for my phone works great and gives instant updates. I truly do prefer these cameras to the others I have tried.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Emily Miller
content: I really like these cameras and how easy it is to set up. I love how I can view it from my phone. From.these cameras I was able to catch the raccoon that slaughtered my chickens. The only problem I have with them is that they occasionally.go offline even though I bought a wifi extender. The one camera in my driveway had a fuzzy look in night mode. Like a circle of area that is hard to see what is going on. Not sure why because the other doesnt have this ring in nightmode. During the day I can see with no problems. At night it's just a little frustrating. I have tried wiping the camera with a soft cloth, no luck at removing the ring.
title: Easy setup, but one cameras might vision isn't good.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Norman D. Van Horn
content: The camera's were easy to install and set up on my iPhone and iPad using the Nest app.  I was surprised at the picture quality, even at night.  The two-way sound is a nice feature as well (I caught my wife by surprise when I talked to her through the camera.  I only wish that Nest didn't charge for their Nest Aware service for each camera.  I think they should charge just one fee, no matter how many cameras are connected.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Jesse Germain
content: A great wifi camera. Previously used one from Amcrest but the app, tech support and hardware created more problems than solved them. The Nest app works awesome and we have a Wink Relay at home that this works with as well. If you are looking to control additional settings however, you'll want to use the nest app. On Android (not sure about iOS), the notification bar for camera activity actually lets you slide down and see a little preview of what was detected. Very nifty! The picture is very clear and the camera is incognito with the brown silicon skin that I purchased with it. Have recommended to others and will continue to recommend.
title: Great picture, easy to use app, works with Wink

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Paul Fenn
content: Product works great! The only issue's are the app delay and delay for audio and speaking function. - The app delay points to the notifications for person's or motion being recorded. Notifications came nearly immediate when home but, most reasons for this function are for when you are not home and that delay, for us, was around 10-12 minutes which made the talking function obsolete. Which leads for my final issue, -The speaking function's delay increases based on the distance you are from the device, so it seems. This makes speaking to someone, in real time, nearly impossible.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone

The only slight problem was that the small plate that you screw to the wall (to magnetic mount the camera) had an adhesive that attaches to the foam rubber backing, which when you removed the protective cover, detached or pulled away from the foam. product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Karen Weaver

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: KA

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Herr Poopoo
content: We have a security camera system in our street- about 7-8 cameras. Old style, large white cameras which feed into a stationary server. One of the cameras died and I suggested to try out Nest. Installation was a breeze, and the image is far superior. The Nest is of course much smaller and thus very inconspicuous. I set up an account and invited other home owners from the street to join so they can monitor the street from my camera. Works very, very well. I had a Nest thermostat as well as a Nest indoor camera before so I am not surprised it is working so well. Great product!
title: and the image is far superior. The Nest is of course much smaller and ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Edward Szubinski
content: You get what you pay for. I tried cheaper wifi camera's which were not reliable. The installation was a breeze. Really love the magnetic base. The on line subscription for five days with two camera's is only $80 a year.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Monica Lopez
content: I enjoy my Nest outdoor cam extremely. I love that I can view my pets when they're going out to potty and playing with the grass and I can see if they're trying to pee on my vegetables or if they're trying to chase the rabbit or the Birds LOL The only thing I could probably say could be improved is when you try to zoom it's blurry and not as clear and the volume can be a little louder when you speak in and out of it other than that it's an awesome product.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone

The only thing keeping me from giving it 5 stars is that you have to pay a monthly subscription if you want to see anything more than a snapshot image of something (person, animal, vehicle or noise) triggers the camera to send you a notification. My indoor Logicircle doesn’t charge anything.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone

author: Matt Michaelsen

I feel the ongoing cloud recording service is pricey and would like to see that reduced. One area where I feel this is lacking is the ability to "cast" a camera stream to a google cast device. I hate to say it but since this and the casing technology are both under the Google umbrella, I kinda expect that to be there. But it isn't. Overall I'm pretty happy with the camera.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone

Now we always know when UPS or FedEx drops a box and leaves without ringing the bell (which is all the time). The SkyBell rarely triggers on them dropping a box - even though it's 6 feet directly in front of the device. Very impressed with both the app and the web interface too.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Shawn

The Camera may take up a lot of band width depending on your clarity setting, to offset the bandwidth a schedule of on/ off times may be set. The night Vision works very well, however, leaving nearby lights off at night works better because nearby lights may create glare and diffuse the field of view.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Grant H.
content: Amazing product, with amazing features, an absolute breeze to set up, and is one of the best options for DIY home security or just to keep an eye on your house and family members/ when people are coming and leaving the house.  The only downside is the price, and the fact that in order to get the nest aware service (past the 30 day trial), is to pay either a monthly or yearly fee with costs depending on whether you want 10 day recording history or 30 day video recording history.

Maybe sometime later.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone

Hiding it can be another thing-it is hard wired- so all anyone has to do is unplug it - unless you can hide not only the camera but the cord.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: TNash
content: Father's Day gift and had it set up the following day. No issues in setting up, even drilled a whole to plug the camera through my garage attic. Camera covers all of my driveway and most of the front yard. Picture is superb! Set up alerts so that I am not being bugged all day by traffic, yet will alert when spotting a person, or if something (one) is in my associated zones.
title: Very easy to set up; picture perfect.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: tim
content: This is everything it says it is and it works perfectly. One note on installation: If you have to drill through your house, you need a large hole to accommodate the end of a USB cable(about 7/8") or accommodate the plug with a slightly angled cord. The cable from the camera is 10' long with the USB end. The extension cable is 15' long with a large adapter on one end and a plug with an angled cord on the other end. We had to use a 1" mortar bit and that wasn't even a large enough hole to put the plug through because the cord is angled coming off the plug. So if you need more than 10' from the camera to the inside of the house, keep this in mind.
title: This is everything it says it is and it works ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: R. Rankin
content: I was sick of Doorbell video that didn't work.  I have Nest Indoor Cam, 3 Nest Detects and a Nest thermostat so I figured I'd try the cam.  Nest never seems to disappoint.  Easy to install, easy to setup and most important well built and reliable. My video doorbell was closer to my wi-fi extension than this cam and could never connect and stay connected.  This - 25 feet farther away connected immediately and is staying connected.  Picture is much better than any cam I have.
title: Nest never has disappointed me

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: G. brunel- Aronowsky
content: I really love my nest cameras, got a set of 2 to use at both my entries. I travel often and had issues in the past with trespassers. Now I can see who is at my home or check my deliveries. What I also liked is the fact that I was able to install them myself (older woman) .all was straight forward expect for having to drill a large hole in the wall, I did it but wishes the plug was smaller or clippable?
title: Peace of mind!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: dlsharer
content: I bought two 2-packs of these cameras. One set works fine, the other two will not work - one will not accept wi-fi during set up and the other continually cuts in and out (does not happen with any other camera on the system). These were installed by a professional electrician and all I can do is ask for tech support? I want to return this two pack for a replacement.
title: Run around

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Mr. Grumpus
content: The product is a breeze to install and link to your phone and home router.  My family has both Android and Apple phones, and both systems linked smoothly. Most impressive is the magnetic mounting that gives you easy infinite adjustment. The sound function works surprisingly well, and the night vision mode is incredible. All in all an impressive piece of engineering.
title: A well engineered product

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Tom Nace
content: Bought this for our second home in Florida, since we're not always there. Set up and installation was fairly easy. I was impressed by the quality of the picture, both during the day and at night. Even when we're in Florida, you can get notifications everytime there is "activity" identified by the camera. For instance, I could see on my phone that we got a package delivered and it was left at the front door. The only draw-back is the number of notifications you might get in a day, just from people coming in and going out of the house.
title: Highly Recommend the Nest Camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: steve
content: Great outdoor cam. Plug and play. Nest has a wide range of other wifi comparable devices that work with nest app as well. Had it for 4 months now with no issues. Nest aware is a great tool as well. I got 2 outdoor cams (costs $15 mo and can establish dif zones for alert updates/notifications). Great for those away from home often to check on the house or see/talk to the kiddos playing in yard. Could use a more robust quality cam to get HD quality from further than 20 yards away (to ID trespassers,plate #). Can hear and talk through cam but its One way speaker.
title: Worth it if your gonna modernize home

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: AmazonUser3541
content: Camera quality is high, as expected based on experience with past generations. However, Nest Cams and Dropcams have always had mediocre wireless connectivity. This hasn't improved with the outdoor camera, unfortunately. It's a convenient all in one solution that is super easy to deploy and sturdy, but I wish the wireless signal strength could be improved.
title: It's a convenient all in one solution that is super easy to deploy and sturdy

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Connie Woods
content: It's amazing how well video comes through on my phone and computer.  Even at night, it's like watching in early eve.  The sensitivity was super sensitive, until we reset it.  It notified me even when a spider crawled near the camera.  Never knew we had a cat that visited at night and hung around for a while.  I subscribed to Nest for the recorded monitoring.  This could come in handy one day.
title: Nest is AWESOME

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Philipp
content: I've purchased 4 Nest Outdoor Cam's and installed two of them so far. They have been installed for two weeks. I have mixed feelings about it so far. The Pro's: - The person recognition is incredible. It works so well. Even when it's just the back of someone walking. Outstanding feature. - The magnet mount is awesome. Let's you install the camera but still change the angle at any time. Really like it. The So So's: - the iPhone app is just ok. I find it hard to scrub recorded events. Somehow I always miss the exactact activity. Not horrible but not great either. The negative's: - constant notifications caused by shadows. No matter what I do tree shadows or moving plants will set off my notifications at least 10-20 times a day/per camera. Honestly shadows should be expected for an outdoor camera and the nest aware system should filter them out. I have stopped paying attention to my notifications and will probably turn them off very soon. So the system has effectively become useless for me from a preventive security point of view. If I could at the very least tell the app to only alert me when it recognizes a person.... but that's not possible. Either all activity, activity in a zone, or no activity. Strange. - the power cable. What a horrible mess. I actually planned my house won't security cameras in mind and now have this super long cable coiled up next to my camera because it can not be replaced with a shorter cable. Then there is that aweful power brick with yet another long cable. I get that they are trying to weather proof the system but this is a bad solution. I am using a spare iPhone adapter to forgoe their power brick. Still have to deal with the long cable, though. - nest aware pricing is just too high. I would need 4-5 cameras to monitor my outdoor area and that is going to cost a fortune. Without the subscription the cameras are pointless, though. I think nest needs to make this more affordable for multiple cameras. So for now I will keep the 2 cameras that I have installed and hope for updates that will deal with the notification mess. But I will return the two other cameras and hope a better solution will come along. I would not recommend the current iteration of the Nest Cam Outdoor. The poorly thought out power cables and the false notifications are a showstopper.
title: Power Cables & False Notifications Ruin The Experience - Famtastic Person Recognition is underutilized

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: JA
content: The camera is great but it is disappointing that you need to purchase their plan to review any events, so that is the reason for the 1 star. I would recommend the Netgear Arlo camera instead because it offers automatic event recording for 7 days for free.
title: The camera is great but it is disappointing that you need to purchase ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Subliminal87
content: Plug and play is basically what it is like to set it up.  I’ve had it for over a month now and have had exactly ZERO real issues.  The only one complaint in the power cable.  We rent so we can’t drill a hole in the wall for the cable.  So we rigged it so far.  It works and that’s what counts!  I have a YI home indoor camera, I might replace it with the nest indoor. The price per month, it’s fairly cheap.
title: Good plug and play.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Tom Backman
content: Although called an outdoor camera, I use the camera indoors.  It has no battery, or battery backup, so it must be plugged in at all times.  The setup was easy and I was able to view through the camera by downloading the app on my phone as well as logging into Nest home on my computer.  The video is clear and the fish eye lens allows me see a wide area in my home.  There is a 3 to 5 second delay in what you think you are seeing live.  I believe for this reason the two way audio does not work very well.  It works like a walkie talkie where only one side can talk at a time.  So if you are trying to talk and the other side says something, you won't hear what was said.  That combined with the 3 - 5 second delay makes communicating very difficult.  The camera tends to randomly go offline periodically, which is also annoying. THE BIGGEST PROBLEM with the camera is that it won't record anything unless you pay a monthly fee for a subscription.  Nest tries to hook you here, by forcing you to take a 30 day "free trial" to the subscription, so you have to wait 30 days to see how the camera will actually work when the subscription expires.  The subscription to "Nest Aware" that records and stores 30 days of video to the cloud, costs $10 dollars per month, per camera.  So buy a few cameras and in a few years you will be incurring costs into the thousands of dollars. This is really disturbing to me because other cameras offer stored recording to the cloud for free.  Nest is under the (Google) Alphabet umbrella, which is one of the largest cloud storage providers on the planet.  We all know it would cost them virtually nothing to allow some video storage to the cloud, but they have chosen to try to make some easy pure profits, by hooking users into a monthly subscription fee.  That really bothers me.  I will now only purchase cameras that offer free video recording storage.
title: Works - but much room for improvement

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Chad E. Harrington
content: Installation: Easy set up, four parts, just need a screw driver and ladder. The intsall is easier if you have an electric outlet close to where you plan to install the camera. Performance: This is why I did not give more than 3 stars. No zoom or swivel feature and the pixel quality for objects 10 feet in distance is poor.  However, night vision autosets, which is good. Also, it connects to wifi instantly and because it is plugged in, now worry for batteries. Ideally, I would like to see later versions include swivel, zoom, and greater video quality. Maintenance: $100 / year for cloud costs. However, you don't have to operate with video storage if your only using to monitor activity.
title: Durable & Sufficient

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Pk
content: It does not detect when someone walks up to my front door.  But notifies me when a bugs fly in front of it. Speaker does not work with Samsung phone.
title: not real impressed

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: H. Diggity
content: Good cameras with good vision, both day and night. Wish the speaker function was better, kinda sucks actually. Also, the mounting system ensures these are pretty easy to steal. Make sure they are mounted high enough to thwart that.
title: Good in all respects except for speaker and mounting.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: PrincessEm2014
content: Absolutely junk. DO NOT BUY! Will not hold connection even if placed 3 foot from the router. I thought nest would be a good investment. I was wrong.
title: DO NOT BUY!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Mr Greek Guy
content: Power cables not long enough. Had to use extension cord. Data hogging. Make sure you have a good router and good service speed.. Works well after it's setup.
title: Easy setup. You need a good router

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Wisconsin Shopping Adventures
content: Purchased for the front of my house. Super easy set up and the video feed is excellent.  I have an old HP Touchpad that we use as a monitor and it works great.  Have to reset the wifi from time to time but a minor inconvenience.  Would be a five star if I could get the video feed through the APP on my smart TV.  Will be ordering one for the back soon. Highly recommended.
title: Wow.... this cam is sweet!!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Andrew M
content: I like the camera, but I have two issues with it. I have full wifi signal by the camera, it still goes off line for about 10 min once a day. I am also disappointed that you have to subscribe to NestAware to get regular notifications. The camera is nice , but useless if you are not willing to pay the $100 a year subscription it is pretty much useless. I don't like the way they rope you into that...
title: Nice, but worthless without $100 a year subscription.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Don Rouze
content: The clarity of picture, broad vision and ability to zoom will surprise you. I am replacing 2 Netgear VueZone cameras. Wifi works well, although I did install an extender for one camera and that worked great. Two cameras syncing through 2 networks. Pretty cool! I'm using a Cable provided router reasonably too far from base. My only criticism is the night vision alerting zone is too sensitive to light and I get false alerting, Daytime is perfect and night vision quality is impressive. Two cameras 1500 miles away have been flawless at reconnecting themselves. Historical viewing is easy and I don't have to support a PC or any servers. If my power and wifi work, the cameras work with fast connection.
title: Very impressive quality, wide angle with zoom.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Sdiver35
content: Great concept, but the mounting options leave a lot to be desired. The wireless is also a bit finicky and we had to move our router to maintain a consistent connection to the cameras. The biggest disappointment is the size hole that needs to be drilled to plug these inside our home. I do like the app and review options as well as the speaker function on the cameras.
title: So far so good...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Justin R.
content: Buyer beware - don't get this camera if you want to use Nest Aware.  I'm so frustrated with setup and support.  I bought two cameras primarily to use Nest Aware for home security.  Nest support cannot get nest aware to work on my cameras.  I have been through multiple support sessions over several weeks and the issue was elevated to engineering but still doesn't work.  Their support is utterly useless.  It's even more comical that they keep offering me "complimentary 2 months nest aware service" but yet can't get the service to actually work on the cameras.
title: Their support is utterly useless. It's even more comical that they keep offering ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Don
content: Easy install and set up.  Automatically disables itself when you return home based on cell phone location.  The camera does digitally pan and zoom, which I did not realize when I purchased.  And it sends instant alerts to your phone when it senses movement.  I have this installed in my second home, and it gives much more peace of mind than an alarm system, because I can see whats happening when I get an alert, and know if I need to do more.  I also set it so I can see out the window to monitor the storage shed and the lawn maintenance.  Pricey initially, but worth the money for the peace of mind.
title: More Peace of Mind than an alarm system

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: RickWAllen
content: I was impressed with the Quality and  clever cupped-magnet camera mount. This ingenious magnet Mount allows easy extremely versatile aiming of the camera. In fact I would say this is the best security camera mount design anywhere as far as ease of positioning aiming Etc. In the cup magnet it's a really solid grip on the curved camera and leaves you pretty convinced that it's not going to move on its own. Another big positive for this system is the account setup which provides for email forwarding of alerts images Etc. It's very easy to do. The extra long cabling is to provide easy installation for people with outdoor power outlets that are not close to the mounting position. I really admire this company Nest, for  going off in a New Direction and being Innovative and creating a quality product. Really Everything You Touch speaks of quality materials and refined engineering. I did not try out the audio system the speaker and microphone but this is a nice thing to have for doorway entrances. Some Cons: In this day of  free cheap CLOUD memory everywhere, it is unreasonable that this company charges $100 a year for cloud storage. Unfortunately Nest only provides that one storage option and that's not reasonable for people like me who are sort of techies who like SD cards and FTP storage Etc. Also the camera enclosure does not meet any outdoor  weatherabilitie standards, Iso etc, all it says it can handle rain. And Nest  warns about image function in very cold and very warm weather situations. We get bitter cold sub freezing blowing snow sleet dust everything up here. Really hot humid Summers. So I ended up going to a different camera with a more weather proof housing, and that allows free cloud storage or onboard storage or your own FTP storage.
title: Great clever quality design but $100 cloud storage is unreasonable.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Jason D
content: I highly recommend this camera. I keep it recording on 1080p, and it records very high quality video. I also have the cloud plan making it very easy to scroll back through the history to see the video from any time through the day. I also love the alerts it sends to know instantly if there is activity. Installation was also very simple. The only hard part was drilling a hole through my garage wall  in order to run the wire inside to plug in. And the magnet makes it very simlpe to point any direction you'd need. Highly recommend.
title: I highly recommend this camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: CSantoya
content: Very easy to set up. This unit has very smooth, clean lines and a very solid feel. The app is the icing on the cake. I would definitely recommend this camera to someone who doesn't want to spend all weekend installing a security system. We have two & both were so easy to install & connect that, when I was finished, I felt like I had forgotten to do something lol it's really that easy.
title: Very happy

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Otis Lift
content: Nest has finally released a weather resistant camera. And she is a beauty! Connectivity is quick and easy. What ever their engineering department did was a major improvement. Everyone has different walls and distances to cover to connect with their router, but mine is 200 feet away and works wonderfully! Nice job Nest. Can you make them in camouflage or at least black???  Including the power cord?
title: Worth the money. Works very well !

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: BayouGuy
content: I love my new Nest Cam. My brother uses Nest products for his business and recommended The new Nest Outdoor Cam. This is my first security camera and it couldn't be any easier to install and setup. I rolled up the extra cable nice and neat, secured it cable ties and painted to match the house. Unless I tell someone it's there, they never notice the camera or the wire.
title: Nice!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Flying Spaghetti Monster
content: This is my 3rd Nest Camera.  I bought one for home and 2 for my office spread out over one year.  Easy install and $50 for each additional NestAware is a great bargain for me.  I might purchase at least one more.
title: My 3rd Nest Cam

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: BAM
content: The camera is well built and the setup process is about as easy as a wired camera setup can be. The quality of the image is pretty good and there isn’t even a dip in quality when night vision switches on. Overall I’m very pleased with the camera itself. I do however Nest would offer more competitive pricing on its Nest Aware subscription. You have to pay per camera $100 a year for the first $50 a year afterwards. It’d be nice if they would bundle a few cameras in like Netgear does with Arlo.
title: Good quality, easy setup.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Andrei Baboulevitch
content: Keeps recording for a few days, marking the places, where the motion was detected. It allows to zoom the area of interest and select zone(s) to detect the motion. The picture quality is great. So far it works nice under the low temperatures, snow and rain, although they seem to trigger a motion detecting condition. Nest app integration is smooth and nice, although you may consider to use you PC/Mac browser to get the maximum resolution and better history viewing options. Email motion detected notifications provide a link to the exact video history and indicate if the motion was detected in the zone you may select.
title: A superb camera, nicely integrated with Nest app

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: William C. Harding
content: These are my 2nd, 3rd, and 4th outdoor Nest cameras, where I was so pleased with my first one, that I decided to order more. That said, the silicon skins are a perfect addition to my cameras, such that fit nicely and blend well with the various AZ house colors.
title: Great outdoor cameras and very innovative adaptations

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Read & tweet
content: Works as expected. For some unknown reason, it tends to be offline intermittently for no apparent reason. Wish its memory can be stored in a computer but I can also see why the company would want to steady stream of income by requiring the customer to subscribe to a cloud service. Still cheaper than having an active monitoring service however.
title: Works as expected. For some unknown reason, it ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: frank
content: Very clear picture. Easy set-up. Does exactly what is advertised. Connected to my WiFi immediately. 2nd Nest camera that I own. Although pricey, much less than a home security service that would provide nothing in addition to what the Nest offers. Alerts your phone and email immediately when there is activity. Considering everyone carries a cell phone, perfect use of technology.
title: 2nd Nest

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Abiola ALABI
content: Without Nest Aware, it looses a lot of functionality. Why do I pay that much for a recording device if I have to pay extra for it to record. Imagine buying a shovel and they charge you extra every time you dig a hole with it. Nest Aware is a ripoff. The device should at least be able to record and save any activity detected, including 30 seconds after the activity stops. With a maximum of 12 recordings (or a maximum recording size allowed) that automatically deletes the oldest recordings once new recordings are logged, unless a recording is saved.
title: Without Nest Aware, it looses a lot of functionality ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: R. Gimmel
content: Great video resolution in both night and daylight.  An decent quality camera.  But for unknown reasons Nest failed to design a rain visor into this camera.  As a result, performance is significantly devalued in the rain as drops cloud the lens. (See pic.)
title: Performance suffers in the rain

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Adam Wineinger
content: Easy set up out of the box with my iPhone app.  I mounted it on the edge of the roof without any problems.  The cable ran down the side of the house and I plugged into an outdoor outlet.  The camera direction is super easy to adjust (magnetic base).  Video feed is high definition and looks great.  It will alert you to either movement detected or a human was detected on your phone.  Really nice product.  Plan to purchase 2nd unit for the garage.
title: Backyard camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Fox_1
content: Awesome security camera!  Nest now offers a 5 day cloud subscription service for $3 a month after your free 30 day trial.  You can also bypass the cloud subscription and get the Blue Iris software dor your PC and get subscription free security monitoring recirded to your PC's hard drive.  I personally prefer the cloud to store my security footage.
title: Great security camera!
