product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: NMS
content: I have 3 nest cameras.  1 outside and 2 inside the home. These cameras perform very well. The picture quality is much better than others I have tried. I wish the Services’s cheaper but the cameras themselves are great!!
title: Excellent cameras.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: KevinNJ
content: Pluses and minuses. They ask you to drill a 7/8th hole through the side of your house, no thanks. So you have to cut the cable, and spend 30 minutes soldering the tiny wires back together, now you drill with a 5/16 hole, much better. After splicing all is good. nice clear picture, good sound and mic usage. The physical camera set up and mount is great, really smart. Had some difficulty pairing it to my home network but it got it after a few attempts, def not smooth process. The subscription isnt cheap. The camera WITHOUT the PAID nest subscription is of very little use, almost useless. The paid nest subscription is stupid expensive, especially when you start adding more cameras. I love the performance of this camera, would love to add many more to the outside of my home but the nest subscription cost is holding me back.
title: pluses and minuses

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Dakramsta
content: Works great, just remember that you have to have a subscription to really get good use out of it (unless you can hack to back up the recordings.) This can add up if you have quite a few cameras, plus it will chomp your data as it has HD recording mode.
title: Works great, but need a subscription

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Robert J. Bohls
content: easy setup, good quality video.  can't get the 2-way sound to work Nest servers went down THE DAY I signed up to extend Nest Aware past the free trial & I lost access to live feed.  12-hour outage resulted in my having bought a useless product. I don't understand how or why an IP camera needs to rely on an outside system to work edit: 3/21/2018.  and the camera is DOWN again.  not sure if it's the Nest Aware network or not, but it seems to happen in inclement weather.  last time it was rain, this time a snow storm.  what good is an OUTDOOR camera that won't work in the weather.  our camera isn't even exposed to the weather, it's under our covered porch.  deducting another star
title: if the Nest servers somewhere "in the cloud" go offline, so does your live feed

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Jamie
content: This is fine if you have rock solid wifi at every camera. I have several camera at the fringe that I expect to drop in and out. But it fills my email inbox with no option to shut off the notification stating signal was lost. Poor forethought by the  PM team. Switching a system that lets me mute fringe cameras
title: This is fine if you have rock solid wifi at every camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Moresby
content: Works very, very poorly. Almost non-stop buffering and 10 seconds out of every 90 is in blackout. When it is transmitting, the delay makes it almost useless.
title: Almost useless.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Y. Parekh
content: This was probably the best purchase I made after reviewing a whole bunch of options and taking months thinking about it.  I bought a set of two and I going to buy another one for indoor use.  The whole thing took 15 minutes to set up.  I still need to optimize the position but hookup and running thru wifi was a cinch.  Picture and sound is excellent.  Monthly subscription is a bit pricey, $15 per month for two, but it is worth it.
title: Great Product

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Luke
content: Unbelievably precise system. Has saved us countless times being able to talk through it to folks standing in front of our shop who didn't set an appt and dropped in. Obviously it's great for security too, but the way it works with the app on the phone in both real time and clips is too good to be true! We don't worry about our alarm anymore because this service does it all. It's small and inconspicuous, but the clarity and zoom options have saved us $1000's in possible theft and damage because we're always there now, even when we're not!
title: Were there, even when we're not! Our 3rd set of eyes!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Mike P.
content: Wow.  The quality of video on this camera is superb and I really like the alerting when it sees activity in an area you identify.  I wish the online storage service was cheaper, but frankly the fact that it records 100% of the time and stores it in the cloud so I don't have to deal with an NVR is very nice.
title: Love it!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Melissa B.
content: Camera was easy to set up & install.  I love being able to see the activity at my home when I am not home (and even useful when I am home).  My internet service isn't the greatest in my area so occasionally the camera will go offline.  I have already captured a stranger checking out the contents of our mailbox while we were away on vacation.  Unfortunately the angle wasn't enough to see a license plate number.  I just bought a second camera for another angle.
title: Enjoying my new Security Camera!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Andrea allen
content: The camera constantly goes offline, which is frustrating because I cannot refer back to it when something happens to by car outside. It also sometimes glitches and won’t let me save the video or see it.
title: This is a frustrating device

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Edward Irving Hughes
content: ok when it stays conncected to internet. Nest has a nice monitoring/cloud fee system $150 for the first camera, and $50 each additional camera.  Well. if you come from a Q-See system such as my self with 16 cameras this would be a hearty bill of $900 month, and I am still paying for all the internet upgrades to handle all of the wifi singnals that would have to accommodate the cameras
title: I am on the fence with this product.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Stude
content: Easy to set up and get running. Literally within minutes of opening the box they were working. They really add a sense of security and piece of mind to my wife and I. Our family room is towards the back of the house and now we can see what’s happening at our front door without having to get out of our chairs.
title: Easy get set up and running.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: W. Williams
content: First Nest cam. We now have 2 one for the Front and one in the Back. Set up was easy. It took less than an hour per camera. High quality video and a great App make it worth it. it's just mount and route the wire then set up the Nest App. You will need to have some tools if you are going to go through a wall for power to outside cameras.
title: Set up was easy. It took less than an hour per camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Sheri L.
content: This thing is pretty freaking cool.  We had used some Nest products before, so we knew that the product was going to be up to that same standard.  The subscription part kind of sucks if you want to have the video stored and available, but the other features that are free are excellent.  All alerts are able to be customized, so if you get sick of any of them, adjust or turn them off.  Setup was really easy and went quickly and smoothly
title: Handy little camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Crissie Wisdom
content: Delivered on time and as advertised.  I love this product, it is easy to use, the website is excellent., but it cost $30 - $50 dollars per camera to use their recording and storage tools.
title: Easy Setup, easy to view - will cost you if you want to record.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: jec
content: I installed two Nest Cam Outdoors in wife-and-daughter's horse paddock across town.  Since there was no electricity and no internet I needed to run it off a solar panel / controller and mobile hotspot.  Nest tells you not to do this - if you leave the two cameras on full time they'll use 240GB of data per month, but if they're only on for a half hour or so a day (to check the horses at feedings, or in the morning or evening) they'll only use 1/64th of that.  In practice they're on even less - a minute or so a few times a day to see what they're doing.  Current consumption was much less than the 1.5A spec.  They work perfectly. Here is a picture of the solar controller with voltage and current running the two cameras.
title: I installed two Nest Cam Outdoors in wife-and-daughter's horse paddock ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Osprey
content: I just installed and paired three cameras. The quality of the product exceeded my expections. Pairing to my existing WiFi went flawlessly. The fit and finish of the camera is outstanding and it blends fairly well with my house. I did purchase the colored skins to help the blending. If you are a DIY person, be sure to plan the installation. I brought the power wires inside, which required some holes in my house and some mounting blocks. The quality of the picture is outstanding and the live streaming as well as the alerts is very good. For home use, the 10 day loop is all that's needed. I also like the motion and sound alerts. The app is easy to use on my iPhone and iPad. All in all, this product and its support has exceeded my expectations.
title: Excellent value

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Angry sponge
content: Excellent Product and highly addictive. I had been researching and drooling over the Nest Cam for some time and then finally pulled the trigger after they launched their outdoor camera. Easy set up and super easy app. The notifications can be a little much. I know I can turn them off, but why would I want to. I haven't figured out the best way to file the email alerts either. I'm sure I will. I can't stop watching my cam. I highly recommend this camera. Test your WiFi first for a good signal. You may need a range extender.
title: An excellent product

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: G. Kuyat
content: Subscription is really needed to get value out of these. Given that, they are really expensive. Installation is a pain, because you need power to them. Most installers I spoke with won't do the electrical needed. These should be offered for much less cost, with a required subscription. What you have here is expensive and kinda works without a subscription.
title: Too expensive given that subscription is essential

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: D. Rusk
content: 5 Star for the 1080p view clarity. 5 Star for ease of installation 1 star for the ability to distinguish swaying trees and shadows from people. 1 star for the Nest app functionality compared to the old Dropcam app. I've had a Dropcam for several years, I hope the Nestcam is as reliable.
title: 5 Star for the 1080p view clarity. 5 Star ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Paisleysdaddy
content: Setup was easy, as was mounting under the soffit of my garage. I was hesitant to spend this much on a camera at first, but now I'm glad I went this route. The interface is easy to use, and RELIABLE! Previous camera's that I've used didn't seem to have reliable cloud storage, but this one has been excellent!
title: Setup was easy, as was mounting under the soffit of my ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Heather
content: This camera gives me so much peace of mind. It was relatively easy to install on the roof/wall corner of our porch and we have the power source plugged into our porch light, using a light socket adapter. The only down side to this approach is that our porch light must remain on at all times to supply power to the camera, but we were able to avoid drilling a hole through the outer wall to plug the camera in inside the house, or risk plugging it into a porch outlet where the power cord could be cut or unplugged by a motivated thief. The camera provides a very clear picture and the notifications when it detects motion, a person, or sound that are sent to our phones, gives us great peace of mind, with our first house. We supplemented the nest outdoor camera with an indoor one inside, as well, and feel much safer and protected with our ability to monitor things at hoe while we are away. The added bonus of being able to communicate with delivery professionals when they drop off a Christmas package (telling them the best place to put the product, etc.) or yell at our cat to get off the kitchen counters had proved invaluable. Setup through the Nest app for both cameras, and our Nest Thermostat as well, was a breeze and makes checking on everything at home so simple. I really feel good about this purchase and have recommended it to a few other friends who are buying a house nearby. I do think I should add that I am merely a happy customer, and I paid full price for this product and all others, and was not asked to write a review, but did so due to my own appreciation for the product.
title: Peace of mind and easy to use.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Rilodile
content: Easy to install, clear picture, and great night-vision. App is clear and easy to use. Supports multiple indoor and outdoor Nest cameras. Highly recommended!
title: Excellent product!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: LTJFan
content: My one complaint is that you have to pay the yearly fee to access past footage.  You would thing now days with the amount of free cloud storage out there they would give you a few days free and charge for longer term storage.  I would get additional cams but don't want to have to pay the fees.
title: Great except for the yearly fee.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: J Hill
content: I tried another, less expensive, system and wasn't pleased.  This system is great!  Clarity in the day time and using night vision is very good.  My husband did the setup easily and he's definitely not a techy.  We have 2 cams at our second home and one went out after a power outage.  I haven't been able to start it back up from here.  Overall, I highly recommend.
title: Purchased another system and wasn't pleased. This system is great

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Chad Smith
content: Can’t use because in order to put through the wall I would need to drill a hole triple the size of the cord . It’s so big and doesn’t detach from either ends so you either plug it in the outside of the house or put a giant hole through your house .
title: Fix the plug!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: dawn
content: These are amazing.  So pleased with the purchase.  We looked at confusing camera reviews for a year before finally finding a review in PC Magazine where these were the editors choice.  Fantastic packaging, easy to install.  Seamless communication through app to android.  We have one each for the front and back of the house.  They show up on a split screen like command central.  We receive alerts in seconds when activity is noticed and can click on a snapshot that plays back the activity.  The do go offline for a few minutes periodically, but I think that is due to the internet speed not keeping up with the Internet of Things.  Highly recommend!
title: These are amazing. So pleased with the purchase

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Michael S. Gallela
content: Had a NetgearArlo and had problems with audio smearing and audio being lost. Set this Nest up side by side and it is a better quality video, audio is a little less quality, and i have had no issues losing anything. The Arlo would go out, audio and video and the NetCam would be fine... no issues. Not sure if its a better quality unit or better antenna arrangement for wifi or what , but it works better for me.
title: Set this Nest up side by side and it is a better quality video

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Albert Wong
content: People complain on the price but if you want a quality lens, quality features and apps that work, Nest still is the best.  The only downer (or benefit depending on your view) is that there is no local storage and cloud only option.  Personally, my family has been robbed before and the first thing they damaged and took away was the camera DVR so I'm all for cloud storage.
title: Nest still is the best. The only downer (or benefit depending on your ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Rufus Cleetus Ledbetter
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Camera less than advertised. Service and support way way way miserable and pretty much non existent. Eventually you will decide it’s A waste of time then realize how much in the hole you are on camera expense.
title: No service no support for less than camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: ComplineBelle
content: Best outdoor security cam on the market! So easy to set up. We have Kunas and liked them, but once we put in a Nest we fell in love. Now have three running and plan on a fouth. Great quality video, very good night vision, SO FREAKING EASY TO SET UP! Can't rave enough about my cams.
title: Can't rave enough about my Nest cams

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Valentin M. Amboy
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. I want to give it 5 stars but its connection to the wifi is spotty and sometimes at the worst time. Twice it went out when someone i didn't know was approaching my door. I think if its wifi transceiver was built into the plug its chances of keeping the connection would improve because usually the plug would be indoors. As a plus it might even make the camera a little smaller.
title: Great picture quality, wifi range not so much.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Sergey Rasskazov
content: We have bought this camera to control our backyard: somebody ate our roses. It works, we catch the squirrels ) But there is a big delay. We have notification after a couple minutes of event. If we try to speak something with camera using - it is another couple seconds delay. It is not realtime system.
title: It makes a good picture

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Maestro
content: We replaced ADT wired cameras with these units.  Installation was very easy if you have 'no drilling' access to an outlet, the phone app is ok, the cameras deliver good video day and night, and the 2-way audio is a nice feature. We are planning to purchase more. Don't know how it compares to other brands, but we are very satisfied as long as they continue working.
title: Nearly fool proof installation and performs well.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Joe Zhou
content: the box was opened when I get package and the box was damaged two conners. so bad. the guy who delivered package said, I got this like now....
title: product is good but not delivery this time

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Lynn Garcia
content: Works great and sound is perfect.  We can hear people talking as they walk by or approach the house.  We have it mounted over our driveway and receives the wireless signal from inside the house just fine.  Night vision works perfectly.  My only wish is it had the ability to be connected via LAN cable in addition to wireless.
title: Works great and sound is perfect

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: jc
content: Love this camera with Nest Aware to add motion zones and intelligent alerts. There are a couple of things that bother me: there's two-way mic/speaker but it's not exactly as sharp as you'd expect, there's a delay and you can't talk at the same time that the person is talking and the delay is pretty noticeable, maybe a second. Otherwise it's always on 24/7 and recording which I find a huge selling point.
title: Loving it so far

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Jeff Chandler
content: I wished I had know this ia a closed, proprietary system.  It works fine, but you can't archive your own video content and have to pay for their service. You can't capture video on your own computer.  Images are nice.  Installation is intuitive. I just wished I had spent the money on something that didn't have an annual maintenance fee associated with it.
title: Proprietary system, inflexible.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Kerri
content: Easy to install, easy to set up on the app. Great picture and sound quality. Like being able to get specific notifications if the camera spots movement, a person or sound. Piece of mind when you are away from home so you can always know what is going on. Also nice to see who is coming and going and at what time.
title: Great camera system.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: AB
content: I am literally 15 ft from my router and it wont get signal.  Its meant to go outside therefore it better have damn good range....NOT.  Dont waste your money, nest biulds poor products
title: Incredibly POOR range

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: S. J. Stricker
content: Compared to our neighbors' cameras, our images aren't clear. Unless we know who is on our porch, we couldn't use the images for identification. It's more of a toy for us than a security tool.
title: Images aren't clear

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Josh Gatrost
content: Best camera. Pros: Easy set up and the App is free and easy to use, great video quality day and night, two way audio the microphone in this camera picks up sound extremely well, you get everything you need for mounting it in any place you want. Cons: I have not really found any cons Nest is one of the best cameras and company I just wish Nest would send me some products so that I can have a complete Nest connected home quicker.
title: Best camera on the market

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Sonora
content: Great product with good daytime picture. Night time video is difficult to make out faces. A bit disappointed about that, but overall decent product for the price range.
title: Decent

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: amazon user
content: Do not buy. Biggest buyer regret. It never worked. I bought 3 and all wouldn't work. They just don't install. But Ring connected and works great. And nest customer support is non existent. I never got a response nor a refund.
title: Night mare to install never worked

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Michael Cavazos
content: I'm impressed with the Nest Cam.  It was easy to set up and the video quality is better than I expected.  The Nest Cam is perfect to keep an eye on my dog while I'm at work.  The two-way speaker allows me to voice commands to my pet.  I plan to buy another to set up at my parent's home to keep an on on them since they are elderly.
title: Pleased with the Nest Cam

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Charles N. Stone
content: The Nest Outdoor Cam is a game changer. I've been naive as to the traffic of people and animals that pass by the front of my house. Having a camera has been amazing. I get an alert on my iPhone and know a solicitor stopped by my front door. I also now know why my flowers are having trouble blooming as I get nightly visits from Mr. Bunny Rabbit. I love this camera. It is beautiful and function.
title: Game Changer

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: ssmith
content: I am a huge nest product fan.  I have several.  Amazon has them priced better than most retail locations.  They are easy to install and set up.  Pic quality on the app is clear and connection is reliable.  I would HIGHLY recommend nest products over other products.
title: LOVE NEST

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: LiLi
content: It’s a great device if you pay for the membership, without the membership you cant replay things which is a feature you defiantly need. It also detects motion when nothing has happened which is weird because the  description says it knows not to detect motion from things such as trees.
title: Good until free trial of membership is up

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Amazon Buyer
content: Camera works flawlessly.  Unfortunately I've been trying to connect to their subscription service, Nest Aware, for six months and it still doesn't work, the orders keep getting cancelled.  Endless calls to Level 2 support, non-English speaking techs, 45 minute hold times and a hang-up.  Simply the worst.  Why should it be so difficult to actually pay a company for a service???
title: Camera is great, service is THE WORST

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Alex Stoops
content: An exceptional product. I was looking for a wireless HD security camera solution and was thrilled when Nest announced they would be making an outdoor security camera. I already use Nest thermostats to monitor my heating/cooling so it was a nice integration to add the camera to the system. The camera and thermostats are all controlled by the same mobile phone application. The clarity of the camera is exceptional and the performance on my wi-fi network has been outstanding. I use it to monitor my driveway so I can check on my kids coming and going, people and/or cars coming up the driveway and, in the event of snow or bad weather, check on the conditions. We have had some cars broken into on our driveway so the ability to record 10 or 30 days of video on their cloud servers is a big plus.
title: Exceptional outdoor HD wireless security camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Derek D.
content: Best camera and app on the market. I have 6 nest cameras, thermostat, and 3 smoke detectors. All work flawlessly together in one app. I know a lot don’t like to pay for services but I feel it is worth knowing what is going on outside my cottage 24/7. Also I have tried many other brands of cameras and find everything under 1 app makes all the difference.
title: Nest cameras work flawlessly with other nest products under 1 app

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: SF Native
content: Works like a charm, and easy to install. Plugged right in to a socket outside, and has been running ever since. Picked the 5-day plan for $50/year, and great deal for security at our home.
title: Works like a charm

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Robert Allen
content: Simple to install, position and setup - the picture is crystal clear and the night vision is really good. I love them. The app is functional but my only complaint is the cost of the 30 day playback service - it’s way overpriced at $10 a month per location. So if you are monitoring more than one property on the same account you end up paying way more than is reasonable.
title: position and setup - the picture is crystal clear and the night vision is really good. I love them

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Brett
content: This is my second outdoor next can. Easy to set up, love the app and never any issues. It’s good quality so I highly recommend
title: Works like expected

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: pilose
content: Nice picture, easy to set up, power cable is long enough.  Loses one star because it wants to auto-adjust to brightest lighted area and balance of view field is then too dark to see much detail.
title: Nice product but avoid stark contrasts in lighting.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Pamela Wilson
content: I initially cheaper out on another camera and that didn't work out for me. Spent what I thought was a lot of money on this camera and after using it I can say it's worth every penny over going cheap. The hardware and software are top notch. Furthermore as a renter a camera that I can hang from a rain gutter via magnet mount is awesome!!
title: Worth every penny

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: AW
content: I've installed other security cameras and the setup/ integration with the applications has taken hours. With Nest, I had it out of the box, installed and ready to go in less than an hour. Everything you need is in the box. I recommend adding a locking outlet cover if your plugging it in outside. Also make sure you mount the USB to power source box high up so it can't be tampered with. Great picture, Awesome design. Very pleased early on. Looking forward to exploring the app/ online capabilities with Nest Aware.
title: Quick and easy setup!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: LavaBoy
content: Cost of Nest Aware is Very costly.  Camera not very useful  without that service.  I have other cameras that work just as well and are much more economical using sd cards.
title: Nest Aware is VERY expensive.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Adrian Roberts
content: Setup was flawless.  Video quality and wide angle lense are great.  My only gripe with this product is the cost of the subscription service.  The product loses functionality without the service.  Can get pretty pricey with multiples outdoor/indoor cams.  Nest should cap the cost at 4 cameras.  So same flat rate for 4 or more cameras.  It would be great if Nest offered a yearly discount.  The cost of service is the only thing preventing me from buying more.  Would be great if Nest offered a pan and scan feature.
title: Great camera but clostly subscription service.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Bear Rios
content: The camera is a decent camera. I bought the two pack of nest cams and one of them doesn't seem to stay on as the other one does. It constantly says camera offline! So frustrating.
title: Two pack cameras. Both don't work the same.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Jiah Quayle
content: This is my second nest outdoor camera. They provide an excellent picture day or night. They also have sound, I would give the sound 4 stars but still decent. Setup can be quick and easy or a little harder depending on location of the device and availability of power. Being a custom home builder the installs were easy. I recommend this product to all of my customers as well as the other nest products.
title: Excellent camera and easy to set up

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Spartacus
content: Excellent outdoor Cam that has high quality video and sound and allows for two way communication via the device.  The only downside is the power requirement as I would prefer a battery powered option (even though I would need to change the batteries periodically).  The corded power is a bit unsightly for my particular home and I don't want to have to drill any holes to provide power from an interior source.
title: Great Quality - Easy to Set Up and Use

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Jeffery
content: Not much more can be added to numerous reviews already posted.  This is my 5th camera so I now have the "Castle" :) pretty much completely under surveillance.  Adding these cams to Nest app is almost too easy and that's the way I like it.  Clear as a bell on video and audio is clear as well.  Would and have recommended to family and friends. Can't go wrong.
title: Perfect in every way...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: James R Dunlap
content: It is very sensitive and doesn't miss a thing. Ijike the fact that you can program it to cover spefic zones.
title: The Nest camera is one great security tool

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Melissa L.
content: I love this. It was incredibly easy and quick to set up. I love that all the hardware I was going to need to install it (minus the drill) came with it, which saved me a trip to the hardware store. The camera is unobtrusive and looks great so you cant even tell its there if you dont know where to look. The instructions were simple and clear for both installation and setup with the app. I already had a Nest thermostat and I like that the controls are all in a single app. The motion and sound alerts are FANTASTIC! Saves me a lot of missed package deliveries. The wide angle lens allows me to see my entire yard, driveway, and entryway and the clarity at night is surprisingly crisp. Overall, very happy with this purchase.
title: Its a winner!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Shigva Bayarsaikhan
content: Its a very well made design. The quality is excellent. Was easy to set up and install. The reason i gave 3 stars is there is history or recording unless you pay monthly/yearly subscription . I think the product itself is already costy and to charge for more is just greedy.
title: The quality is excellent. Was easy to set up and install

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Rachel L.
content: I bought this camera for my home and it works great.  But when I decided to try it out as a live video feed for a genetics unit I teach in an elementary school it worked exceeded my expectations.  The clarity of video, night vision and option to create clips from recorded footage have helped augment this learning experience.  It is easy to use, durable and reliable.
title: Exceeded Expectations

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Jesse Cleaver
content: Can't beat Nest Cams for features and reliability.  My Arlo died so I got this one.  Took a little work getting the power cord through the wall and sealed up but now I have reliable coverage of my front door. We get a lot of deliveries from Amazon and elsewhere at the house so I wanted to make sure our front steps were always monitored.  Nest products are always very well designed, thought out, and reliable.
title: Can't beat Nest Cams for features and reliability. My ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: KRAH
content: Wasn't sure if I was going to do a whole security system or not. I decided on the Nest outdoor camera. It has great video quality in day and night. Controlled from phone and easy for me to set up out the window. To record video or get alerts, you have to sign up for $10 a month ..just fyi ..but you get a 30 day trial when you first set up.
title: Peace of mind..

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: SEC
content: Ok
title: Ok

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Shy Lev-ari
content: I've been thoroughly enjoying this security camera. Too bad the monitoring ha s a subscription included (its not really worth it without it) but i guess i would have payed more for a security company, and this way i have more control. Hopefully in the future the 10 day subscription will be less than $100 a year
title: Too bad the monitoring ha s a subscription included (its not ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Michael Mendoza
content: Awesome outdoor camera! Put one in the front and one in the back of the house. Awesome quality. I opted for the $50/year deal per camera. Love these cameras!
title: Great outdoor cameras

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Jason
content: I purchased the 2 pack in Nov 2016. While one is still working great, the other one died on me last week. A little over the 2yr warranty period.  I see that rain water may have entered through the USB connection. I've had it mounted under the eaves as recommended but I guess the rains were too strong last Winter.
title: Worked great for 2 years

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Fred G.
content: Bought two cameras. One works and one keeps losing connection. Spent long time on phone with call rep. He finally agreed to replace it, but it never arrived. Would never use nest cam again.  Costly to have more recording options.
title: Poor quality product and service.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: kevin harris
content: It shipped without a mounting bracket. I still wanted to keep it. Until I read installation manual saying it's not recommend for temperature over 104 degrees. I sent it back because it averages over 104 degrees in the shade here in summer.
title: Indoor model is better!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: The Cat Man
content: Worked for a week then stopped! 30 feet from my new router!! Disappointed because it was ok for a week although kept going offline! Attempted all the fix-it possibilities and no go. It's going back!!!
title: Fine for a week!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Jim M
content: There were only two things about this camera I found annoying. the fact that at the end of the cable hardwired to the camera is a 7/8" wide cylindrical USB outlet for which some accommodation will need to be made to pass through exterior walls. You'll either have to drill a hole or come up with some other way of getting it through exterior walls. And secondly, I could only place it 25-30' away from what I want to surveil and at that distance, it's hard to make out faces. But, its great for my purpose of use. Its setup is easy and has an exception wide angle view.
title: ... were only two things about this camera I found annoying. the fact that at the end of the ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: James Canzoniero
content: Does what it is supposed to do.  Very easy install - only thing that's a little shady is the wire coming out the bottom but it's unavoidable if you want the camera to be mounted without having to drill a hole in the wall.  I understand the product decision and have no problem with it.  Just not as vandal-proof as more full-blown security solutions but it's doing what we need.  Install was as painless as it could possibly be for me, but that's because I knew exactly where I wanted it and it's within wifi range.  The magnet-based install made it much simpler because you're just drilling in the base. Check wifi signal to your desired location before purchasing this or any other wifi camera if you want to avoid a lot of headaches.
title: Highly recommend if it fits your needs.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Richard Salko DMD
content: Great image quality, excellent app interface, overall well made system, and I plan on adding other areas of coverage around my house, when I can afford to purchase additional cameras. Software works well, although alerts for movement in designated zones are overly sensitive. Microphone feature only works with Adobe flash installed, not supported for use in Safari browser, but the interface works well otherwise. Not an issue with the iOS on iPhone or iPad app.
title: Nest Cam Outdoor has the best image for outdoor security camera systems

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Reuben Simonsen
content: The picture is decent but very upset with mic. Description states you have the ability to talk to those it can see but even holding in your hand you can't hear the origin talking through the mic on the app. I bought two and both do the same thing.
title: Mic doesn't work like they say

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Doug from DC
content: So, it's a beautiful, well-built camera that gives a nice picture.  When it stays connected.  Keeping it connected to the wifi is frustrating.  I bought a $100+ mesh extender that sits right next to the camera.  It still won't stay connected with 4 bars of signal.
title: Doesn't Stay Connected to Wifi

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Paul G. Wiegman
content: The camera is well designed, easy to install, and easy to install the software.  Even in a remote location, with a snails pace DSL internet connection, the camera works very well.  I'm an Apple fan, and even the packaging has the look and well engineered feel of Apple products.  The camera watches a yard and entrance to the house and I get HD images, and email alerts based on various areas in the field-of-view.  Those areas are user defined.  The installation was easy.  The mounting is magnetic based and the camera can be easily pointed to exactly where you want to view.  Once I get a faster DSL in the area I'll be adding more cameras indoors.  I'm also looking into adding some of the other products to control household activities.
title: easy to install

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: R. Fahrig
content: EASY set-up and great picture. I love the alerts, even if I was a bit creeped out the first time I got an alert saying my camera saw someone (it was my son). Has not been mounted outside yet, but is sitting on an interior window sill facing outside. Even with the screen in front of it there is enough detail to tell who's vehicle is passing or who the person is. I will be adding to my Nest collection.
title: Easy to use

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: fasjam5025
content: One camera's picture quality is awe full. Night vision is bad, doesn’t automatically turn to night vision mode. Product seems damage. As it has a shadow/smudges on the top. Cleaned it many times, no difference. Very disappointed with this buy! We have other Nest products as well.
title: Night vision doesn’t work, shadow in the view

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: RJS
content: This is my second Nest Cam. The resolution is excellent day or night and I like the speaker function so I can talk to people when they approach the house. I am sold on Nest products.  I have two thermostats, two cameras, and one Nest Protect (Smoke/Carbon Monoxide) detector.
title: Excellent surveillance camera

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: cyphersk8
content: I've tried all the different camera and Nest is by far the best. Now that they've lowered their subscription costs it's even better! They have the best quality and app out of all the brands. Hopefully they'll get with it and make a security light one and also a battery version.
title: Great cameras and app!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: MJ
content: Great video quality.  Easy setup.  Camera attaches to a strong magnet that allows you to adjust the angle after it is installed. Software/app is easy to use and has good features:  person alerts, email and app alerts, predefined clips of activity on a timeline, ability to download footage, 2 way sound, and live footage view. Some features are only available with an annual cloud subscription - which currently starts at $99 year.
title: Great video quality and app.  Best features require a cloud subscription.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: jeanniemaenot
content: I like the camera very well. It is surprising how well it works in low light and being able to zoom in is a plus. Now for the bad. It seems Nest wants you to subscribe to their service after 30 days that allows you to not only remotely monitor the camera but allows you to view and save previously recorded data. I think it is pretty sad that they can't give a customer 24 or 48 hours of pre-recorded access with the purchase of their camera. I will look for that type of functionality in the next camera. I would have given a higher rating but having to subscribe to a service that limits the functionality is a show stopper for me.
title: I like the camera very well

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: MR

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: CAD
content: I've been on this DIY home video journey for about several years.  It started about 2 years ago with my purchase of Ring.  It's motion detection was lousy.  A UPS guy would deliver a package to my front door and Ring would start recording when he was 4/5ths down my driveway.  This journey actually seems much longer because this has been a very frustrating journey.  After Ring, I paused in my search for a better video system because I was waiting for Ring to get better.  But my recent search for a system started about 6 months ago when my neighbor across the street noticed that a guy was lurking in front of my house and approaching my front door and wandering around the side of my house into the backyard.  This was at 11:30pm and I was sound asleep in bed.  My neighbor called me (I didn't answer because I was asleep) and then called the police.  No break-in or damage but it spooked me enough to begin investigating a video system.  I wasn't interested in ADT or CPI or any of the large companies that were going to charge me $50/month to monitor my house 24/7.  I just wanted to know what was happening outside of my house when either I was asleep or not at home.  So I first started with Amcrest.  I bought an 8-camera system that needed to be wired for power and internet.  My electrician told me that the way my house was built, he could install cameras in the back of the house but not the front.  The cost for wiring a system in the back and a totally separate system in the front was $1600 (Just for the installation!).  I passed on that.  He said I needed to look into a WiFi system, which then led me to ARLO Pro, which has rechargeable batteries (cool) that last about a month or two (depending upon how often the motion detector goes off), and it was connected via WiFi.  I've used the ARLO system for about 3 months.  The thing that I like most about ARLO is that you can position these cameras anywhere since they don't require a power cord to plug in and they connect to WiFi, and it was a very user-friendly interface (which Amcrest was not.  Amcrest is really for IT guys and not for the lay DIY person who just wants the thing to work).  The thing that makes me crazy about the ARLO system is that the cameras only turn on when they detect motion and by the time they detect motion, the activity has almost left the visible screen.  There were also times when I would pull into the driveway, walk into my garage and a camera that is pointing AT the house would not turn on.  But if a leaf blew in front of the camera then it would turn on. There were a hundred false alarms per day as something tripped the motion sensor but when actual people (like a UPS driver) would walk up my driveway, put a package on the ground and walk away - the motion sensor would pick him up AT the door and as he was walking away.  ARLO picked up a LOT of false motion and failed to pick up or was slow on real motion.  That kind of stuff made me bat shit crazy.  I worked with ARLO's discussion board to try to fix the issues (Ghosting; Pixilation; and slow detection times) but the product is what it is at this stage.  So I went searching for a system that would give me 24/7 video, would have high-quality cameras (1080p), night vision, audio, microphone and look nice.  I had heard about Nest but I also didn't want to pay the monthly/ yearly subscription, but I looking into what the subscription meant (what features were available) and thought I'd give it a try.  The purchase comes with a free trial period, so I thought maybe the 3rd time is a charm.  And it IS!  I only ordered 1 camera because I wanted to test it out and my camera came this morning.  I followed the easy installation steps and got it installed and operational within an hour.  I have an outdoor outlet in the front of my house and I bracketed the wire down the trim of the house and then plugged it in.  (I'll get an alert if it is unplugged or the wire is cut).  At some point in time, I'll have an electrician come and drill a hole in the exterior so the wire is not exposed, but I'm really happy with the product as it is.  I've left the house several times and checked my phone to see what was happening while I was away.  The phone app is easy to use, the video is really 24/7, the installation was easy (I ran into zero issues getting up and running), and I now get alerts that are meaningful.  The Nest Aware actually has algorithms that know when a person is in the frame, rather than a bird flying by.  AND, I can scroll through the entire video of the day within minutes, AND download a video clip to my Photos on my phone.  I'm so happy with this purchase, I just purchased another one that will arrive tomorrow and I'll install that one as well in the back.  And, as I learned more about the subscription, I'm Ok with the cost.  It's 100/year for the first camera and then $50/year for each additional camera.  So for $150/year I can have both the front and back of my house monitored 24/7, and I have use of all the advanced features that come with Nest Aware.  I'll still use my ARLO inside (they do work quite well inside), but the Amcrest cameras will be donated to charity.
title: WAY better than Ring, Amcrest or ARLO

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Robert W
content: These cameras are a snap to set up and they work very well with a reasonably good wifi signal. product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: pmenasco
content: Pretty packaging, but beware.  Unless you pay the annual fee for Nest Aware, the camera is pretty much useless.  I had an intruder one night and the cam took only one random, useless snapshot of the guy.  When I contacted Nest, all they could say was that "fortunately, I had paid to turn Nest Aware back on."  Pretty lame.  Definitely check out other options before getting a Nest. It is NOT worth it.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Enduro_Dad
content: Great camera & service, probably the best value for the quality of the Nest Aware service and seamless configuration. This is the 3rd brand ecosystem I've tried: D-Link, Yi-Home and now Nest. By far this is the best one. Likes: - Ease of setup. There is hardly anything to configure. - iOS app quality: A lot of care went into the UX, and the updates are frequent. - Push alerts are consistent and extraordinarily accurate compared to other cameras/services. - Simplicity - Although you sacrifice some features, getting this configured properly was very simple. - Nest-aware quality and performance. I have the $10/mo plan and I'm happy with the performance and quality of the web app. - 24x7 recording. - Water resistance, nice sealed sturdy housing with good accommodation of IR heat dispersion. Dislikes: - I wish it had a micro SD card option for local recording if the Internet connection goes down. - Magnetic mount is convenient for positioning, but for an outdoor cam it should have additional security mounting. The only way to secure from theft is via clips on the permanently attached flat cable. Hopefully a 3rd party solution will turn up. - Night vision is unusually pixalated when there is motion. I'm not sure if this is a limitation of IR recording in general, or if it's an issue with the camera. For example: I can pick up license plates easily during daylight, but at night, even with enough IR light, it's overly pixelated. This is with 1080 enabled, very close proximity to 5ghz 120mbps wifi. Overall I'm very happy with the camera and service. It's a whole package solution, I wouldn't get one without the other. It's expensive if you need multiple cameras, and you have to consider monthly cost. Compared to D-link: Nest is better all around. I do miss the advanced configuration of the D-Link cameras however, like FTP support, and most D-link cameras support Micro-SD local recording. Plus no monthly fees. However, the D-link iOS app is poorly designed and supported, and web access is bizarrely complicated. You kinda get what you pay for. Compared to Yi-Home: I'm really impressed with the Yi-Home 720p cameras, especially considering how cheap they are. The hardware is almost as good as Nest and there are no monthly fees. However there is no streaming service provided, you need to access your SD card to view older recordings and there is no desktop web viewing option (everything is via the mobile app). You really need a fast broadband connection for it to be useful. Plus the night vision & audio quality isn't as good and the push alerts aren't as consistent. If you need to depend on a camera / service, the Nest is worth the extra expense.
title: Very impressive! Missing just a couple features.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: QC and Wolverine
content: We recently installed the Nest Outdoor Camera, and really like the ability to see what is going on in front of our house as we have been concerned that some packages may have been stolen while we were away.  Nothing caught yet, but realized there are some things we were not prepared for with this: Installation:  We have a Brick exterior, so in order to anchor the cord, needed to Hammer Drill and drill bits that can handle that kind of impact(FYI - you will need a 1/4 drill bit to get the anchors into the brick.  The 1/8 drill that Nest tells you to use is only if going into wood that does not require the anchors), and it helps to have a second body directing you with the camera to determine the optimal angle.  Because my camera is only 8 feet or some from the power outlet, it left us with a lot of cord to figure out what to do with it.  It's great to have up to 25 feet to work with, but need to have a plan for the excess. Nest App:  Love the ease, especially since we also have the thermostats.  We get a lot of false alerts due to headlights at night, rustle of trees etc.which can be very annoying especially in the beginning  We now primarily take notice of the alerts that say they have recognized a person.  The speaker seems to be hit or miss,  On the phone app, is in an awkward place if you also want to lean in to speak.  On the other hand, it picks up sound well.  The zones are especially helpful as it lets me know where it is picking up activity, and let's me turn off notifications in certain areas that have helped reduce the false alerts. Note: as soon as you connect it to your account, the 30 day trial to Nest Aware starts, so make sure you don't start connecting it until you are ready to install.  We discovered the need for additional tools after first test, so we lost about 2 weeks of trial period. Overall picture is good, sound pick up is good, and easy to use.  Would recommend this product, just be prepared for the installation challenges.
title: and really like the ability to see what is going on in ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: William Barrett
content: These almost work really well - but they end up being frustrating as can be! The worst problem is that none of the history/recorded access methods has decent review mechanisms, and the motion detection is hit and miss, so one can totally miss an important event. One can also go mad trying to pinpoint an event one knows exists. On my other screen I now have the camera playback looping after I clicked a recent time - it's doing nothing. This is pretty typical. The resolution of history search is really odd on the PC as well as the Android apps. One has a slider that jerks and jumps.  There is no fast forward or backwards. There are fat dots for motion detected - but, like i said above - it detects maybe 50% of the motion events. Combine this with the pathetic scanning capabilities and you miss things unless you are extremely lucky or can afford to have someone sit through the full feed. That said - the quality is really good. The mounting is interesting.  Magnetic - so mount it high and hope a rock isn't thrown. I don't know how much wind it will handle. You need to route the cord carefully, as it is so rigid the magnet can't overcome its bend. The bargain (10-day history) service is $10/mo + $5/extra camera. I don't know how much it costs to hire someone to sit and watch the history to tell you what happened?  You can try the app and you might get lucky.  Well - maybe the Apple app is better?  the Nest does have that annoying "we know what you want" feeling to it. I've struggled with this thing, and the Indoor version, for 3 months now. and I still wonder why in the world I bought this thing. I'm better off with a warning sign on the lawn.
title: Good camera, underwhelming history viewing.

author: D. Ryan
content: I've had this camera for about 4 months. No issues until recently. I signed up and paid for the Nest Aware program, which sends you notifications. Over the past 2 days, the Nest Aware system has been failing to send notifications. I already spoke to a customer service representative. One issue is hardwired into their program, in that once a notification is sent, it won't push a notification for 30 minutes. That happened at 130am when miscellaneous activity triggered a notification, then 10 minutes later it missed sending a notification after spotting someone. The second issue, was it blankly missed sending me a notification, no 30 minute buffer involved this time. I logged on to the camera, and it records these as events, which is successfully did. The fault lies in their Nest Aware system. Unfortunately, I already paid my annual membership in advance, so I'm out 2 cameras and a shoddy subscription service.
title: Not Reliable for Protection

If I would have known this, I would have bought a camera system that includes a hard drive- no subscription and would have paid for itself in 5 years compared to a nest aware subscription.

author: Richard Coencas
content: It was very easy to install and setup. I mounted it pretty high above the door and ran the cable through the wall and plugged in in the garage, so I'm not too worried about someone grabbing it. The only things I don't like, because it is set fairly high (but within the range Nest recommends), I don't always get a clear view of faces, and I get a lot of alerts for neighborhood cats, birds and flying insects being caught on camera. I'd love to be able to limit the alerts to people only, but don't see a way to do that in the app. Picture quality is amazing and I do appreciate knowing when a package is left at my front door or someone is prowling about.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: TC
content: THis product is great nad works as described PROS: Easy install and set-up with app and online to establish 'zones' Easy real time viewing and scrolling through an entire day's activities Always recording (no lag in record start like other products [returned the Arlo Pro because this was a HUGE issue!!!]) Night vision is very good for the area observed Great picture quality on 1080p setting Two way audio is great to speak with anyone outside Audio records during recorded events - can her conversations with great quality Very responsive when picks up motion and can inform of zone (up to four different) all which are color coded Sleek dome look and the magnet is very powerful and easy to allow fine tuning of camera location CONS: Wired unit. Just barely made it under the 25ft. that comes with camera as I had to install an outlet in attic to use. Need to have quality internet connectivity - had to 'extend' wifi signal to ensure connectivity as it was placed  outside in my dead zone Have to pay for a subscription to store video data with a 'Nest Aware Subscription' A bit pricey for a solitary unit. All and all this an amazing product and I would recommend to anyone in market that has wired outlet accessibility. It in my opinion is a much superior product to the Arlo Pro as it is reliable and has no lag as it is always recording.  We are very happy with purchase!!!!
title: Amazing camera that delivers on performance!!!

author: Collin Knudson
content: I don't normally review but after reading other reviews I felt I had to. If you read before you purchase you'll know what you're getting. What you're getting is a high quality, simple setup, easily accessible camera. The app is fantastic and easy to use. If you can get your power inside it is difficult to steal without being viewed on camera (depending on location of setup). I haven't used the playback on a PC yet but would guess it's as simplistic as the app. I'm already wanting another camera and highly recommend this camera for the family wanting surveillance on their home/property. The stream is great live and playback is seamless. I've received a few 'person alerts' already (from myself setting up and the family returning from a walk). After playing around with setting I synced my phone so Nest knows when I'm home. Well done Nest. It's everything I wanted without dealing with running many wires, messing with batteries and/or a hard drive/card, all while viewing away from home.  I spent a lot of time reading other products before I purchased and glad I did. I don't feel you'll be disappointed.
title: Great camera

author: Lawrence Winnerman
content: I bought and installed a Nest Cam Outdoor last week, and I love it. It was incredibly easy to set up and install, and it works like a charm. I like the fact that it is a wired cam that you can plug into an outlet. While the tradeoff is that you have to find an elegant way to route that wire so it looks unobtrusive, in my opinion that's way better than having to replace batteries endlessly on something mounted high outside your house. I got one, and I like it so much I am planning to get two more.
title: Great value for money paid, easy to use

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Rjbeaz
content: The picture on this is great. I used to use a Nest cam pointed out the window but this is way better! The box you plug the USB into is a bit of a pain, just in placing it and wondering why it was necessary. But no complaints, it does what I want it too.
title: Replaced my old cam!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Joe Fabris
content: The product is ok.  I agree with other reviews that the cables have endpoints that require drilling an inch hole in a wall seems poorly thought out. It would also be a helpful design to have a cord that would be easy to remove the plug so it could be tied into a line without having to cut the cords. I’m at the point where the service trial has ended.  No where in the app can you subscribe to the service.  Frustrating.
title: Not designed with installation in mind.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: les
content: We like the system.  I am a little upset after 30 days you have to pay if you want to back up any days.  Even being able to see up to the last 24 hours would be better then just a live feed.  Picture is clear for the most part but is blurry if subject is too far away
title: We like the system

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: nicholas
content: It's a pretty solid Camera so far. The product seems like really good quality and I haven't had any issues. Dislikes: Large plug if you route through a wall. Takes a 7/8 bit. If you live in a busy area be prepared for your phone to blow up from notifications. It will take some adjustment time to figure that out. Overall I would recommend the product, but I'm not sure if there is something better out there or not as I only have Nest.
title: Worth the money

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: David's
content: cameras need to be too close to wife to work. I have an extender as well and they still dont work properly. The delay is the most inconvenient part, the talking function becomes completely unusable when there is a 30 second delay in detection. Not cool. If I could I would return these and get a ring or another off brand.
title: not up to standard

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: SHTFandGO
content: Cameras are cool ad easy to install, but had I known recording video was only a pay monthly or yearly option I would have never boight them. Shame on you nest (google) It should at least be an option to record your own video locally.  Tempted to rip them off my walls and return them.
title: Cameras are cool ad easy to install

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: james brown
content: A nice addition to our security system perfect for my family let’s me know who is at my house when I’m away and when we are sleeping

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: MTZJ

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Ms. J
content: Wonderful product. Purchased twin pack but surprised that each camera will require Nest Aware purchase instead of a single fee.
title: Wonderful product. Purchased twin pack but surprised that each ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: J. Valeski
content: high quality construction, amazing image quality. the power cable setup is a bit cumbersome if you're trying to do in-wall installation. the cables are really long which is great if you need to do long runs, but annoying for shorter runs.
title: easy setup, high quality device.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Aaron N.
content: I own 2 of the indoor cams and love them. The outdoor Nest cam did not let me down. It was easy to install (Maybe a half hour) once I had my ladder and tools together. Set up is a breeze, and it works great.  The field of veiw is great, and the allerts are pretty quick to my device. I would recomend this to friends, and family. The Nest aware paid subscription is a bit spendy but it is nice to have.
title: Easy install and works great!

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Elizabeth S. Wood
content: It works with a laptop.  If you are going to use it with your Kindle Fire...forget it.  You need to install Adobe Flash, supposedly, to make it work.  That can't be done on the Kindle Fire.  You need to set up a Google account to get Google Play, to get the "shopping basket" to install the Nest app.  No matter how many times I tried, I can't the app, so on my laptop, I just made up my own desktop shortcut.  I would like for Amazon to get the Nest app and have us download it through them, instead of Google.  So far, I am using the camera in my garage to check from vermin from next door's vacant house (but not cleaned out).  As a result of all this, I am not going to put it outdoors if I can't see it on my tablet.  I would return it, but know I will not get a full refund.  Dropcam was FAR better, but they have sold out to Nest.  I still have my Dropcam app, which works fine with the Dropcam cameras, but not with the Nest camera.
title: I would like for Amazon to get the Nest app and have ...

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: bethany
content: good range, image is great, simple set up.
title: Five Stars

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Scott Johnson
content: Thrilled. Love the quality and the cloud based recording. Just know that the long cord can be great if you are going into the attic or a long distance, but a detriment if you go through the wall and down to a wall plug since it leaves lots of extra cable on your wall.
title: Love it

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Jermaine
content: Camera are unreliable. Disconnects a lot throughout the day, even if you have very high-speed internet . Nest support is terrible.  I wouldn't recommend there terrible customer service nor unreliable cameras.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Curt Bouler
content: Disconnects from the wi-fi for no reason sometimes and takes a while to re-connect but the clarity is very good.  We use it to monitor for critters - I'd be hesitant to totally depend on it for security from human critters.

product: Google Nest Cam Outdoor - Weatherproof Outdoor Camera for Home Security - Surveillance Camera with Night Vision - Control with Your Phone
author: Darthvadernesto
